story:
Hi my name is Dani :)

All my life questions of my gender identity popped into my head. Each time these questions arose I shoved them to the back of my mind. Then I questioned my sexuality and it brought up everything. I was forced to not ignore my feelings and not ignore who I truly am. In 2014 I came to terms with the fact that I am transgender. I do not identify as male or female and the label that I am comfortable with/most fits me is genderqueer. I present in a very feminine way, which also makes the label fitting. I suffer from intense chest dysphoria. The only option I have, after trying binders, is surgery so that I may live a healthier life in the correct body. Anything you can donate is much appreciated.

story:
The Scoop is the world’s first at-home lateral trainer that is affordable, effective and easy to use. Lateral training is scientifically proven to be the most effective form of cardio - it burns more calories, targets more muscles, and takes less time than traditional machines like treadmills and bikes.

Other lateral trainers cost upwards of $4,000 and take up a lot of space! The Scoop is the world’s ONLY affordable lateral trainer that fits anywhere.

With The Scoop, you don’t have to pay a fortune to get all the advantages of lateral training in the comfort of your home.

 

The Scoop is the best way to tone your legs and get that perfect booty. Because it gives you a complete 360 degree lower body workout, you’ll tone even difficult areas like your inner and outer thighs. Bikes, treadmills, and ellipticals can’t do that.

Plus, The Scoop’s patented low-impact motion protects your joints and actually supports your knees and hips to help prevent injury while you tone - building your strength and balance.


The Scoop’s unique bi-directional design also gives you versatility - simply move in one direction to work out your glutes and inner thighs and switch it up to work out your glutes and outer thighs. One machine for two distinct workouts!

Not only that, The Scoop’s lateral movement also increases your hip flexibility, activates your core and strengthens the muscles that support your hips and knees. This can help improve your balance, and increase strength and mobility while reducing risk of injury.

Traditional cardio machines only work the body in one direction. Bikes, steppers, treadmills, ellipticals all move your body front to back only, which means your results are only focused on the front and back of your body.

Lateral trainers work your body side to side and front to back simultaneously. This means they work more muscles at the same time. With lateral training, you work the total lower body 360 degrees.

With The Scoop, you get all the benefits of lateral training without having to leave your chair! No expensive equipment or gym memberships - you can burn calories faster and easier at home. In fact, The Scoop can burn up to 500 calories in an hour!

The Scoop is extremely convenient and easy to use.

The Scoop is ultra-compact and lightweight. It can easily fit under a desk for a session while you work, then quickly tucked away when not in use. 

Pull it out whenever you want and workout wherever you want. No bulky equipment - save space and save effort.

Need some variety in your workout? Don’t worry! The Scoop is bi-directional and features adjustable tension. Dial up or dial down your workout and exercise different muscle groups by changing your pedaling direction. Customize your routine and ramp up the intensity however you want.


A built-in 4 function fitness tracker tracks your time, distance, speed, and calories burned during your workout - making it easy for you to track your progress and hit your goals.

Too busy at work? Not enough time to watch your favorite show? With The Scoop, you can get in your workout and get stuff done at the same time. Burn away calories as you enjoy your Netflix binge and tone your legs and glutes while checking your emails or tackling a work project.

Burning fat and toning muscles has never been easier. With The Scoop, you’ll work out your entire lower body from hips to thighs to booty all from the comfort of your home.

Lenny Snyderman, a competitive athlete and entrepreneur with an engineering background, conceived of a sideways figure-8 lateral motion. The goal was to find a motion that would engage the entire lower body 360 degrees instead of just focusing effort on the front and backs of the legs only. Mr. Snyderman spent over a decade designing, perfecting, and patenting the technology internationally.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Trevor Murphy. I am the current Shenango Valley Disc Golf Alliance President as well as the course designer for both Buhl Park Disc Golf Course as well as The Pines at Shenango Lake Disc Golf Course which are both in Hermitage Pennsylvania.

I am a current Professional Disc Golf Association (PDGA) Member #56033. I have been playing disc golf for over 6 years. I am also a PDGA Tournament Director and Official. I have hosted over 10 events in the past 2 Years in our area.  I also host weekly leagues, indoor putting leagues, and miscellaneous events throughout the year.

The SVDGA is organizing this fundraising attempt for the Buhl Park Tee Pad Campaign.
The Campaign is extremely important for the development of Disc Golf in our area.

One of the most critiqued components of a disc golf course are the available tees. A well built textured concrete tee can reduce negative impressions. The tee usually consists of a flat, level area about five to six feet wide by eight to fifteen feet long. Unlike golf, where players are stationary during the drive, disc golf drives can utilize a walk-up or run-up to generate more power and momentum. Creating an ideal surface for players to throw from will make your course more appealing to new and experienced players alike.

Concrete tees represent the professional standard for disc golf. They require little maintenance when installed correctly. With the right tools, you can create a textured surface that allows players sure footing in most weather conditions. Concrete tees require some preparation and labor to install, but the investment produces a superior tee surface preferred by a wide range of players.

We plan to install 36 5'x12'x4" Concrete Tee Pads for the Blue and White Tee Areas. In addition to the funds we raise we want to add Mats for all 18 of the remaining Red Tee Areas.

These tee pads would bring a wide variety of play from the Professional Level down to the Recreational Player. The SVDGA would be able to host larger events within the PDGA Standard.
Making Hermitage PA a disc golf destination. Your contributions could help us reach our goals!

What We Need & What You Get

Currently we are working towards a goal of $5000 for Tee Pads for all 54 Tees. A combination of Concrete and Rubber Mats. We hope to prepare, pour, and finish 36 concrete tee pads, Blue and White Tee Areas. We also hope to raise enough for mats for the remaining 18 Red Tee Areas.

How is this all possible you may ask? With the help of Buhl Park as well as other outside contributions, the costs for the Tee Pads is obtainable with this campaign. For every dollar raised we will be MATCHED dollar for dollar by outside contributions on what we can raise here on Indiegogo. The entire project is projected to cost close to $10,000.

While not including excavation of the 36 Tee areas. Total Material Costs break down as such:

Concrete Mesh: Available in 5'x150' Rolls. We would need 432' of Concrete Mesh bringing our total of rolls up to 3 at $115 per Roll. Total: $345

Frames: We plan to make 18 Frames while installing the Tee Pads in a 2 part process. The Front and Back 9's.
We need (36) 2"x4"x12' @ $5.04 each = $182
We need (18) 2"x4"x10' (cut in half) @ $4.17 = $75

Aggregate: .7tons per Pad (25 Tons for 36 Pads) = $901 with tax and delivered.

Concrete: Base Mix is 36.75 cubic yards of 4000psi weighted concrete. $4,752.51 with tax and delivered. Adding 1% Non-Chloride to help cure quicker is $194.78.

This brings us to a total of $6,451 for 36 Concrete Pads.

We also plan to install 18 Rubber Mats for the Red Tee Areas: $50 each 4'x6' mat. We will be using 2 Mats to make a total of a 12' Tee Pad. Total of $1800.

With excavation costs being quoted around $5000. Our grand Total for the entire project would be $13,251

With a strong volunteer force this also would not be possible. We are currently looking for help with excavation equipment, concrete pour knowledge, and finishing/texturing the pad.

A range of Perks will be available for  each and every contribution to this goal. From support stickers to personalize plaque on the Tee Sign.

If we don't reach our entire goal the funds raised will go to the overall Tee Pad Fund and we will try another direction.

Our total goal is to prep, pour, and finish all 54 Tee Pads no later than July 10th in hopes to be ready for the SVDGOpen July 15th and 16th 2017.

The Impact

The benefits of disc golf are numerous. For parks, the sport provides quality recreational opportunities and attract new users the park system. For players, the sport can be played at any age, provides a healthy outdoor activity and is inexpensive.

Adding Tee Pads will not only increase the positive impact of disc golf and the community. Making for a safer way to play the game without the worry of twisting an ankle teeing from a muddy location.

Many world class courses have a level area to tee from bringing in a larger player draw.

I hope that you might have taken the time to read this over and think about contributing to the Buhl Park Tee Fund Campaign in hopes that the Shenango Valley Disc Golf Alliance, and its members, can continue to grow the sport one tee at a time.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hello, my name is Trevor Murphy. I am the current Shenango Valley Disc Golf Alliance President as well as the course designer for both Buhl Park Disc Golf Course as well as The Pines at Shenango Lake Disc Golf Course which are both in Hermitage Pennsylvania.I am a current Professional Disc Golf Association (PDGA) Member #56033. I have been playing disc golf for over 6 years. I am also a PDGA Tournament Director and Official. I have hosted over 10 events in the past 2 Years in our area.  I also host weekly leagues, indoor putting leagues, and miscellaneous events throughout the year.The SVDGA is organizing this fundraising attempt for the Buhl Park Tee Pad Campaign.The Campaign is extremely important for the development of Disc Golf in our area.
One of the most critiqued components of a disc golf course are the available tees. A well built textured concrete tee can reduce negative impressions. The tee usually consists of a flat, level area about five to six feet wide by eight to fifteen feet long. Unlike golf, where players are stationary during the drive, disc golf drives can utilize a walk-up or run-up to generate more power and momentum. Creating an ideal surface for players to throw from will make your course more appealing to new and experienced players alike.
Concrete tees represent the professional standard for disc golf. They require little maintenance when installed correctly. With the right tools, you can create a textured surface that allows players sure footing in most weather conditions. Concrete tees require some preparation and labor to install, but the investment produces a superior tee surface preferred by a wide range of players.We plan to install 36 5'x12'x4" Concrete Tee Pads for the Blue and White Tee Areas. In addition to the funds we raise we want to add Mats for all 18 of the remaining Red Tee Areas.These tee pads would bring a wide variety of play from the Professional Level down to the Recreational Player. The SVDGA would be able to host larger events within the PDGA Standard.Making Hermitage PA a disc golf destination. Your contributions could help us reach our goals!

What We Need & What You Get
Currently we are working towards a goal of $5000 for Tee Pads for all 54 Tees. A combination of Concrete and Rubber Mats. We hope to prepare, pour, and finish 36 concrete tee pads, Blue and White Tee Areas. We also hope to raise enough for mats for the remaining 18 Red Tee Areas.How is this all possible you may ask? With the help of Buhl Park as well as other outside contributions, the costs for the Tee Pads is obtainable with this campaign. For every dollar raised we will be MATCHED dollar for dollar by outside contributions on what we can raise here on Indiegogo. The entire project is projected to cost close to $10,000.While not including excavation of the 36 Tee areas. Total Material Costs break down as such:Concrete Mesh: Available in 5'x150' Rolls. The Front and Back 9's.We need (36) 2"x4"x12' @ $5.04 each = $182We need (18) 2"x4"x10' (cut in half) @ $4.17 = $75Aggregate: .7tons per Pad (25 Tons for 36 Pads) = $901 with tax and delivered.Concrete: Base Mix is 36.75 cubic yards of 4000psi weighted concrete. $4,752.51 with tax and delivered. Adding 1% Non-Chloride to help cure quicker is $194.78.This brings us to a total of $6,451 for 36 Concrete Pads.We also plan to install 18 Rubber Mats for the Red Tee Areas: $50 each 4'x6' mat. We will be using 2 Mats to make a total of a 12' Tee Pad. Total of $1800.With excavation costs being quoted around $5000. Our grand Total for the entire project would be $13,251With a strong volunteer force this also would not be possible. We are currently looking for help with excavation equipment, concrete pour knowledge, and finishing/texturing the pad.A range of Perks will be available for  each and every contribution to this goal. From support stickers to personalize plaque on the Tee Sign.If we don't reach our entire goal the funds raised will go to the overall Tee Pad Fund and we will try another direction.Our total goal is to prep, pour, and finish all 54 Tee Pads no later than July 10th in hopes to be ready for the SVDGOpen July 15th and 16th 2017.

The Impact
The benefits of disc golf are numerous. For parks, the sport provides quality recreational opportunities and attract new users the park system. For players, the sport can be played at any age, provides a healthy outdoor activity and is inexpensive.Adding Tee Pads will not only increase the positive impact of disc golf and the community. Making for a safer way to play the game without the worry of twisting an ankle teeing from a muddy location.Many world class courses have a level area to tee from bringing in a larger player draw.
I hope that you might have taken the time to read this over and think about contributing to the Buhl Park Tee Fund Campaign in hopes that the Shenango Valley Disc Golf Alliance, and its members, can continue to grow the sport one tee at a time.

story:
We are on mission is to accelerate the world's transition to a disease free human civilization.  

 

The Cronovo watch is combination of three technologies rolled into a single device.

A personal health device, A fitness tracker and A smartwatch.

 

              

‘‘ This technology provides Cronovo with a number of advantages compared to regular health-tracking smartwatches ’’

 

 

‘‘ Cronovo Smartwatch, A Noah’s Ark Health and Fitness Wearable ’’

 

 

‘‘ Your heart might just skip a beat when you see the newest smartwatch to hit the market’’

 

 

 

 

Why do we exist ?

We are on mission to accelerate the world's transition to a disease free human civilization. In order for us to achieve this we must contribute in reducing the number of deaths and injuries caused by various diseases. Good fitness prevents diseases from occurring good detection systems will help prevent deaths and injuries from occurring. Therefore as a first step we are focused on Cardiac diseases.

According to World Health Organisation, Cardiac diseases are biggest global killers worldwide. We aim to contribute in reducing the number of deaths related to cardiac diseases.

 

 

 

"Cardiac diseases is the biggest global killer for nearly two decades"- World Health Organisation

 

 

 

 

The Medical Features

 

The EKG App

 

 

30 Seconds Atrial Fibrillation Detection

 

 

Detailed Analytics for Decision Makers

 

 

 

 

Medical standard PDF report ready to be shared in an instant.

 

 

Accuracy of Cronovo

A study was conducted in order to compare the technology within Cronovo to FDA approved devices used in hospitals for the early detection of cardiac conditions. In this case it was compared to the Philips Pagewriter Trim III. Below is a summary of the study. If you would like to see the Full Report Click Here.

 

 

The Fitness Features

 

Heart Rate Zone Tracking

 

Simple chart analysis on how active your lifestyle is.

 

 

Cardiac Efficiency Tracking

 

Cardiac efficiency is the overall health of your cardiovascular system. Benefit - Track the efficiency of your heart over a period of time.

 

Heart Rate Recovery

 

Heart rate recovery calculations helps in measuring the fitness level of your cardiovascular system. A fit heart recovers faster than a less fit heart.

A great alternative for VO2 Max calculations. VO2 Max calculations require speed information whereas heart rate recovery calculations does not require speed and is applicable in almost all execrises.   

 

Resting Heart Rate

 

Resting Heart Rate is an indication of your physical fitness. A low resting heart rate means you have a stronger heart.

 

VO2 Max

 

 

V02 Max calculations measures the effectiveness of your oxygen intake. Benefits - 10 % increase in VO2 max could decrease all-cause mortality risk by 15%, Increase in VO2 max makes you faster, stronger,with a higher stamina and immunize you from many effects of aging.

 

Weekly Training Effect

 

Training effect feature helps you track progress towards your fitness goals. Benefit - Create customize and track your progress towards your goals. 

 

Core Temperature

 

This feature allows you to track and estimate your body's core temperature.

Benefits - Illness indicator and track effects of heat, temperature calculations can help in estimating metabolic rate, hydration status and body recovery data.

 

HRV - Heart Rate Variability 

 

HRV can be converted into very useful data. HRV can provide deep beneficial insights into the unconscious side of your body. Cronovo tracks data from The Autonomic Nervous System. This is the system that tracks what you cannot control for example, heart beats, breathing, blood flow etc. In other words they cannot be controlled with the mind.

 

Your HRV baseline score has a deeper meaning and it always changing based on your lifestyle.

 

 

Sleep Tracking

 

Cronovo watch is capable of tracking automated sleep detection, light sleep, deep sleep, awake time, sleep time and latency.

Good sleep lowers heart risks and improves your body performance.

 

Cronovo Achieves High Heart Rate Accuracy

 

Here is comparison of Cronovo’s Heart Rate Accuracy to FDA medical approved devices

 

 

 

Benefits of Cronovo for Physical Activities

 

" Cronovo is designed to be a standalone device, which means you DON'T have to carry your phone while training "

 

Cronovo is designed to be a standalone device, which means you do not have to carry your phone while training. Cronovo has built in GPS, great internal storage for your music and great quality display screen to give you real time data and guidance while training.

 

Cronovo in the Gym

Traditional fitness trackers do not provide much use cases in the gym. Cronovo aims to solve the problem head on. 

 

Cronovo for Weight Training

Cronovo also have a range of weight  training exercises and a built in tracking app that helps you record your reps and sets.

For Him

 

For Her

 

Cronovo for Running

Cronovo’s unique features is designed to provide a great experience when running. You can train on different training zones, track  the quality of workouts using GPS, coaching while running and listening to music while running.  Cronovo has built in ANT+ and Bluetooth sensors which makes it compatible with many other wearables in the market for example foot pods, chest straps etc.

 

 
 

Cronovo for Cycling

Cronovo is designed to give a great cycling experience. Cronovo’s built in GPS and health sensors can give a huge range of metrics such as speed,  calories lost etc. Since Cronovo has integrated ANT+  and Bluetooth sensors,  this makes Cronovo compatible with many existing cycling products such as cycling cadence sensors, pedaling power meters, chest straps etc.

 

How does Cronovo help with work outs at home ?

We understand that not everybody would have the training equiments, time and the budget to do complex workouts. Cronovo aims to solve this problem in unique ways.

Less than 10 Minute Workouts  - Cronovo features some unique workouts that help you achieve your fitness goals  by just spending few minutes per day. These are scientifically validated workouts. The Cronovo watch guides you during these workouts.

HIIT and Cardio workouts – these workouts are designed to keep your metabolic rates high. The Cronovo watch guides you during the workouts

Yoga – Cronovo also features yoga workouts.

 

 

Cronovo for Non-Physical Activities

Cronovo is also designed to be a great tracker for non physical activities.

 

 

Cronovo for Stress Tracking

Stress affects everyone of us. That is why we have designed a stress tracking algorithm to track stress. Cronovo can help you track stress throughout the day while working, sleeping etc.

 

Cronovo as A Smartwatch

 

“ Cronovo is designed to look like a Classic Watch ”

 

" The Cronovo Collection "

 

Silver Edition

 

 

 

Sports Edition

 

 

Black Edition

 

Leather Edition ( Artificial )

 

 

 

The Phone App

 

The Cronovo phone app provides personalized insights and recommendations. You can view all your fitness data at a glance organised into mini circles.

 

 

Detailed analysis provided into simple charts and scores

 

 

Compatibility

Cronovo smartwatch is compatible on both Android and iOS. We are also currently working hard to make it compatible on Windows as well.

 

 

The Rewards

      The Manufacturing      

 

 We have already completed the tooling, molding and finalized all the components in the Cronovo watch. We would also like to share some of manufacturing processes used to bring a Cronovo watch into life.

 

Components

All the components that you see in the picture below are required to be assembled in order to form a Cronovo Watch. We have designed so that there minimal flaws during assembly. We also have tried to reduce wastage as much as possible.

 

 

Display Assembly

Requires a clean room and is a very carefully done assembly process.

 

 

Display Inventory

Our finished and quality tested display components ready to be assembled with the Cronovo watch.

 

 

 

Meet

 

 

 

The Project Timeline

We have finished developing the hardware, medical and fitness features. In fact we are on last stages of our timeline. We need to generate enough sales for us to scale the mass production of our watches.

 

 

 

The Product Development Journey

 

 

 

Medical Certification

We are currently in the process of getting FDA and EU Medical CE Certificate. Our medical certifications are for the software. Once approved we will provide software upgrade for all our devices and enable the medical features. The medical sensors can still be used to collect data but it would only display fitness features to you as a user. If you would still like to access the medical features for research or other special benefits please contact us. The devices will be shipped before we get medical approvals. We will launch the medical features in different regions and countries based on medical approvals. 

 

Why are we crowdfunding ?

 

 

 

Most of the sales generated will help us in buying more inventory. Some of the funds will help us develop more software features that would be provided as software updates for all our devices. Some of the software features that we are currently developing are - 

Blood Pressure, Hydration, Hypertension, Drug Effectiveness, Blood Potassium, Epilepsy Seizures detection, Sleep Apnea and Diabetes Prediction.

 

Why have we taken so long to ship ?

We are trying to integrate a lot of features into the watch and it took us longer than excepted. We are striving to achieve a great quality product which takes time. Accuracy of the data generated by our devices and platform is of paramount importance for us. We are happy to say that we have finally achieved what we set out to achieve. We will continue to strive for great quality products and continue providing software updates to our all devices even after shipping them.

 

People who have helped us along the way ?

 

                         

 

Got Questions ?

Ask anything! Send us a message or post a comment and we will do our best to get back to you with an answer. Got Feedback? Have you got a creative idea that you think we should implement on the Cronovo smart watch? Shoot us a message - let us know! Cronovo smart watch is being made possible by you, and we want you to be a part of the creative process as well.

If you would like to know how our technology works, check out the FAQs section for further details.

Email us at -  info@cronovo.com

 

International Backers

This project is for backers everywhere. We will be shipping the Cronovo Smart Watch worldwide!

There are some unique processes that apply specifically to international backers that we would like you to be aware of. Please note that there is no way for us to charge any additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT/duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax code. Therefore, these fees may be incurred upon receipt of your reward. These fees are the responsibility of each backer, and additional information regarding VAT/duties can be found in our FAQs. Please note certain countries do not have to pay any extra charges we have taken care of them for you, the countries where this applies are mentioned in the FAQs section. 

In addition, due to first class shipping fees and the dimensions of the Cronovo Smart Watch, shipping rates may seem a bit high for some international locations. We calculated shipping rates beforehand, and are able to swallow some of the shipping costs based on the number of orders. Please note that shipping becomes completely free when you pledge for 3 or more Cronovo Smart Watches.

 

Some Final Thoughts

While we strongly believe in the many benefits of having a great fitness tracker, Cronovo only has the capability of alerting the user of a serious heart condition or illness. Please note even though Cronovo is capable of such a function we would still need to certified by the Health Regulators of countries to provide life saving features legally. That is why we have turned to crowdfunding as way to raise funds to get through health regulations. The Health Data tracking provided by Cronovo Smart Watch is a fun, unique way to customize your lifestyle and fitness training. When designing Cronovo we were inspired by research that claims tracking and focusing on improving your Cardiovascular Health helps individuals in achieving their fitness goals faster and easy to maintain their Physique. We have personally found that it helps us stay fit, focused and motivated.

 

Risks and challenges

We are a team combined of Experienced Entrepreneurs, Hardware Engineers, Software Engineers, Fashion Designers, User Experience Designers, and supply chain experts with more than 40 years of entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience, so rest assured the Cronovo watch will exceed your expectations.

We strive for perfection! We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. We have identified and locked in our manufacturers, suppliers, quality of components, pricing all the way down to logistics.

What you are seeing are prototypes, so expect the final product to be more polished and of supreme quality. We have done the hard bits such as we fully developed algorithms required for software and hardware design. In particular, we are currently developing the best version of the Vofit Operating System, Cronovo Heart Rate Technology with the best quality watch casing and watch strap, and as anyone who has developed a technology product knows - it's a detailed process requiring 3D modeling, molds and more.

Supply Chain Risk: We are incredibly confident and proud of our supply chain. We can make what we say we will make, when we say we will make it. But we cannot predict unforeseen circumstances.

In short, we know what we are doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers.

We have done the hard bits such as we fully developed algorithms required for software and hardware design. In particular, we are currently developing the best version of the Vofit Operating System, Cronovo Heart Rate Technology with the best quality watch casing and watch strap, and as anyone who has developed a technology product knows - it's a detailed process requiring 3D modeling, molds and more.Supply Chain Risk: We are incredibly confident and proud of our supply chain. We can make what we say we will make, when we say we will make it. But we cannot predict unforeseen circumstances.In short, we know what we are doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers.

story:
Why did we make Lock&Go?

As this armband's inventor,I  am a  sport fanatic, running, cycling, working out in the gym. Like most people i also couldn't leave without my smartphone. Over the years I have been trying out all kinds of armbands, however none of them were truly perfect.  Uncomfortable to wear, keep slipping, struggling accessing to my smartphone when I have to. Not to say the sweat stain and the smell. I complained to some of my friends and found out that they were all having the same bad experience!

 Why don't I make one myself which could solve all the problems? ? I started to think. After talking to a number of material engineers and manufacturers, several round of tests and changes, finally figured out the prototype. Nearly 1 year of hard work, I managed to make this armband which I use every day, and I am very proud of it. Now I wish it could benefit more people, so if you were having the same troubles carrying your smartphone when working out, please support us! 

 

Incredibly Easy to access to Your Phone

The unique magnet slot design offers you the easiest way accessing to your smartphone when you are on the go, while keeping it securely fixed on your arm.

Truly, No Slip, No Jiggle

Based on our market research, it’s found out that most of the armbands are made of low elastic fabric with limited friction, so it is almost impossible to fit the arm well and easy to slip when you run or work out. Lock&Go is the world first armband which utilize the eco and skin friendly silicone. The silicone has a just fine frictional effect with your skin or clothes sleeve, with the metal buckle, Lock&Go armband offers a real No Slip,No Jiggle user experience.

 

Fit Almost Any Arm Size (21-44cm\8.3-17.3Inch)

Unlike most of the armband which use low elastic fabric, Lock&Go's high flexibility silicone band offers users a more adjustable arm size span, and enables users to perfectly complete movements such as lifting, barbell concentration curl，push－up etc.. 

No More Sweat Stain, No More Stinky Smell

One of the most annoying issues with regular armbands is the sweat problem. After short usage, the regular armband would be stained heavily by the sweat, which may also damage the smartphone in the pocket.  Lock&Go is made of silicone and plastic, you can clean it easily with water and dry it up in a minute after running or working out. Also the plastic holding slot perfectly separates your phone from sweaty arm.

Elastic Key Slot

The elastic silicone key slot, designed to accommodate most keys.

 

How to Install Lock&Go

It is so easy to set up Lock&Go armband.please watch this tutorial video 

 
Set Up in A Minitue
 
We understand the most important part about the crowdfunding is about sharing, so please simply click the icon below and share Lock&Go with the people around you!! Thank YOU! 
 
             
 

MOVKIN is a young company with multinational employees. We are specialize in making the most innovative cell phone accessories. 

Also, we are partner with the iSpin team, who have just finished its Indiegogo campaign and the feedback from backers are excellent. With iSpin's help, we will have a very smooth campaign in making the product, shipping the product and after-sale service. Check out iSpin Spinner campaign below:

 

 

sales@movkin.com

 

 

1, What is Lock&Go armband made of?                                                                                   

Lock&Go’s band is made of silicone which is elastic and eco-friendly. The slot is made of plastic and magnet.

2, Will the phone drop from the magnet slot?

No, it will definitely not. We have rigorously field tested the strength, the phone will be firmly locked by both the slot and magnet.

3, What kind of phone case does the magnet slot piece support?

The magnet slot piece support many kinds of phone case, including plastic case, TPU soft case, metal case, leather case etc.

4, When can I have the order after the campaign?

We will ship out all the orders to backers around the end of June. 

5, How can I be reseller of Lock&Go?

You can simply back one of our wholesale perks or send email to sales@movkin.com, then let us know what colors of Lock&Go you need. 

Last But Not Least!!

We understand the most important part about the crowdfunding is about sharing, so please simply click the icon below and share Lock&Go with the people around you!!  Thanks for all your supports!!

story:
Many people visit clinics every year while paying a lot of money to ease their sleep problems. The cost per session can range from $100 to $1000.  

In fact, according to statistics, more than 7 million Americans are suffering from insomnia and other sleep-related problems.

The after effects of these problems can vary from stress, lowered concentration, a weakened immune system, and bad skin.

The number of those who are suffering from sleepless nights continues to increase annually, and of course, they want to solve this life-debilitating problem, and we want to help them.

Introducing the Sleep I Mask

It's difficult to change your busy lifestyle. A lot of us like to stay up late, but then we still want a full night’s rest.

Sleep I Mask is designed for at-home use, so it is compact and portable. It’s an amazing device that helps provide a high quality night’s sleep and body conditioning any place, anytime.

Not only that, it helps frequent flyers who suffer from jet-lag to overcome their sleepiness. Basically, the Sleep I Mask can help anyone who's sleep deprived.

Enjoy a better life with Sleep I Mask, which is powered by CES technology. It will give you a higher quality of life!

The state-of-the-art CES technology produces sleep-triggering hormones and maximizes your sleeping condition.

At the same time, it diminishes the amount of cortisol, which, in turn, reduces stress and improves your immune system.

The impact of CES technology has been examined in many theses and the FDA approved it to be safe and an effective stimulation for cranial use.

.

It's time to go to bed

Sleep deprivation is one of the biggest problems that people are experiencing today.

It can be difficult to fall asleep after a long and stressful day. Although we eventually sleep, it’s not the good ol’ deep sleep that we need. And the vicious cycle repeats!

Serotonin is one of the neurotransmitters in the brain. This hormone provides a sense of stability, psychological satisfaction, and happiness.

It transforms into melatonin at night, controlling our daily rhythm to keep us healthy by producing enough sleep hormones which make us experience REM in the deep levels of sleep.

 

No more stress

After surveying 3,000 Americans, 65% of them said they are stressed out and 70% of them have reported that their stress is caused by economic and daily life crises due to COVID-19.

Sleep I Mask reduces cortisol production by stimulating the cerebral nerves through CES technology, which is proven to lower stress levels.

Don't wait, please start body conditioning today!

 

Let's focus!

Sleeping problems exacerbate concentration and work inefficiency. Sleep I Mask helps you get a full night’s rest, which in so doing, improves your power of concentration.

It’s great for athletes and students as it accelerates performance in the field of study or sport!

We sincerely guarantee that your life will never be the same with the Sleep I Mask.

 

Strengthen your immune system

Do you get tired easily? Do you experience fatigue? Then you need to experience the power of deep sleep.

Deep sleep doesn’t work only for sleep problems like insomnia.

It increases helper T cells and NK cells which are immunocytes.

As a result, a full night's rest helps with high blood pressure and cardiac disorders caused by insomnia, and at the same time, it improves your immune system.

 

You can't miss this too!

Have you ever experienced skin breakouts due to lack of sleep? Now you can take control of your breakouts!

It is unavoidable. You will have a decrease in collagen and moisture if you do not get enough sleep.

Sleep I Mask, which uses CES technology, sends micro-currents into the cells to activate protein synthesis. It also increases oxygen transmission by a rate of 40%.

Recover your skin's health through fluent protein synthesis and moisturize your skin with a healthy amount of oxygen transmission.

 

Anytime, anywhere

Sleep I Mask is small and portable, so it's great for at-home use or for on the go! You can just wear it while you're watching TV, washing dishes, or even when you're sitting on the couch, doing nothing.

Do you go on a lot of business trips and need to adapt to the time difference? Or are you too sensitive to escape your own bed?

Do not hesitate to take the Sleep I Mask wherever you go because it is compact and handy but still powerful enough to help you overcome the effects of jet-lag

All you need to do is just bring it along and wear it. You'll find yourself feeling refreshed and rejuvenated the next day.

 

CES (Cranial Electric Stimulation) is a type of brain stimulation. This brain electro-stimulation changes the functions of your cranial nervous system by using the same amount of energy that is used in electric or magnetic fields. 

This stimulation leads to changes in brainwaves and the amount of hormones produced.

CES transmits weak alternating currents destined for the brain passing through electrodes situated in the ear canal, maxillary larynx junction, mastoid, and temple. Next, CES affects the brain synapse hormone production by participating in the limbic system, reticular activating system, and hypothalamus.

It is observed that the amount of brain synapse hormones such as serotonin, beta-endorphin, and melatonin increases after CES therapy.

These hormones are deeply connected with the ability to control emotion and sleeping problems, and it is proven to be effective for sleeping difficulties, especially when the amount of serotonin and melatonin increases.

Aside from this astonishing impact, CES reduces existing cortisol in the blood and positively changes the brainwaves.

Two electric poles are used to send electric stimuli to your brain which produce melatonin and serotonin; these help you to fall asleep. (Gilla, 2004)

This electricity is harmless and is already naturally produced by the brain. It also reduces cortisol levels which means less stress. This helps improve your immune system which can, in turn, prevent other illnesses.

The credibility of CES is validated through the change of cranial nerves confirmed by f-MRIs.

CES technology is clinically proven and approved by the FDA.

 

* Power Button

Every time you press the switch in the middle, the power will be either green (ON) or red (OFF). If it is on, the lights flash 5 times each and it will automatically turn off after 30 minutes.

 

* Charging Mode (charge cable: connector 'C Type')

 If the charger is connected, the LED turns red, and when fully charged, it turns green. If the battery is low, the red LED will flash. We recommend charging the device two times a week for three hours.

* How to Wear a Sleep I Mask

 Please place the device on your forehead and temples as shown in the picture.

* How to Determine When to Charge

If the device does not turn on, or the LED continues to flash, even if you did not use it, you will need to charge it.

 

 

With 10 years of experience in producing medical equipment such as CT and MRI machines and the commercialization of mobile health care products, we were able to develop this sleep-improvement gadget.

Since 2014, we have achieved our goal of finding the most effective algorithm for sleep. We tested 100 people who have sleeping problems and we started our clinical investigation.

We are on the IRB clinical demonstration in cooperation with leading hospitals and we proved that our product improved the quality of sleep for those who have trouble sleeping by 30%.

We are currently field testing our products as a stress-relieving service for those who are working in special services and fields, such as firemen, police officers, military personnel, etc.

We’ve prototyped our product three times since 2019 for the best quality possible. We are doing our best to finalize the production.

 

 

 

 

 

This campaign is powered by FUNDINGINSIDER. Prepare your campaign's consulting, video production, and general marketing with us.

story:
Hallo Ihr Lieben, 

ich bin Shlomo, ich bin noch voll jung. Am 01.03. werde ich stolze 3 Jahre :-) - Ich spiele liebend gerne mit anderen Hunden, ärgere mein Frauchen oder suche wie ein kleines Trüffelschwein nach liegengebliebenden Brötchen in der Nordstadt in Dortmund. Oder schmusen, schmusen ist das schönste auf der Welt.

Leider humpel ich seit September und darf daher zur Zeit nichts von dem Dingen, die mir eigentlich soviel Spaß bringen. Mein Frauchen war mit mir schon bei etlichen Ärzten, ich bekam Physik und Akupunktur, leider hilf nichts :( Jetzt wurde ein CT gemacht und festgestellt das ich eine chronische Verkalkung am Ellenbogen habe, diese nur mit einer OP erstmal beseitigt werden kann. 

Leider greift meine Versicherung nicht in diesem Fall und ich möchte gerne mein Frauchen unterstützen und würde mich daher freuen wenn Du mir etwas spendest, damit ich es dann meinem Frauchen geben kann.

Grüße und feuchte Küsse, 

Euer Herr Shlomo Goldmünz <3

story:
The world is changing and we have to start adapting to a new, more germ-conscious way of living. Whether you're using elevator buttons, ATM machines, or simply pulling open doors, you're more likely to contact bacteria and viruses since these are all shared surfaces. 

 

Introducing Shield20

The gadget that will change the way you use shared surfaces. Shield20 is made from a solid piece of brass which is inherently antimicrobial, to help decrease the spreading of germs while performing some of your everyday tasks. In addition to its compact and versatile design Shield is the first product in the market that offers double protection which is an individual case, in order to avoid contact with other surfaces after using it. And the inside part is made from cotton to spray it with sterilizer and keep your Shield20 sterilized inside the case to not transform the bacterias.

Did you Know:

The typical office worker comes in to contact with 10 million bacteria per day.  Doorknob for example, is not only touched by a large number of people, making the virus or bacteria transmission even easier, but also can keep up to 5 days.

Scary, right?

What if you can open the doors, turn on the light, use the elevator and ATM, and do even more things without touching them directly?

The amount of germs on the average elevator button is  40 times more than that of a public toilet, with a massive 313 “colony-forming units” on a single square centimeter.

The sink may actually be the dirtiest place you ever use. There are typically 600.000 bacterias per square inch. The lifespan of COVID-19 on sinks is 2 to 3 days.

ATM buttons are hotbeds for two types of bacteria called bacillus and pseudomonas, which are known to cause gastrointestinal diseases and diarrhea.     

What’s more? The keyring offers a number of options to keep Shield 20 conveniently near you at all times. Attach it to your backpack, bag, belt, keys, or wallet and you are ready to go.

Being made of brass and located in its individual leather case Shield20 makes it easier to perform a number of actions without direct hand contact

With a goal to avoid virus transmission and preserve health, thoroughly designed Shield 20 is developed and ready to be introduced to the public

 

Risks & Challenges

We know exactly what we need to get this project across the finish line. The only thing we lack is funding. We don’t foresee any other major risks referring to the production after reaching our goal.

Although Shield20 is production-ready, the COVID-19 crisis is still going on. In these turbulent times a lot of factories are closed in many countries. Fortunately, we have managed to make arrangements with a few suppliers, who are ready to provide us with all the materials necessary to start the production of Shield 20 after the end of the campaign.

We highly appreciate your support, as due to it we will be able to create a safer world.

story:
Basecamp Queen West

Earlier this year we announced we would be opening our second location, Basecamp Queen West. The goal of opening this year is very much alive, although somewhat at peril as we collectively face the ongoing economic fall-out of COVID-19. Right now, more than ever, we need your support in making this a reality. Buy a membership today and you'll receive a bunch of exclusive perks as a way to thank you for your support. 

  • Everyone who purchases a membership before Basecamp Queen West opens will get an invite to our Grand Opening Party
  • You will also receive exclusive pre-opening access to Basecamp Queen West, before the public
  • Anyone who purchases a 2-year Membership will get all of these perks DOUBLED!!! Yep, that's right: 2 x tickets to the Grand Opening Party, exclusive early access for 2 people...and x2 free day passes per month, for two whole years!!!
  • ANYONE who purchases an item of support will be entered into a draw to win a bike from Curbside Cycle!!!!

All of this support is truly, genuinely appreciated and makes a significant difference to our prospects during this challenging time.

A little bit of support goes a long way

As everyone knows, there are many things that need to happen for a climbing gym to successfully open but with most businesses closed or operating at minimum capacities, finishing our facility is much more of a challenge now. On top of that, our first location on Bloor West is also closed, meaning we have no income and no means for offering direct membership sales to our customers.

Despite these challenges, we know we can get our doors open, even if it means taking on the work ourselves.  Basecamp is still committed to offering the same quality of experience we have always prided ourselves on and with your support, we will continue to be able to do so when we open.

By purchasing your membership early you will be helping to support bringing staff back onto the payroll, making the possibility of opening sooner just that much more tangible.

By purchasing your membership early you will be helping to support bringing staff back onto the payroll, making the possibility of opening sooner just that much more tangible.

story:
About my involvement with Kendo

I began Kendo, the way of the sword, in Toronto, Canada at the JCCC - the Japanese Canadian Cultural Centre - when I was around 20 years old. I practised back then for about four years and then stopped for another five or so years before coming back to it again. Now 61, Kendo continues to be a major part of my life and, in many ways, defines it. I love Kendo.

I now live in Thailand in a small forested village in the mountains that lie to the east of Chiang Mai in the north of the country. I practise at a dojo called Lanna Kendo in Chiang Mai. Lanna Kendo is a part of an orphanage run for many years now by a wonderful Korean charitable organisation and most of those that practise Kendo there are children from the orphanage.  Others outside of the organisation, both Thai and foreigners, come out to practice now and then as well. For myself, I try to get into the dojo once a week, on Fridays, where I will often lead/teach the session. Anyone, who knows Kendo will also know that this is all about volunteering. I will add a wonderful short article that Rico Kanthatham wrote about Lanna Kendo at the bottom of my blurb here. He describes the spirit of the place and people so well.

Teaching Kendo involves much more than simply imparting technical knowledge to the students. It connects with how a person lives a life, how we can build tenacity and strength to prepare for when the hardships of life inevitably arrive upon us. Noguchi Takashi Sensei in the video that I have linked at the bottom of this, says it quite perfectly: “First of all I think that I have to work hard and develop as a person, rather than just telling the students what to do. I believe that I should be working hard to earn the right to teach them." Those words and the other aspects that he talks about in the video truly embodies the spirit of Kendo and is what I try to follow myself. 

Besides all of this, it is simply time for me to challenge myself to the next level, to improve on both a physical level and on the deeper conceptual aspects inherent in the art of Kendo.

In Kendo, there are ten kyu grades  - what in other martial arts are often indicated by coloured belts - and then eight dan grades - again more commonly understood, in other arts, as black belt levels. In Kendo, we wear no visible indication of what our individual level is. This, I like. 

This year, I will be challenging for 4th dan.

The fundraising 

The minimum amount that I'm hoping to raise with this fundraiser, $500 CAD, will cover transportation both to, from and within Bangkok, the grading fees and food. That's about it. I will likely crash at a friend's place so I won't need to raise any funds for accommodation.

All funds raised will go towards the grading in August. 

 

The Impact

As Kendoka, grading is an important aspect of our life in Kendo. It is an essential aspect of our own physical, mental and spiritual development. There is also a kind of continuity to this, being a part of a group, a community, common goals connected with working our way through the levels as years go by.

One could say that, in a wide view, there are three aspects to Kendo practice: regular daily practice/keiko Kendo, competition/shiai Kendo, and grading Kendo. All are important. In each of those aspects, our focus and concentration can demand different elements within it and, as one might expect, all three help build each other.

My own personal improvement that comes with grading is, naturally, good for me, but it is also, I believe, good for the dojo where I practise and the wonderful people there with whom I practise. In Kendo, we are there to help each other and though someone of a higher level may act as leader or teacher, it is also commonly understood that all learn from all, no matter what the level.

Risks & Challenges

Ok, so... Indiegogo suggests talking about risks and challenges. Well, there are definitely challenges, mostly connected with the fact that the higher up one goes in Kendo the more complete and sure one's Kendo must be as well as a deepening understanding of what is called Seme amongst other concepts. 

Because of the increased demands placed upon ourselves as we improve and rise in the ranks, there is also the chance (that would be your ‘risk’ bit)  that I will not pass and will have to try again. Fall down nine times, get up nine times is how that one goes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I hope it goes without saying that donations of any and all amounts will be deeply appreciated and made well use of. If you would like to help in other ways, you could pass this campaign around on social media, let friends know etc. That could help a lot. :-) 

Thanks so much for having a look at this and I truly hope this finds all well and happy.

Additional bits and pieces...

This great video below is about a group of high school students studying Kendo in Japan. Lots here to get a sense of what Kendo is about. The Noguchi Takashi Sensei's words towards the end speak so well about the spirit of Kendo. There is a subtitle button at the bottom of he screen. 

 

...and here is the article about Lanna Kendo by Rico
Lanna Kendo Club By Rico Kanthatham
Lanna Kendo club is located at World cup land, near Grace’s International School. This club belongs to a Korean Orphanage foundation.
The Orphans children practice kendo every week, (Monday, Wednesday and Friday). In Kendo usually, if there is no teacher, the higher grade teach the younger.
The higher student is called “先輩 Senpai” and “後輩Kōhai” for the junior.

The Korean foundation looks after the Orphanage in an amazing way. All children and teenager, go to school and University. Their dormitory has a very warm atmosphere. Although they are learning at school, when they go back to the Orphanage they share the housework, such as cleaning and cooking for all of them, do their homework and they practice kendo.

Volunteers from abroad teach them different topics, like English and Korean languages.
Mr Kwon, the Father who is in charge, allow them to learn the coffee waiter job. They did a coffee house which is called “Tripti Chiangmai ”

The Japanese martial art ‘Kendo’, the way of the sword, is not widely known or well understood by non-Japanese. At least that is what one would think or tend to believe. It does not have the global recognition of ‘Karate’, another of Japan’s martial arts. In comparison to Karate, Kendo does not seem practical in the modern world, as few people walk around with swords or make use of them in daily life.
But in Chiang Mai, Thailand, thousands of kilometers away from Japan, the esoteric martial art of Kendo has become integral to the lives and upbringing of a group of amazing Thai children. At the Grace Home orphanage (Lanna Kendo), a group of 20 or so young boys and girls ranging from about 8 to 18 years of age regularly practice Kendo. Introduced to them by their former headmaster of the orphanage, a Japanese missionary, the Grace Home children have not only embraced but excelled at the martial art. They have not only become proficient at the techniques of kendo, but have also absorbed and exude the spirit of Kendo. I have had the privilege to practice Kendo with these children several times over the past few years. I have seen them grow and get strong, honing not only their technique but also their character. At the end of every practice session at the Lanna Kendo Club, the name they have given themselves, I always leave exhausted, exhilarated and inspired.

From these children, I have learned that the Kendo does have relevance in the modern world, that it more than a Japanese martial art. Kendo is relevant in modern society not because it provides the practitioner with physical exercise and sword fighting skills, but because it provides the practitioner with the means to refine one’s character. Kendo is difficult, physically demanding and can sometimes be painful. To succeed and progress, the practitioner must persist, endure and seek to improve. And as a full-contact, full-speed martial art that can only be effectively learned through matches with sparring partners, the practitioner must not only how to win while suppressing ego but lose with gratitude. Maintaining a friendly, supportive atmosphere within the practice hall, the dojo, is vital. Decorum, respect for others and self-discipline as also required characteristics of a Kendo practitioner. Kendo, therefore, not only teaches fighting skills but also life skills.
In many ways, the Grace Home children are no different than any other kids their age. They laugh and play and have the youthful energy of any child or teenager. But when one sees these same children in their Kendo gear and practising, it becomes clear that they possess something their peers do not have. In the dojo, they show a level of self-discipline and focus, a maturity and refinement of character that is beyond their years. I would like to believe that it was Kendo that is honing them to be such fine young adults. I very much look forward to the next time I am in Chiang Mai, in my Kendo gear, ready to receive another life lesson at the Lanna Kendo Club.

story:
Introducing the Tidy Tool PRO – the next generation, contact-free gadget that acts as a frontline barrier between you and germs.

 

Seemingly overnight, we’ve all become germaphobes. 

  • Our hands are cracked and dry from the constant hand washing
  • We’re obsessively squirting hand-sanitizer on our hands every 3 minutes (while panicking that our supply is dwindling fast and we know we’d have better chances of winning the lottery than scoring a new bottle right now)
  • We’re practically bathing in Lysol, and all our surfaces are slightly wet and sticky with an ever-present disinfectant dew

People everywhere are doing everything they can to stop the spread of germs. But the best way to stop the spread is to avoid germs in the first place.

Enter The Tidy Tool PRO.

 

 

 

Protect Yourself from Germs Now

Now more than ever, you probably realize just how much stuff you touch every day. Imagine being able to carry out your everyday activities without having to touch the surfaces that thousands of other people could have touched before you. With the Tidy Tool PRO, you can! Give yourself peace of mind and freedom from germs today.

With this self-sterilizing, everyday carry retractable hook, you can avoid contact with germs when you’re out in public. Whether you’re picking up some elusive toilet paper or on your way to your essential job, you can use the Tidy Tool PRO to reduce your physical contact and add peace of mind.

 

 

----PLUS----

  • Carry heavy loads
  • Grab products
  • Hold bags
  • Open packages
  • And so much more

 

Why the Tidy Tool?

 

Convenient retractable hook design keeps you safe from germs

 

The Tidy Tool PRO is the perfect combination of function and elegance. Each Aluminum or Brass handle holds a retractable brass hook with a smooth opening and closing action, so after you’ve opened a door or picked up a box, it’ll be retracted back into the handle and automatically enclosed so you don’t have to worry about cross-contamination. In fact, once the Tidy Tool PRO is closed, it's impossible to make skin contact with the contaminated surface.

 

Magnetic Latching

The Tidy Tool PRO uses magnets to lock the door and act as a detent to hold the hook in the extended position. Check out this video below that shows the magnet function.

de·tent: a catch in a machine which prevents motion until released.

 

 

Contact surfaces made from self-sterilizing 360 brass

The Tidy Tool PRO’s contact surfaces are made from 360 brass, which is known to have self-sterilizing properties. According to a new study from the New England Journal of Medicine, the Coronavirus can only live on copper for around 4 hours. 360 brass is a copper alloy that contains 60% copper. 360 brass is regisistered with the EPA as an anti-microbial material.

 

Proudly made right here in the US

 

 

We know how important it is to know where your products come from. The Tidy Tool PRO is proudly designed, created, and shipped from right here in the USA (Tennessee, to be exact).

 

Strong enough to lift over 50 pounds

Carry in groceries without killing your wrists when you use the Tidy Tool PRO. It can easily lift over 50 pounds.

 

Conveniently clips to your keychain so you can take it with you everywhere

 

 

Clip it to your key chain and take it with you wherever you go so you never have to touch germy, contaminated surfaces with your fingers again.

 

About the Creator

I have been in the field of mechanical engineering and manufacturing for 10 years, and this is my opportunity to give the world something that can truly be useful in their day to day activities.  I trust the Tidy Tool PRO with my family, and I hope you will trust it with yours.  If you help support my project, we will hopefully be avoiding germs together.

story:
Our Story

Every 18 seconds, an older adult is treated in an emergency room for a fall, and every 35 minutes a senior dies from a fall related accident. One of every three people aged 65 and older falls each year, despite the fact, that research shows most falls are preventable.

Move With Balance is a distinct creation of uniquely refined exercise and activities combining Brain Gym®, vision exercises and integrative movements to improve focused attention, full body coordination and balance. This award-winning fall prevention program has been developed over the past six years and has proven to be effective.

 

The Impact

After seeing positive results from over 1,200 senior citizens in our community, we have decided to replicate this program so seniors around the world can also use these techniques to enhance their cognitive skills and reduce the risk of falling in their own communities. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Move With Balance has started creating the replication kit that will be available at a low cost to senior centers, senior caregivers and all seniors interested in improving their balance and well-being.

We have put together a $24,300 budget to get the first 24 prototype kits made. We are a non-profit 501c3 and need to raise this capital in order to get this project rolling.  All donations are tax deductible and any donation of $100 or more will get you a 50% discount on a kit when they are available.

We are dedicated to making this happen, the sooner the better for our senior population. Your donation will be greatly appreciated, not only by us, but also by the unlimited number of seniors that will benefit.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell others about our project through your email lists, Facebook, community groups and your families. Every dollar will helps gets us closer to making Move With Balance available. All of us either have parents or grandparents that are seniors, or maybe some of us are seniors ourselves, and could benefit from this training, please bookmark our website http://movewithbalance.org/ so we can all take advantage of this program as soon as it is available. Thanks for your help.

story:
SUMMARY:

My mom is an immensely strong and brave individual. She suffers from a rare neurological disorder called Reflux Sympathic Dystrophy, or RSD which causes her body to have a chronic burning fire sensation.

 

Her symptoms include:

  • The feeling of constant burning alive in the entire body
  • Shooting pains that attack her heart & brain
  • The sensation of razors slitting her heels
  • The feeling of stepping on crushed glass in her feet
  • Pain swarming through her head and ears.
  • Stabbing pain in her chest
  • Extreme immobility
  • Severe pressurized pain in her heart that is identical to the pain from a massive heart attack but stems from her nerve damage
  • Stabbing pain in her eyes

Can you imagine?

  • Your bed sheet hitting your leg causing you to cry out in pain in the middle of the night?
  • Having the sensation of a knife slicing through your body, even when your laying still?
  • Feeling like someone is breaking your toes off when you walk?
  • Severe pain in your throat when you swallow food or drinks?
  • Having pain from water in the shower, or the wind on your skin?
  • Being unable to be touched or hugged by your husband or your child?

This is an everyday reality than my mother has been enduring for the better part of her life.

 

Living with RSD: A Prisoner In My Own Skin..

When my mom was 16 she was trapped in the basement when a fire broke out. Gathering strength, she walked up the stairs, here bare feet began melting into each step. She sustained 3rd degree burns over 45 percent of her body and underwent multiple skin grafts while conscious where her skin was literally ripped from her tissues to prevent infection multiple times per for a three month duration. Even after the horrors of the burn unit, it would not compare to the many years of living with RSD.

As the years progressed, so did the pain. Every year she faced increasing pain that further disrupted her daily life. It started off only allowing her the use of her feet for limited hours during the day.  My mother was a meticulous and caring housewife who loved every minute of taking care of her family. She made dinner every night, picked us up from school, and participated in all of our extra-curricular activities when her RSD was in its beginning stages. Only later in my life did I learn that it was all at a cost. She would often crawl up the stairs to her bedroom just from standing at the stove and making us dinner. In 2003, her RSD progressed after breaking part of her foot.  She stopped making dinner. We began walking home from school. She could no longer take us to the zoo or to the park. She stopped attending church. She stopped her passion of gardening. If she did any of these things she would pay for it dearly.

Right now her body is internally engulfed in flames. Her body literally feels like it is on fire. There is not one second of the day that she is not experiencing pain. For a woman who has had such a traumatic life and chronic pain from the age of 16 to 50, she is in desperate need of relief. Please help us "put the fire out".

RSD is also known as "the suicide disease" because the pain is so severe that patients feel they have no way out. Because of her hopelessness and torture my mom has actively considered this option. For those who do not personally know the horrors of RSD, this may seem extreme. As a daughter who has lived with and cared for an RSD victim in such despair, I can almost understand this drastic measure. Help my mom so that she has the option of life.

 

No Help?...

We have been through several pain management doctors, neurologists, and the Chronic Pain Program at the Cleveland Clinic,  who have not been willing to help my mom. Many physicians beleive that RSD is "in your head" which makes treatment for this RARE condition all that much harder. Researchers of RSD have concluded otherwise stating that patients should be medicated and treated for their respective symptoms. She has also had nerve blocks and steroid injections that quit having an effect on her about six years ago.

In addition to the financial strain of $300,000 in medical bills, our house is in the final stages of foreclosure which makes our struggle all the more difficult.

 

A Caring Heart...

My mom is one of the most selfless people I have ever met. She has always been there to care for those in need including three years spent with her mother, a stage-3 cancer patient, all while raising toddlers. When her father-in-law experienced a heart attack she drove to New York to pick him up and bring him to our home where she took care of him for almost 2 years. She was a mentor to children in need at our Elementary School and served as a Cooperative Team Parent, getting awards for her services. She even served the elderly neighbors in our community. All in all, she is the type of person that has spent her life caring for everyone else but herself.

 

Ketamine Infusion : A chance at Life...

My mom has been accepted for a 3 month Ketamine Infusion in New Jersey under Dr. Getson. This procedure will help to reset her nervous system. The Ketamine will essentially block the pain from entering her nerves in hopes of allowing her nervous system to "reset" and function properly.

The biggest problem is that the Ketamine treatment is not covered by insurance because it is considered to be experimental.

The infusion protocol is as follows:

  • 4 hours a day, 5 days a week for 2 weeks.
  • 4 hours a day, 2 days a week for 4 weeks.
  • 4 hours a day, 1 day a week for 4 weeks.
  • 4 hours a day, 1 day every other week for 4 weeks.

The total cost of the treatment for the three month duration is $50,000 dollars + Tax totaling $54,500. This does not include hotel, traveling, or food for myself and my mom. After the initial 3 month treatment, we will still need to go back to New Jersey for $1,500 - $1,800 booster treatments throughout my mother’s life. There is also a 4% fee taken from all donations for indiegogo.

 

What you could do...

I want to thank you for taking the time to read about my mothers battle with RSD. The Ketamine Treatment is the only hope for my mothers future. Her life depends on your generosity which can be as little as a $5 donation. As I have said the total cost is roughly $55,000 for the treatment plus the additional cost of boosters. It's sad that my mothers very life rests on money but is the reality of the situation. I hope that this story touches your heart, I know that every donation will touch mine.

 

Donations Can Be Made:

Through Paypal on Indiegogo

or At Fifth Third Bank or ANY bank under the name of Ashley Dissell for the benefit of Lorraine Dissell. 

Account Number: 9978381243
Routing Number: 041002711

 

 

A note from Ashley...

As her daughter, I have watched the horror thas has become her life. It has affected our family to its core. We have not able to experience "normal" family life from my earliest memory. She can't embrace her grandchild, or take him to the park. She missed my prom and graduation because she could not handle the pain it took to get out of bed. She can no longer wear most clothing because contact with her skin sets of the burning. She can't walk to the bathroom unassisted, or bathe herself alone. I  watch her struggle to drink a cup of tea, and it hurts my heart. I pray that my mother will be fortunate enough to recieve this treatment so that she can be around to see my wedding, and be there when I have my first child, but mostly so that she can have a chance at life, something she has never had. She has always been their for all of us in our hour of need, and it is my turn to be there for her.

 

Thank you again! I love you all!
story_txt:

story:
There has already been one miracle, now let’s make another one happen for Rick and Debbie.

Rick and Debbie are my sister and brother in law.  I am trying to raise money for them to help pay Rick's medical bills and help ease the financial burden this has placed on the family.

Rick and Debbie first met 30 years ago.  They met again just over a year ago and were married June 3, 2011.  Both said they had never been happier in their life and you could see the love between them. 

Sounds like a fairy tale love story right?  It was until Sunday April 1, when Rick complained of not being able to move his legs. They went to the emergency room and Rick was immediately admitted.  The next morning he underwent surgery for blood clots in his legs.  I received a call from Debbie letting me know Rick was in surgery.  She was crying and told me “I finally found the love of my life and I’m so afraid I’m going to lose him”.  The next day things were much brighter.  Rick had undergone four surgeries to remove the clots and would be released from the hospital the next morning. 

As Debbie prepared for his dismissal, Rick started talking gibberish and flaying around in the bed.  While the nurses were trying to settle Rick down, he turned blue in the face and fell back.  They immediately started CPR.  Rick had suffered a stroke.  There was bleeding in the brain near the stem cell which was inoperable.  He was taken into surgery again to drain the fluid and blood building around the brain and was put in ICU on life support and a medically induced coma.  He had several more surgeries that April, inserting the shunt, inserting and then removing the feeding tube, reinserting a permanent shunt for brain drainage.  He then developed clots in his arm and leg.  Blood thinners thinned his blood too much and doing nothing produced more clots.  They were working on finding a happy medium. 

Rick was in a coma for much of his hospital stay so was unaware of everything happening to and around him.  Debbie stayed by his side leaving the hospital only 2 nights in the 2 ½ months following his initial visit to the emergency room that Sunday in April.  Co-workers donated some of their vacation time and Debbie took all of her vacation time but still it wasn’t enough for his lengthy stay.  So, she would leave the hospital go to work, come back at lunch and then return after her workday to be by his side. 

 Rick and Debbie celebrated their first wedding anniversary in the hospital.  On June 16, Rick was finally able to return home!  He doesn’t remember anything about the hospital stay.  He has trouble walking without help, has problems with dizziness due to the stroke and has a permanent shunt in his brain to continue draining the fluid. He is now doing out-patient therapy.  

 Because Rick was a massage therapist he has been unable to return to work.  His arms and hands aren’t strong enough now and the dizziness is doubled trying to move around the table.  They are completely relying on Debbie’s small income.

 Please help give Rick and Debbie’s love story a happy ending by contributing to help pay the enormous medical bills and Rick’s continued care.

I understand times are difficult for everyone now  but I ask that you  contribute whatever you can.  No amount is too small.

 Thank you for your generosity and support.  Together we can make another miracle happen!

story:
Ginny’s Story

After a series of health issues over the years, numerous doctor visits, all kinds of diagnoses culminating in meningitis in 2009, a fast progression downhill lead me to be tested for Lyme disease.  My blood tests came back ragingly positive across the board. I was diagnosed with Chronic Lyme disease and its co-infections in October of 2011

After 6 months of standard oral antibiotic treatment I went to DC in March to investigate further with a specialist in Washington DC. I felt like I was slipping.  New symptoms were happening.  Seizures, legs giving out, periods of total dementia, dropping anything from my coffee to jars of food to my hands and fingers going numb, insomnia, violent mood swings and rages, deep depression, hallucinations, memory loss, both short term and long term.  There are entire periods of my life I cannot remember.  Stuttering, speech loss, the list goes on.  

The results showed I am in the late stages of Neurological Lyme Disease.  My particular case involves manifestations of the brain, central nervous system and possibly kidneys and digestive system.  My immune system is completely gone.  I may have this for the rest of my life but I am fighting for total eradication of the parasite of possible.   Lyme Disease is deadly, it invades and destroys all facets of the human body until if untreated it can kill you.

Extensive long-term I.V. therapy treatments are required for me.  While working with the specialist in DC he found that I also have a gene disorder: MTHFR C677t:  http://mthfr.net with my particular strand I cannot process foliate or b vitamins which are needed in many cases to help absorb oral antibiotics into the cells and into the bloodstream.

Therefore, Oral medication protocol will not work at eradicating or even keeping parts of the infection at bay.

I have been working with neurologists and neurospych specialists locally.  Tests show (per the specialists) that I am presenting with "long term effects of an invasive infectious disease".  My I.Q. has dropped; my mental and occupational processing skills have been reduced (so far) from that of of a 38 year old by 49% (I don't know what age range that is).  My eyes do not dilate. I don't recognize certain shapes and have become "temporarily dyslexic".

IV Protocol is more expensive, however it is the only way I can beat this and survive.  I can only get the stronger IV protocol with my D.C. specialist.  I have gone as far as I can with my local doctor. Otherwise I am facing a slow and steady deterioration more than likely towards a terminal outcome since this is chewing away at my brain and my Central Nervous System.

Insurance is supposed to cover 28 days of Lyme treatment.  We have received nothing but denials.  So far we have had 2 appeals denied.  So in fact, insurance has covered nothing.

What Your Contribution Provides

Your contribution provides the following:

Money for the stronger I.V. antibiotic treatment

Travel to and from DC for regular check-up appointments

Accommodations and food in DC during regular check ups

Supplies to administer the IV antibiotics

Help towards existing mounting medical bills due to insurance denying coverage

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help financially, you can spread the word!  This is not only my fight, people need to know what the insurance industries are doing, or not doing, with a disease that is so deadly.  Every penny counts, but so does getting the word out!!

I am looking at this as a fresh start to life, if all goes well, not a personal tragedy.  There are lessons to be learned from this, some of them have been hard, but I am taking this journey with the hope that I learn and gain the experience I am supposed to, and rise from it so I can help others once I am better.  That is why even if you cannot contribute, please pass this forward.

Thank you!

Ginny
