story:
who are we

My name is Elizabeth Heller and I am the Manager of my fiancee Lawrence Hardesty.  Lawrence has a life long dream of being a motocross racer and up until recently thought his age was a factor and that he would not be able to accomplish this dream.  With support and encouragement from myself and family, we began this journey together.  

our story

We have purchased most of his gear and all that is needed is two major protectors for his safety.  The body armor and the neck protector.  In September 2012 we ordered his first bike, which is an Apollo125cc.  We thought it was going to be a full-size bike but found out upon delivery and hours of assembly that it is infact a pit-bike. Upon calling the sales person that handled our order we found out that there was no way they would take this bike back. All sales final. EVEN after the fact that we specifically told them what we needed this bike for and Lawrences height and weight, we were told this was the perfect beginner bike for someone starting out in racing. Dont get us wrong, Lawrence does love this bike and had decided to participate in mini motos until we could come up with the funds for a full-size bike. However, we have recently found out that on the east coast there is no specific classes for pit-bikes. According to the AMA (American Motorcyclists Association), promoters do hold pit-bike races but there is not many that are held in New York State or on the East Coast.  Pit-bike racing is major on the West Coast. We also found out that he can race in the over 30 class on AMA sponsored tracks, but he would be at a great disadvantage. With me being on SSD and him on SSI any extra income to front for expenses has been very difficult. We can afford to make payments on a bike but cannot find anyone to finance us due to past credit history problems. 

with determination we were led here

It saddens me to watch my husband-to-be deal with constant frustration and let down and almost giving up on his dreams because of a sales person more focused on the sale then actually providing the consumer what they were in specific search for. His determination and passion for Motocross racing is very inspiring.  He means the world to me and I will do all I can do to help him succeed in this endeavor.  Nothing will stop us, I wont allow it. An aquaintence of mine through facebook steered me in the direction of this site for help in raising the money for what is needed to get this talented, dedicated racer off his feet and to the starting gate.

what we need and why

In the photos you will see the logo i personally designed for Lawrence for the racing team that we created for him to race under as a privateer racer to start out.We are trying to raise $4000 dollars to help offset cost for the rest of his protective gear and a fullsize bike.  Any funds raised over $4000 will help offset travel expenses for the races and any entry fees associated with the events. We have offered a wide-range of perks for you to choose from and are very excited about this campaign. If anyone is unable to help support this campaign, we ask that you share it with your friends, families, neighbors, employers or anyone else you can think of that might be willing to help.  We appreciate any and all support that is able to be given.

However, we have recently found out that on the east coast there is no specific classes for pit-bikes. According to the AMA (American Motorcyclists Association), promoters do hold pit-bike races but there is not many that are held in New York State or on the East Coast.  Pit-bike racing is major on the West Coast. We also found out that he can race in the over 30 class on AMA sponsored tracks, but he would be at a great disadvantage. With me being on SSD and him on SSI any extra income to front for expenses has been very difficult. We can afford to make payments on a bike but cannot find anyone to finance us due to past credit history problems. 
with determination we were led here
It saddens me to watch my husband-to-be deal with constant frustration and let down and almost giving up on his dreams because of a sales person more focused on the sale then actually providing the consumer what they were in specific search for. His determination and passion for Motocross racing is very inspiring.  He means the world to me and I will do all I can do to help him succeed in this endeavor.  Nothing will stop us, I wont allow it. An aquaintence of mine through facebook steered me in the direction of this site for help in raising the money for what is needed to get this talented, dedicated racer off his feet and to the starting gate.
what we need and why
In the photos you will see the logo i personally designed for Lawrence for the racing team that we created for him to race under as a privateer racer to start out.We are trying to raise $4000 dollars to help offset cost for the rest of his protective gear and a fullsize bike.  Any funds raised over $4000 will help offset travel expenses for the races and any entry fees associated with the events. We have offered a wide-range of perks for you to choose from and are very excited about this campaign. If anyone is unable to help support this campaign, we ask that you share it with your friends, families, neighbors, employers or anyone else you can think of that might be willing to help.  We appreciate any and all support that is able to be given.

story:
Finally! The worlds first compact, lightweight and easy to use temporary floatation device available at wholesale!

Floatm8 has designed this very cool and trendy patented temporary floatation device.  One of the many advantage’s with Floatm8 is that you can take Floatm8 anywhere with you, to the beach, on a boat, surfing, canoeing, rockfishing, paddle boarding, swimming, fishing, camping or any other water activity or water sport where there is a element of risk.

Floatm8 is a specifically designed personal floatation device that is worn around the waist. The activation unit containing the miniature gas cylinder with the inflatable bladder is attached to a elastic lanyard which can be moved around the waist providing unobtrusive use in most water based activities.

Activation

Activating Floatm8 is a simple process:

1. Grasp the unit around the waist.

2. Press the firing button on top of the unit which releases the inert gas,

3. In 10-15 seconds the wearer has instant floatation.

This will allow the wearer to be either rescued or move into calmer water conditions. It's that simple!

 

Floatm8 is a single use, gas driven temporary floatation device. It is sleek in design, lightweight, compact and easy to use. 

Worn Comfortably at the back.

or on the side

 

When Floatm8 is activated the bladder is inflated to the aproxamate size of a soccor ball which is an ideal size to sustain buyoncey. The wearer can then put their arms around the bladder, this will allow better stability in the water and give the wearer a feeling of calmness until being assisted or moving into calmer waters.

Once used Floatm8 can be easily removed from around the waist, Pop the bladder and simply dispose of accordingly.

       

We conducted trials with the Australian Surf Life Saving Association and we were able to test and prove that Floatm8 was able to maintain the buoyancy of a test person weighing over 220 lbs (100 Kgs) which was a great result for us. 

 

 ****We believe anyone taking part in any water activity where there is an element of risk should be wearing Floatm8.**** 

What also gives Floatm8 the leading edge in temporary floatation devices is that there is nothing in the global market place today that is comparative in design and affordability. 

Check out our website www.floatm8.com

 

Floatm8

  • Lightweight – Floatm8 is exceptionally lightweight  in comparison to other floatation aids. It is so easy to carry around.  When not required the unit can easily be placed in your pocket or in a bag without the weight and balkiness of most other floatation aids available.
  • Compact -Floatm8 is ultra compact in size and weight. It is only 100mil in length 40 Mil in width and approximately 3 Ounces in weight. Keeping Floatm8 compact in size and weight allows any person be able to convieneirntly carry their own temporary floatation device anywhere at anytime.

  • Easy and Simple to Use – In a situation where Floatm8 is required, the wearer grabs the Floatm8 unit from around their waste, Grasp's the device and press's the firing button. Once activated , this will release the inert gas and inflate the bladder in front of the wearer which will then provide instant floatation. It's that Easy and simple to use.
  • Comfortable To Wear –  The Floatm8 unit is secured to a durable water resistant elastic lanyard that will give the wearer a choice of 3 sizes Small, Medium and Large. This will provide the right comfortable fit. Floatm8 can still be casualy worn around the waist if walking up the beach, On a boat etc..and no buckles to worry about.

  • Choice Of Colours – For those concerned about looking good, Floatm8 is available in a range of of modern and Trendy colors! Choose from our Chrome selection. Currently available is Silver, Black, Pink, Copper Chrome! 
  • Materials - The outer casing of the activation unit is made from a UV protected recyclable plastic and contains the specially designed neoprene latex bladder, ensuring maximum durability during times of storage and usage. The gas unit and activating components are neatly stored in this one compact and stylish unit away from sea air erosion. 

  • Gas - Enviromentally Prefered Inert Gas.

  • Design - Sleek in design, Great range of modern colours. 

  Floatm8 is a supporter of the Australian Surf Life Saving Association

Floatm8 and UAV"S

 

Floatm8 and Unmanned Aircraft (UAV's).- FloatM8 has joined forces with the Australian Surf Life Saving Association and an Aerospace Company in flying unmanned aircraft to monitor unpatrolled beaches.

The Floatm8 device will be attached to the UAV’s as well as outfitted in close offshore rescues with other UAV's such as the Quad Copters. When required the Quad Copters will be deployed from the beach, locate drop the Floatm8 unit from the air into the water to the struggling swimmer.

This unique opportunity gives Floatm8 the chance to help many more people, not just those who have purchased our products. Our number one concern is the safety of those enjoying the water and this partnership will allow us to drastically expand our mission! 

Visit our website to view the full Video on Floatm8 and UAV's.

www.floatm8.com

 

 FloatM8's research and development base.

 

 

This is who we are - 

Floatm8 is an Australian business founded on Queensland’s Gold Coast.

Founders, Jon Hanson and John Pearce saw a need for a compact, lightweight and easy to use floatation device.

Floatm8 is a privately owned business which is now well positioned as a unique developer and innovative product designer in the floatation market. It has always been a focus for us over the past years to develop, test and research the market for a floatation device like Floatm8.

This was done with the specific focus to provide water safety and give consumers the confidence they need being around water.

This has now been achieved and gives Floatm8 the leading edge in temporary floatation!  There is nothing in the global market place today that is comparative in design and affordability. 

We want you to help us make a difference:

Drowning is a major, but often neglected, public safety problem. The United Nations estimate that half a million people world-wide die each year from drowning, which is more than one every minute.

They also place drowning as the second leading cause of death from unintentional injury after road traffic injuries.

Floatm8 can make a huge difference in helping keep people safe around water!

Many drownings can be prevented. Prevention, education and floatation devices are worthwhile investments in saving human lives.  

 

Check out our website www.floatm8.com 

Follow Us On Facebook  www.facebook/Floatm8

 

BE PART OF THIS GREAT CAMPAIGN - Help Us Raise $50,000

We can’t wait to share this campaign with you.

With your support, when you see the Floatm8 units on the shelf of a retail outlet you will have the satisfaction of knowing you helped us make it happen. Your support is essential to us getting Floatm8 out to the public where it should be.

These are very exciting times for Floatm8 especially with our project on Indiegogo.

Each Floatm8 has been discounted just for our campaign backers. Recommended Retail for Floatm8 will be $39.95.

Funds raised will be used in the following ways -

  • Construct new and longer lasting Molds with capacity of 100k Units
  • Re-design of packaging
  • Molds for the packaging
  • Design a safety cap on top of unit to stop accidental firing
  • First Production Run

All perks purchased will be available in your choice of colors.

Get behind us and make it happen!

Perks

$5 - We appreciate Your Help. A Special Shout out on our Friends  Page on www.floatm8.com

 

$25 - Single Pack

 

$45 - 2 Pack 

  

 

$60 - 3 Pack

  

 

$85 - 5 Pack

  

  

 

$150 - 10 Pack

       

       

 

$1000 - Surf Pack - Exclusive and one off. You will receive your very own Short Board Surf Board as displayed in the images, You will also receive 10 FloatM8 units in your choice of colors.    

 

Small Beginnings...

This was our first production line..I suppose you have to start somewhere.

 

   

 

Manufacturing - Once we complete our Indiegogo campaign we will look at commencing production on our first order of Floatm8 units.  The production will initially be conducted in China. We have engaged a successful production factory which will be able initially produce aprox 10,000 units per month, with capacity to deliver up to 100,000 per month.

When the first production run is completed we will immediately ship the Floatm8 units out to our backers and supporters. We anticipate that this manufacturing process should take around 30-35 days from the day we start manufacturing.

Floatm8 will continue to explore and identify opportunities to sell large volume to commercial wholesale retail outlets. These opportunities are dependent on the ability to manufacture the required volume and have the capital to rapidly expand the business.

To achieve this we will engage various channels for distribution. 

These will include:

 • Internet
 • Local, national and international distributors
 • Major retailers in various industry and consumer areas.
 • Large transport organizations – air, sea and aquatic
 • Various media based sales organizations
 • Surf Lifesaving of Australia
  Viral Marketing - 'Please help us spread the word'

Floatm8 is a product that has been well researched and developed by us it has a unique place in the floatation market,  and most importantly will be available to everybody. 

The success of this project will depend heavily on your word of mouth and how the news is spread. Comments on every blog and social networking post count, so please share on Facebook, Twitter Google Plus and whever else possible. 

Please like us on our Facebook page - www.facebook.com/Floatm8

We want Floatm8 to be recognized as a world leader in the water safety Industry and with your support we can get there!

Thank you for taking the time to visit our first Indiegogo.com campaign. We have committed a great deal of time, Money and effort in designing Floatm8 to what it is today, Floatm8 will help reduce the number of drownings globally. We can’t wait to share our product with you and the rest of the world.

We thank you in advance for your support. 

Estimated delivery November 2013.

 

 

If you have any questions please contact us at:

floatm8@gmail.com

 

Check out our website: FloatM8.com

 

Follow Us On Facebook: Facebook.com/Floatm8

 

Patent Details -

U.S.A

Click Here

Australia

Click Here

story:
A Note From Jess:

Today's beauty care industry is one of the least regulated industries in our country.  The FDA does not review nor does it have the authority to regulate what goes into cosmetics and because of this, terms such as "organic" and "natural" are widely misused and misrepresented. In fact, 89% of the ingredients currently used in cosmetics have not even been evaluated by the FDA.

While attending Emerson College, I first started to seriously check out beauty product ingredients and began uncovering facts like I mentioned above--and I couldn't believe that I was finding these harmful ingredients in some of the products that even I was using!

That was the last straw.  At that moment, I realized i wasn't going to stand for the dishonesty and lack of clarity in our beauty industry and decided to do something about it! 

I founded Olive Natural Beauty's 100% natural & organic skin care line with the mission to provide a healthy, honest, and more effective way for people to care for what is most important--our selves and our skin!

                                                               --Jess

Why Our Skin Needs Saving….

DID YOU KNOW that your skin is the largest organ in your body?

Your skin absorbs a part of almost anything it touches. Yet, many popular beauty care products contain harmful ingredients such as preservatives, synthetic fragrances, and dyes that are in fact directly damaging to your skin and body.

Of course most of us don’t want to use products containing hurtful ingredients, but I've found that many people are either unaware that their products contain harmful ingredients or are naïve to how damaging their products truly are.

Due to a lack of industry regulation, many brands that you see labeled as “organic” and “natural” are in reality anything but. This is why Olive Natural Beauty is on a mission to SAVE OUR SKIN!

SAVE OUR SKIN!!

What Is Olive Natural Beauty?

Olive Natural Beauty products focus on the incredible benefits of pure Italian extra virgin olive oil for the skin. High in vitamin A, B, C, D, E, K, and iron, Olive Oil has been a Mediterranean secret of youth and beauty for ages. These vitamins, found in each Olive Natural Beauty product, help skin look younger by reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while deflecting and neutralizing free radicals that attack skin's youthful appearance and cause up to 80% of visible aging.

Olive Natural Beauty only uses 100% organic extra virgin in all of our products. Rich in Linoleic and Oleic acids, (a deprivation of which is a main cause of dry skin) extra virgin olive oil (or EVOO) is the least processed, purest, and most beneficial form of olive oil on the planet.

EVOO 4 LIFE

CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE about  our EVOO

Practice Safe Skin!

Savior Behavior -- OH MY!

                       

Our Plan

Right now Olive is a one-woman show; handmade, hand packaged, and hand labeled by yours truly.  The funds from this Indiegogo.com Campaign will be used to produce and distribute the ONB product line (This includes supporting us in the creation, packing, shipping, educating, and everything it takes to deliver ONB products to our community), source the highest grade ingredients from organic farms within the U.S., launch new products, and help Olive Natural Beauty become one of under 50 skin care companies in the world to be USDA certified organic! 

Plus, if successful, we will GIVE AWAY HALF of the $10,000 goal in ONB products to help people everywhere PRACTICE SAFE SKIN CARE! 

We also have fun and exciting stretch goals which, if reached, will unlock new rewards for all levels of backers.  Read more below.....

organic ingredients ROCK!

At Olive Natural Beauty, we support US based business for almost all of our sourcing. Our beeswax, for example, is harvested on the Washington Olympic mountains where the higher altitude produces a more pure wax.  Our shea butter is sourced from the Abanga Karite Fair Trade Shea Butter Cooperative and Allafia Fair Trade.  We support fair trade methods through what we like to call "The Natural Beauty Difference"!

Abanga Karite Fair Trade Shea Butter Cooperative

CLICK TO LEARN MORE ABOUT THE NATURAL BEAUTY DIFFERENCE

 

OLIVE U TOO! You are our Skin-spiration!

ONB Founder Jess Lauren is Skin-spired!

You Can Help Us Make It Happen! 

We can't wait to reward you for your support!! Here is a sneak peek of some of the wonderful rewards we want to shower our supporters with!!

The Goddess Glow Giftset

Olive Natural Beauty Lip Balm in Lemon & Lavender

The Olive Natural Beauty Tote Bag!


The Entire ONB Collection!

Saving Our Skin is just the beginning! What’s Next? (Stretch Goals)

$15k- Launch Pure Palms (special rewards level 1)

Pure Palms is our long anticipated alcohol-free hand sanitizer!  ONB has spent 2 years formulating a natural, safe, and effective way to clean hands without water and without drying skin.  Help us initiate Pure Palms into the ONB line!!! With your support at this level, ONB will be able to finally launch Pure Palms to the public. Those who’s generosity lands them in the reward levels of $100+ will be the first to ever try Pure Palms (and have the opportunity to give us feedback)!

$25k- Hire help!

It takes a lot of work to bring ONB’s skin care products to life and we are looking to grow!  With your support I will be able to bring on helpful hands to pack, ship, label, and work with us in the Beauty Lab to bring ONB to you! 

$35k- Unlock Special Rewards!! (special rewards level 2)

When we reach $35k, we will start to unlock these SPECIAL REWARDS!! --Backers at $5 and above will receive the ONB custom sticker collection  --Backers at $25 and above will receive a custom ONB compact bamboo mirror --Backers at $100 and above will receive a custom ONB t-shirt

ONB Sticker Collection

ONB Bamboo Compact Mirror

ONB T-Shirt

$45k-Expos

Help ONB get the word out about "PRACTICING SAFE SKIN CARE"!  Attending gatherings of communities who care about safe and organic skin care is a must for the success of my company.  Events like Natural Expo East will help us spread the word of ONB, grow our community, and "SAVE OUR SKIN"!

$55k- Help Upgrade ONB’s Beauty Laboratory (special rewards level 3)

With this stretch goal ONB will have enough support to make our DREAMS a reality.  Our dreams include: large scale industrial mixer, industrial size stainless steel bowls and double boiler equipment, storage space and creating larger soap molds to name a few.

If we reach this goal, all backers who donated $250-$5000 will be invited to work with ONB’s Online Beauty Lab to experiment with new products, organic ingredients, and organic essential oil scents, to create a new ONB product (which of course you will receive)! 

$65k- ONB Road Trip USA

Can’t wait to meet ONB? We will come to you! If we reach this stretch goal, we will have enough funds to take the ONB Beauty Bus on a cross-country road trip to provide free products, spread the word to “Save Our Skin”, and educate everyone about the benefits of safe, simple, organic skin care.

$75k- New ONB! (special rewards level 4)

Right now ONB has only released body care products...but we haven't forgotten about your face and hair! At this level we will have enough support to introduce the first ever ONB natural and organic facial skin care and hair care lines to the world! Moisturizer, toner, conditioner, shampoo, masks and more! Also, any $250+ backers will be the first to receive these lines when they launch!

$100k-Give Back To YOU!  (special rewards level 5)

If we reach this stretch goal, ONB will donate 5% of funds raised to help fund other projects on Indiegogo and organizations we believe in! Our true goal is to help support everyone who made this possible, and what better way than to give back than to support your own Indiegogo campaigns and our communities. We have so many projects we want to help support, but who do you want to see us support? Luckily we’ve got that covered: we will hold an exclusive Facebook Group Forum to hear from you, all our supporters, who you feel we should help.

Your Skin Will Thank you.

So join us. If you also are tired of dishonesty in today's skin care industry and of the harmfulness of many skin care products on the market today, join the ONB revolution to SAVE OUR SKIN! Do yourself a favor and let Olive be your savior. :)

Where can you learn more about ONB?

Facebook

Twitter

Official Website

Sneakpeeq.com

New Beauty's Daily Beauty Blog

Exclusive Interview on Spotlighting Paradise

A Distinctive Style Magazine Spring 2012

 

Shipping For International Backers:

First off, thank you so much for your support! We want nothing more than to get you your fantastic rewards as soon as possible. Although we will cover most of the cost of shipping to you, we do ask that you add $10 to any reward you choose for shipping.  Shipping is one of our biggest challenges as our products are heavy and fragile so we appreciate you allowing us to take the time, effort and material needed to ensure your ONB treats make it to you safe and sound! ENJOY!!

 

*video credit: Bryn Francis of DigitAll HD (digitallhd@gmail.com)*
*photo credit: Ben Rosser of Benjamin Rosser Photography (ben@benrosserphoto.com)*

I founded Olive Natural Beauty's 100% natural & organic skin care line with the mission to provide a healthy, honest, and more effective way for people to care for what is most important--our selves and our skin!
                                                               --Jess

Why Our Skin Needs Saving….
DID YOU KNOW that your skin is the largest organ in your body?
Your skin absorbs a part of almost anything it touches. Yet, many popular beauty care products contain harmful ingredients such as preservatives, synthetic fragrances, and dyes that are in fact directly damaging to your skin and body.
Of course most of us don’t want to use products containing hurtful ingredients, but I've found that many people are either unaware that their products contain harmful ingredients or are naïve to how damaging their products truly are.
Due to a lack of industry regulation, many brands that you see labeled as “organic” and “natural” are in reality anything but. This is why Olive Natural Beauty is on a mission to SAVE OUR SKIN!

SAVE OUR SKIN!!

What Is Olive Natural Beauty?
Olive Natural Beauty products focus on the incredible benefits of pure Italian extra virgin olive oil for the skin. High in vitamin A, B, C, D, E, K, and iron, Olive Oil has been a Mediterranean secret of youth and beauty for ages. These vitamins, found in each Olive Natural Beauty product, help skin look younger by reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while deflecting and neutralizing free radicals that attack skin's youthful appearance and cause up to 80% of visible aging.
Olive Natural Beauty only uses 100% organic extra virgin in all of our products. Rich in Linoleic and Oleic acids, (a deprivation of which is a main cause of dry skin) extra virgin olive oil (or EVOO) is the least processed, purest, and most beneficial form of olive oil on the planet.

EVOO 4 LIFE

CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE about  our EVOO
Practice Safe Skin!

Savior Behavior -- OH MY!

                        
Our Plan
Right now Olive is a one-woman show; handmade, hand packaged, and hand labeled by yours truly.  The funds from this Indiegogo.com Campaign will be used to produce and distribute the ONB product line (This includes supporting us in the creation, packing, shipping, educating, and everything it takes to deliver ONB products to our community), source the highest grade ingredients from organic farms within the U.S., launch new products, and help Olive Natural Beauty become one of under 50 skin care companies in the world to be USDA certified organic! 
Plus, if successful, we will GIVE AWAY HALF of the $10,000 goal in ONB products to help people everywhere PRACTICE SAFE SKIN CARE! 
We also have fun and exciting stretch goals which, if reached, will unlock new rewards for all levels of backers.  Read more below.....
organic ingredients ROCK!
At Olive Natural Beauty, we support US based business for almost all of our sourcing. Our beeswax, for example, is harvested on the Washington Olympic mountains where the higher altitude produces a more pure wax.  Our shea butter is sourced from the Abanga Karite Fair Trade Shea Butter Cooperative and Allafia Fair Trade.  We support fair trade methods through what we like to call "The Natural Beauty Difference"!
Abanga Karite Fair Trade Shea Butter Cooperative
CLICK TO LEARN MORE ABOUT THE NATURAL BEAUTY DIFFERENCE
 
OLIVE U TOO! You are our Skin-spiration! 

ONB Founder Jess Lauren is Skin-spired!

You Can Help Us Make It Happen! 
We can't wait to reward you for your support!! Here is a sneak peek of some of the wonderful rewards we want to shower our supporters with!!
The Goddess Glow Giftset 

Olive Natural Beauty Lip Balm in Lemon & Lavender

The Olive Natural Beauty Tote Bag!

The Entire ONB Collection!

Saving Our Skin is just the beginning! What’s Next? (Stretch Goals)
$15k- Launch Pure Palms (special rewards level 1)
Pure Palms is our long anticipated alcohol-free hand sanitizer!  ONB has spent 2 years formulating a natural, safe, and effective way to clean hands without water and without drying skin.  Help us initiate Pure Palms into the ONB line!!! With your support at this level, ONB will be able to finally launch Pure Palms to the public. Those who’s generosity lands them in the reward levels of $100+ will be the first to ever try Pure Palms (and have the opportunity to give us feedback)!
$25k- Hire help!
It takes a lot of work to bring ONB’s skin care products to life and we are looking to grow!  With your support I will be able to bring on helpful hands to pack, ship, label, and work with us in the Beauty Lab to bring ONB to you! 
$35k- Unlock Special Rewards!! (special rewards level 2)
When we reach $35k, we will start to unlock these SPECIAL REWARDS!! --Backers at $5 and above will receive the ONB custom sticker collection  --Backers at $25 and above will receive a custom ONB compact bamboo mirror --Backers at $100 and above will receive a custom ONB t-shirt
ONB Sticker Collection
ONB Bamboo Compact Mirror
ONB T-Shirt
$45k-Expos
Help ONB get the word out about "PRACTICING SAFE SKIN CARE"!  Attending gatherings of communities who care about safe and organic skin care is a must for the success of my company.  Events like Natural Expo East will help us spread the word of ONB, grow our community, and "SAVE OUR SKIN"!
$55k- Help Upgrade ONB’s Beauty Laboratory (special rewards level 3) 
With this stretch goal ONB will have enough support to make our DREAMS a reality.  Our dreams include: large scale industrial mixer, industrial size stainless steel bowls and double boiler equipment, storage space and creating larger soap molds to name a few.
If we reach this goal, all backers who donated $250-$5000 will be invited to work with ONB’s Online Beauty Lab to experiment with new products, organic ingredients, and organic essential oil scents, to create a new ONB product (which of course you will receive)! 
$65k- ONB Road Trip USA
Can’t wait to meet ONB? We will come to you! If we reach this stretch goal, we will have enough funds to take the ONB Beauty Bus on a cross-country road trip to provide free products, spread the word to “Save Our Skin”, and educate everyone about the benefits of safe, simple, organic skin care.
$75k- New ONB! (special rewards level 4)
Right now ONB has only released body care products...but we haven't forgotten about your face and hair! At this level we will have enough support to introduce the first ever ONB natural and organic facial skin care and hair care lines to the world! Moisturizer, toner, conditioner, shampoo, masks and more! Also, any $250+ backers will be the first to receive these lines when they launch!
$100k-Give Back To YOU!  (special rewards level 5)
If we reach this stretch goal, ONB will donate 5% of funds raised to help fund other projects on Indiegogo and organizations we believe in! Our true goal is to help support everyone who made this possible, and what better way than to give back than to support your own Indiegogo campaigns and our communities. We have so many projects we want to help support, but who do you want to see us support? Luckily we’ve got that covered: we will hold an exclusive Facebook Group Forum to hear from you, all our supporters, who you feel we should help.
Your Skin Will Thank you.
So join us. If you also are tired of dishonesty in today's skin care industry and of the harmfulness of many skin care products on the market today, join the ONB revolution to SAVE OUR SKIN! Do yourself a favor and let Olive be your savior. :)
Where can you learn more about ONB?
Facebook
Twitter
Official Website
Sneakpeeq.com 
New Beauty's Daily Beauty Blog
Exclusive Interview on Spotlighting Paradise
A Distinctive Style Magazine Spring 2012
 
Shipping For International Backers:
First off, thank you so much for your support! We want nothing more than to get you your fantastic rewards as soon as possible. Although we will cover most of the cost of shipping to you, we do ask that you add $10 to any reward you choose for shipping.  Shipping is one of our biggest challenges as our products are heavy and fragile so we appreciate you allowing us to take the time, effort and material needed to ensure your ONB treats make it to you safe and sound! ENJOY!!

story:
Short Summary

Thuc Lee is a 15 year old asian boy that has skin cancer. More specifically melanoma, his doctors have discovered this recently after his rosacea treatment sessions. They noticed that a mole near the middle of his neck contains malignant cancer cells, and that it is currently in "stage 0" meaning it's just started. There is still a chance for this to be removed, however we have insufficient funds to provide health care to Thuc.

What We Need 

We are trying our best to help Thuc, however his situation is out of our hands. It's almost impossible for us to come up with funds to pay for his treatment and eventually surgery. We are asking for at least 5000$ to help pay off his medical bills. If his cancer persists into the next stages without cure, there may not be a chance for Thuc.

 

Please, we need the funds by next month to quickly pay for and therefore cure Thuc's melanoma.

Our family is in a state of crisis, we cannot offer much, and it would be insulting to show what we could. However we and Thuc thank you deeply for helping.

story:
UPDATES as of 3/06 at 9:30 PM

*This Friday Donnie received some very unexpected news regarding his insurance claim. We had to wait until everything was confirmed before sharing it.

After working with Aetna Insurance, Emerson realized that even though the college’s insurance plan covers top surgery, the language never made it into the official policy, resulting in the rejection. All documentation has been quickly revised, and this week Donnie has confirmed with his surgeon’s office that insurance will cover the procedure.

This is very surprising news, and means that he only needs to pay copay instead of the full $8125. As promised, all excess funds have been pledged to the Jim Collins Foundation.

We are all thrilled that things have worked out for Donnie, and the college’s insurance policy has been updated with the correct language.

Check out the full explanation in Donnie’s most recent video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SrhzLVloK-o

 

UPDATES as of 2/27 at 10:00 AM

*We are HAPPY to announce that ALL excess money will be given to the Jim Collins Foundation. Official Announcment to come soon!

http://jimcollinsfoundation.org

*Featured on Huffington Post/Huff Post Live

 http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/02/26/phi-alpha-tau-transgender-surgery_n_2765653.html?utm_hp_ref=mostpopular

http://live.huffingtonpost.com/r/segment/brothers-raise-funds-for--member's-ftm-surgery/512b87f702a760284000094e

*Featured on FRONT PAGE of Herald

http://bostonherald.com/news_opinion/local_coverage/2013/02/frat_brothers_raise_14g_for_emerson_college_student_s_gender

UPDATES as of 2/26 at 12:50 PM

*We are currently discussing as a brotherhood what we will do if we are able to raise more than $8,100

*Featured on GayStarNews.com 

http://www.gaystarnews.com/article/fraternity-brothers-raising-money-help-pay-transgender-members-top-surgery260213

*Featured on Queerty.com

 http://www.queerty.com/boston-fraternity-raises-funds-for-transgender-brothers-surgery-20130226/*Featured on Out.com (the #1 gay magazine in US): 

 

UPDATES as of 2/25 

*Featured on OutMagazine.com

http://www.out.com/entertainment/popnography/2013/02/25/boston-fraternity-raises-money-trans-brother

*NEW GOAL: $8,100. 

*Response from Donnie Collins himself: 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktVA9q4Zxig

Short Summary

We are a group of individuals brought together through our fraternity and we are here for one reason: to support the brothers of our organization. Yesterday we were informed that one of our active brothers, a transgender female to male, was denied the opportunity to recieve financial support from his insurance for top surgery.

We are now trying to raise that money for him. We are doing this as individuals in an organization rallying around another individual. This endeavor is not being sponsored by the organization as a whole, rather the active members within it. 

We care deeply about each and everyone, and rely on the entire active brotherhood to stand behind any one individual when they are in need.   

What We Need & What You Get

Our brother's top surgery is already scheduled for May 2013. This money would allow him to keep that appointment, and would cover what his insurance did not. 

We as an organization are told from day one to use our resources. You may not know this gentleman like we do, and we might not even know you, but if it speaks to you then we want to present you with an opportunity to give. 

We would much rather recieve $10 from 100 people than recieve $100 from 10 people. 

We are here less to raise money, and more to tell a story. The story of transformation, and story of self-discovery, and the story of brotherhood. 

The Impact

It is small. But it is meaningful. If you are on this page, it is most likely because an active brother has reached out to you. If you stumbled upon this page, even better. We want this to be a conversation, rather than a donation. Please don't hesitate to communicate with us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Share our campaign

Reach out to those you know who are personally connected to this issue

Make noise around the world

story:
Querida todos,

I will be traveling from May 14-May 20, 2013 to Honduras. I will be alongside about 20 other students from Emory University to work alongside professional dentists to give free clinical care and teach preventative care to the Honduran community.

I will be graduating from the Emory University May 2013 with a major in Neuroscience and behavioral biology and a minor in Spanish.

Traveling to Spanish-speaking countries has always been a passion of mine. I have been learning Spanish from the age of 11 and had the opportunity to travel to Spain by myself and work in a Mexican restaurant in my hometown for extra practice. With my passion for Spanish, I am also passionate about my future endeavor, to be a dentist. 

College has been a confusing journey, as I am sure it is for many other students as well, and I learned that having healthy teeth is more than a great first impression or being complimented on a great smile. Having healthy teeth means longevity of life, confidence, and happiness. Having healthy teeth means that you physically are in good health, which is something that many individuals fail to recognize.

This is the breakdown for the cost of the trip:
Trip cost: $750
Medical Supplies: $100
Flight Cost: $700

Since this is something that I personally am passionate about I would like to fundraise on my own without the help of my parents. They've sacrificed so much for me during my four years at a private university and I want to reward their effort by showing them that they did an amazing job raising me and instilling within me the morals of a upstanding humanitarian and Christian. 

Any donation is extremely helpful and I hope that through this it will further my passion in becoming a dentist as I apply to dental school this summer. I am so excited to travel to Central America, it being my first time, and experiencing and indulging in a culture completely different than my own.

Thank You and God Bless!

story:
**Limited Perk Offer! 

$45 - get a Facebook Avatar 

$1000 - get a special 30 second animated Thank You Card (only 5 of these available)**

Her Story...

In March of 2012, Colleen was misdiagnosed with “severe migraines.” Her life was turned upside down. She started to experience vision problems, numbness, difficulty walking, lapses in speech and cognitive functioning, unexplained bruising, headaches, vomiting, and extreme fatigue. Eventually she started hearing voices. Something wasn’t right...this wasn’t just migraines. On June 22, 2012, Colleen was rushed to the ER in St. Petersburg, FL, and diagnosed with a life-threatening blood disorder called Thrombotic Thrombocytopenic Purpura, or T.T.P.

T.T.P. has a 95% mortality rate if left untreated...she dodged a bullet. But T.T.P. is still shooting.

The only known and effective forms of treatment for T.T.P. are:

  • Plasmapheresis (also called Plasma Exchange, a process somewhat similar to dialysis)
  • Prednisone (a steroid)
  • and Rituxin (a drug commonly used to fight blood cancers, such as leukemia and lymphoma)


Colleen has received treatment, but she still has 3 more to go. Without them, she could face a severe relapse and she might not be as lucky...

She’s lost her job. There’s some question as to whether her insurance will cover this, and she can’t get treatment unless she pays out of pocket first. This campaign is to help Colleen fund her health...to keep her living.

Her Needs...

The cost per treatment is $6,717. She needs these treatments once a week over the next three weeks or potentially longer. The chances of relapse are high and she can’t risk missing a treatment.

The total cost for treatment is $20,000 out of pocket.

How we break this down...

  • Milestone 1 - $5,000 COMPLETED!
  • Milestone 2 - $5,000 COMPLETED!
  • Milestone 3 - $5,000 (Her last week of treatment)
  • Milestone 4 - $5,000 (Help us cover any treatment center administrative fees)

 

$1 or $1,000, anything helps. All money raised will go to fund 100% of her treatment. Any overages from a successful funding will be donated to a non-profit charity of Colleen’s choice.

In Return...

For your generous donation of...

$1-10, you’ll receive a handwritten and handmade “Thank You” card from Colleen.

$25+ and you’ll receive a poem featuring your name, written by Colleen, plus a “Thank You” card.

$50+ and you’ll receive a homemade bracelet and the gifts above.  

$100+ will get you all of the above. If you’re in the St. Petersburg area you’ll also receive a dinner prepared in your honor.

Your Impact...

A Message from Colleen

“It’s true, I’ve been hit with a lot of turmoil this year. Life can change so quickly. Just when things are looking bright, they can become dark again in a moment. But what I've taken away from this is that good and joy can come just as swiftly and just as powerfully as damage or loss. This experience has reminded me that we as humans have unfathomable potential. We can do so much good and don't need to view ourselves as limited, incapable, unworthy. This life is an incredible opportunity to achieve our goals and serve and grow. I view this illness as a lesson. Your donation serves not only as a bright spot of hope for me, but as an affirmation of the potential and generosity of the human race, and an opportunity for us all to serve and grow together.” - Colleen

story:
How Grip-N-Clip came to be!

 

My name is Tony Wilson (Coach Wilson) the creator of the Grip-N-Clip (GNC) Mouthpiece.  Our GNC mouthpiece is designed to be a healthier/cleaner alternative to what currently exist in the marketplace.  It is common practice that football players lay their helmets on the ground in between plays and during water breaks.  As a coach, I notice many dirty mouthpieces attached to helmets laying in the recently fertilized grass or dirt. Incidentally, a player's mouthpiece would get stepped on by another teammate by accident.  Unknowingly, the player would put on his (her) helmet and the dirty mouthpiece back in his mouth. Nasty huh!  No wondered half of my team would be sick about a month into the season. The GNC mouthpiece allows the player to elevate it off the ground and out of the dirt.

 

Letâ€™s keep it clean!

 

In the U.S., there are over ten million kids playing contact sports every year. Therefore, I designed a mouthpiece to give them all a healthier option.  The GNC patented, open ended finger-loop mouthpiece allows the players to clip it onto the face mask or  jersey collar rather than holding it in the palms of their dirty hands.  The GNC mouthpiece also gives the player the ability to insert and remove the mouthpiece without placing dirty fingers in and out of their mouth.  Staph and Strep are the two most commonly found viruses on the mouthpiece; with Staph becoming more and more resistant to medical drugs.  Every player on the field is required to wear a mouthpiece, and the finger-loop is clearly visible for referees to easily see when their mouth is close.

 

Drop and give me twenty, actually I need seventy-five!!!

 

The $7,500.00 we raise on IndieGoGo will be used to fund the first GNC production rounds of the mouthpiece.  The GNC mouthpiece featured in our videos and images were made using prototype tooling, which has been refined over the past year.  In order to prepare for high quality and consistent production we need to purchase several production tools, and prepare our production line, which has significant upfront cost.  Sponsorships will allow us to mass produce large runs with the new tooling and packaging in order to meet the high demand for the product.  In order to get to this point, I have exhausted all of my 401k retirement.  I truly believe the GNC mouthpiece will help keep our athletes healthier during the sports season. Help me make this product available for our kids!

 

Whatâ€™s in the bag?

 

Reward yourself, your coaches, your players with GNC mouthpiece and gear.  Many of you have kids, know kids and (or) adults that play contact sports and could benefit from the use of this product.  If you don't have kids playing, then be a sponsor by donating the rewards to your local youth/school or adult league.  It is a fact that funding for youth sports have been severly cut back, so any donation in products or goods given to a sports organizations would be greatly appreciated.  Go ahead and make a generous pledge to support both local youth and (or) adult leagues within your community with a much need product for a healthier season.  Go GRIP-N-CLIP!

 

A Team Effort!

 

Hey GoGoerâ€™s, itâ€™s gonna take some extra push upâ€™s to reach our goal.  Please tell a friend who has kids play contact sports (football, hockey, lacrosse, rugby and soccer), a local coach or league president about our GRIP-N-CLIP mouthpiece.  Use some Facebook, Twitter and E-mail time to spread the word.

 

Think Pink!

 

We also make the GNC mouthpiece in multiple colors as well as "PINK" for players who want to support Breast Cancer Awareness during the month of October.  We also plan to send a donation to organizations supporting Breast Cancer Awareness for every PINK mouthpiece sold.  This item also makes a great fundraising product for organizations to sell as well.
story_txt:
How
Grip-N-Clip came to be!
 
My name is Tony Wilson (Coach Wilson) the creator of the Grip-N-Clip (GNC) Mouthpiece.  Our GNC mouthpiece is designed to be a
healthier/cleaner alternative to what currently exist in the marketplace.  It is common practice that football players lay their helmets on the ground in between plays and during water breaks.  As a coach, I notice many dirty mouthpieces attached to helmets laying in the recently fertilized grass or dirt. Incidentally, a player's mouthpiece would get stepped on by another teammate by accident.  Unknowingly, the player
would put on his (her) helmet and the dirty mouthpiece back in his mouth. Nasty
huh!  No wondered half
of my team would be sick about a month into the season. The GNC mouthpiece allows the player to elevate it off the ground and out of the dirt.

 
Letâ€™s keep
it clean!
 
In the U.S., there are over
ten million kids playing contact sports every year. Therefore, I designed a
mouthpiece to give them all a healthier option.  The GNC patented, open ended finger-loop mouthpiece allows the players to clip it onto the face mask or  jersey collar rather than holding it in the palms of their dirty hands.  The GNC mouthpiece also gives the player the ability to
insert and remove the mouthpiece without placing dirty fingers in and out of their
mouth.  Staph and Strep are the two most commonly found viruses on the mouthpiece; with Staph becoming more and more resistant to medical drugs.  Every player on the field is required to wear a mouthpiece, and the finger-loop is clearly visible for referees
to easily see when their mouth is close.

 
Drop and
give me twenty, actually I need seventy-five!!!
 
The $7,500.00
we raise on IndieGoGo will be used to fund the first GNC production rounds of the
mouthpiece.  The GNC mouthpiece
featured in our videos and images were made using prototype tooling, which has
been refined over the past year. 
In order to prepare for high quality and consistent production we need
to purchase several production tools, and prepare our production line, which has
significant upfront cost. 
Sponsorships will allow us to mass produce large runs with the new
tooling and packaging in order to meet the high demand for the product.  In order to get to this point, I have exhausted all of my 401k
retirement.  I truly believe the GNC mouthpiece will help keep our athletes healthier during the sports season. Help me make this product available for our kids!

 
Whatâ€™s in
the bag?
 
Reward yourself, your coaches, your players with GNC mouthpiece and gear.  Many of you have kids, know kids and (or) adults that play contact sports and could benefit from the use of this product.  If you don't have kids playing, then be a sponsor by donating the
rewards to your local youth/school or adult league.  It is a fact that funding for youth sports have been severly cut
back, so any donation in products or goods given to a sports organizations would be greatly
appreciated.  Go ahead and make
a generous pledge to support both local youth and (or) adult leagues within your community with a much need product for a healthier season.  Go GRIP-N-CLIP!

 
A Team Effort!
 
Hey
GoGoerâ€™s, itâ€™s gonna take some extra push upâ€™s to reach our goal.  Please tell a friend who has kids play contact sports (football, hockey, lacrosse, rugby and soccer), a local coach or league president about our GRIP-N-CLIP mouthpiece.  Use some Facebook, Twitter and E-mail time to spread the
word.

 
Think
Pink!
 
We also
make the GNC mouthpiece in multiple colors as well as "PINK" for players who want to support Breast Cancer Awareness during the month of October.  We also plan to send a donation to organizations supporting Breast Cancer Awareness for every PINK mouthpiece sold.  This item also makes a great fundraising product for organizations to sell as well.

story:
My Story

My name is Julie Kaye and I would like to introduce you to "Stress Less, Heal More" which is  a program I designed to support people with the most serious health conditions based on my own experiences with breast cancer, grand mal seizures, brain surgery and Traumatic Brain Injury.

 I have had a brain condition in the stroke family called an AVM in the language area of my brain since I was a teenager. I would have Grand Mal seizures in the darndest of places like the community swimming pool, on a first date, or during my sleep and then not wake up for a few days, only to be fired at work for not showing up. I never told my bosses about my condition because they wouldn't have hired me and I just  figured that I would look for another job if I was fired. 

 

While having a health issue can be challenging, life can be much more difficult if you don't have a strong family/support system and endless supplies of money to get you through those periods. I haven't had family support and relied on strangers to get me to hospitals when I needed help. I had over $50,000 to live on with my brain surgery but quickly ran out of money to survive when complications occurred  after surgery and couldn't read or write let alone handle bills and finances. I was left with nothing to live on, and became a maid while my reading, writing and speech were being redeveloped. 


I have wondered many times, "Could I be the only one without support going through a medical crisis, or are there others like me?"


My life's purpose/mission after all my experiences is to help people who don't have strong emotional support and enough financially to weather the storm during their own health crisis. What I know how to do best is to simplify life when life seems most complicated and lowering stress in your daily life is the first priority and finding support if you don't already have it. 


My life now is very simple and basic almost monk-like in it's simplicity,  but stress is less than it used to be and therefore my health is better. My attitude is strong and positive and look forward to helping hundred's if not thousands of people get through their medical crisis.

 

The Impact

The most important impact we can have is to keep people in their homes and have enough money for food, medication and basic necessities of life. The second biggest impact is to let people know that we care about them and they are not alone in their plight. We will help them find what they need and often it's someone who will listen to them. 

What We Need & What You Get

I have been working as a volunteer for a year helping people with cancer and in the early stages of working with people with a variety of other health conditions. I need to continue devoting my skills to this service full time, but there currently isn't  much funding available, so I would like to raise the money to cover my basic expenses so that not only can I continue to devote myself to it full time but can start training others to help people through their medical crises and to market my program so that it can reach more people in need.
 
We  work with individuals and organizations. Right now STRESS LESS, HEAL MORE is about to begin working with The Wounded Warrior Program and we have recently been added to the referral list for The Alzheimer's Association of San Diego. This is the tip of the iceberg for us!

We are looking to raise $50,000 for our cause and project:
MARKETING & PROMOTING "STRESS LESS, HEAL MORE" PROGRAM" ONLINE $10,000

BASIC LIVING EXPENSES FOR JULIE WHO IS FULL TIME: $20,000
BASIC LIVING EXPENSES FOR 2 P/T ASSISTANT NEGOTIATORS/HELPERS: $20,000
* INCLUDING FIXING JULIE'S 2005 TOYOTA TO GET TO THE BALBOA MILITARY HOSPITAL AND POSSIBLY CAMP PENDLETON.
THIS WILL BE AN ONGOING PROJECT SO WE WILL HAVE ONGOING FUNDRAISERS.
* IF WE DON'T REACH OUR GOALS, WE ARE STILL PROCEEDING AND WORKING WITH WHAT WE DO HAVE.
 
WHAT DO YOU GET FOR DONATING TO THIS PROGRAM?
 
1. A sense of satisfaction knowing that you are helping to ease other's suffering and giving them a much needed source of support while they face a life threatening illness.
2. Creating an additional net of support for you, your family, friends and community "when & if" you ever need us.
3. For those who count them, 1 "Good Karma Point" for those who count them
4. For those who donate $100 or more, we will send you a "Good Karma" certificate to note your contribution as long as we have your mailing address.
 
Also, please, please share our campaign with your friends, family, co-workers and everyone at Starbucks! Thank you.

story:
Hi reader,

                My name is Kate and I am 22 years old. I have had a very long and hard life. I have had two spinal surgeries due to severe scoliosis. Both surgeries were to save my life. I’m in such pain all the time, that most of the time I can barely walk. Once I turned 21, I was taken off of my Mother’s health insurance. My father, he left when I was a child. I have applied for medical assistance and SSI due to several other health issues. I have been denied both four times.

                Here is my problem. On July 7, 2012 I was rushed to the ER. I was having terrible pain in my thyroid. Now, I have Hypothyroidism and Hashimoto’s Thyroid, so I thought nothing of it. I just thought it was something to do with them, my medication or the stress I was under at the time. After hours and hours of testing, doctors and medications for the pain, they called in their on call Endocrine to break the news to me. I have cancer.

                They have no idea how long I have had it because I have not been able to see a doctor for almost a year. The two tumors have moved my throat up and over. They are literally CRUSHING my vocal cords. One more test showed their and my worst nightmare; I am getting less than 40% oxygen at all times. With any activity (example: going up the stairs) it is reduced and putting tremendous stress on my lungs and heart.

                I am beyond desperate need for surgery. I have no money, no insurance and have been denied charity and state assistance. I have the doctors, the hospital and everything. They will not touch me without the money. I have fought for my life over and over again. This time I am going to fight even stronger; but I need YOUR help to do it. Please give what you can spare, even one dollar will help.

                After you donate; promise me you will send my link to every family member, friend and co-worker and mention it to someone you bump into at your local market. I am only 22 years old; I have a life left to live. I have a future to experience and a world to travel.

                                                                                                                                                                Thank you,

                                                                                                                                                                                 Kate
