story:
Erectile Dysfunction (ED) is the repeated inability to maintain an erection sufficient for satisfying sexual activity.

 

 



Bet you didn't know that ...

Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® don't always work for Erectile Dysfunction and Premature Ejaculation, but there are other medical treatments available. 

 

Bet you didn't know that ...

Issues with prostate, heart, hypertension and diabetes may prevent Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® from being effective, but there are other medical treatments available.

 

Bet you didn't know that ...

Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® can cause unwanted side effects, which prevent many men from taking them, but there are other medical treatments available.

 

This IS the next  B I G  thing - real medicine customized by real doctors to increase both the firmness and duration of the erection.

We think you should know:
  • As the electrical wiring in an older building ages and needs assisance - the nerves connecting the brian and penis will age and eventually need assistane. This is a normal course of aging and will affect most men.
  • UP!'s drugs are different, helping where others cannot.
    • Men with premature ejaculation last much longer
    • Paralyzed men can achieve an erection.
    • Our drugs work when the other pills may not, with MINIMAL or NO side effects. Just like when you were young. Just like you remember. REALLY!


    With your contributions, we'll be able to educate the public that erectile dysfunction is common and can be treated in almost any situation.

    Our goals are to ignite the ED conversation, educate physicians and the public, and reach couples who need the medication so they can fully enjoy sex. 

    Although ED is becoming less taboo, the topic is infrequently discussed.  Are you uncomfortable? Becoming nervous? Angry? Are you hesitant to discuss this issue with others? If so, then you understand the need for this campaign.


    We need your help. Join team UP! and be on the forefront of the newest sexual revolution. With a well funded outreach program, we can both educate and effectively treat the issue.

    You can help us two ways:

    1.  Donate today. Help us spread the love.
    2. Tell your friends about this medical option.

    Please share our campaign. Send our link to your Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites. 

                                   

                                    www.UPCentersForMen.com

                                                         



    ED does not discriminate and becomes more of an issue as we age...       

        

     



    Scroll Down or Click on the Following Links to Learn More 

    ED PILLS LETTING YOU DOWN?
    • Age
    • ED Pill Side Effects

    • One Size Does Not Fit All

    HEALTH AND LIFESTYLE ISSUES
    • Prostate and Prostate Cancer
    • Heart Issues
    • High Blood Pressure
    • Alcohol
    • Diabetes
    • Low Testosterone 
    IMPOTENCE AFFECTS BOTH PARTNERS
    • Women Discuss ED

    PREMATURE EJACULATION

    ABOUT UP!
    • Our Medications
    • The UP! Executive Team

    FAQ's

     


    Eventually, men may experience hair loss, greying, wrinkles and a need for glasses, a larger belt and blood pressure pills. Many men will also stumble out of bed to use the bathroom in the middle of the night. These are inevitable facts.

    As a man's body ages, his penis ages too. In the majority of men, the penis will lose its vitality with age (including overall firmness, duration of the erection, staying power and possibly the ability to obtain an erection). As time goes on, pharmaceutical ED pills may have reduced functionality.

    Diabetes, high blood pressure (hypertension), prostate issues and lifestyle choices (diet and smoking) may also affect the ability to obtain and maintain an erection.

    The pills will often do the trick for a while, but they may have reduced functionality as time goes on. There are other medical treatments available.


     

    All medication may cause side effects and not function as advertised. Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® pills might have notable side effects for some men.

    Because these pills are swallowed, they affect your entire body. As the pill dilates the arteries and allows blood to enter the penis, it also dilates the entire system. This might cause flushing, headache, backache and other side effects (some too onerous for continued use).

    Think about that! The pills make you feel so miserable that you prefer erectile dysfunction over sex. There are other medical treatments available.


    The big pharma ED pills were real trailblazers - they created a market overnight. 

    For most men those pills will often do the trick just fine. Unfortunately, they don't work well enough for everyone.

    For some, they are too strong. For others, they aren’t strong enough. In many cases, they simply don’t work as advertised. There are other medical treatments available.

     

     

    Many health issues such as diabetes, high blood pressure (hypertension), prostate issues and lifestyle choices (alcohol, diet and smoking) may also affect the ability to obtain and maintain an erection. 

     

    The prostate is a gland that is found only in males and is located below the urinary bladder and in front of the rectum. The prostate produces a nourishing liquid that protects the sperm.

    With age, the cells in the prostate gland often enlarge and cause urination difficulties. This is commonly known as benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), which is not the same as prostate cancer. BPH can often be helped through medications that help reduce the size of the prostate.

    Prostate cancer most commonly occurs when there is a mutation of the cells found in the glandular regions of the prostate. Prostate cancer usually develops slowly.  There are multiple ways to treat prostate cancer, including expectant management, surgery (radical or robotic), radiation (external and internal), cryosurgery, hormone therapy and chemotherapy.

    One of the main questions men ask prior to surgery is, “How will these treatment options affect my ability to have and maintain an erection?”  Anatomically, a delicate web of nerves surrounds the prostate and many forms of treatment can affect this nerve net. These nerves are responsible for relaying the signals that control erections. Damage to these nerves can cause permanent change and prevent the ability to achieve and maintain an erection.

    Oral medication, including the three most commonly prescribed pills, has proven to be ineffective for helping erectile function after nerve damage from prostate cancer treatment. These oral medications rely on nerve signals to increase blood flow into the penis.  When these nerves can no longer conduct signals to cause an erection, the next step is providing information directly to the penis.

    Don’t let prostate cancer treatments prevent you from having a great sex life. There are other medical treatments available.

    Sources:
    • cancer.org what is prostate cancer?
    • Journal of the American Medical Association - tadalafil (Cialis) is not effective for preventing erectile dysfunction
    • UCLA - prostate cancer and erectile dysfunction

     

    Erectile Dysfunction (ED) should NOT be ignored.

    ED can significantly effect your love life and indicate a decline in your cardiovascular health.

    According to a study done by the Australian National University, men with ED under the age of 55 are at risk of having heart disease, which makes sense because both the penis and your heart depend on healthy blood flow.

    According to the project head, Emily Banks, “The risks of future heart disease and premature death increased steadily with severity of erectile dysfunction.” Men with severe ED and with no knowledge of having cardiovascular disease had a 35% chance to be hospitalized with an elevated 93% chance of mortality.

    Based on these results, cardiovascular health director at Australia’s Heart Foundation stated, “These results tell us that every man who is suffering from any degree of erectile dysfunction should be seeking medical assistance as early as possible and also insisting on a heart health check by their GP at the same time.”

    What can be determined from this research is that it's important to be diagnosed and understand the severity of your erectile dysfunction and what implications it may have for your health.

    Source:
    Banks, Emily, Grace Joshy, Walter P. Abhayaratna, Leonard Kritharides, Peter S. Macdonald, Rosemary J. Korda, and John P. Chalmers. "Erectile Dysfunction Severity as a Risk Marker for Cardiovascular Disease Hospitalisation and All-Cause Mortality: A Prospective Cohort Study." PLOS Medicine:. N.p., 29 Jan. 2013. Web. 15 Oct. 2014.

      

     

    Some studies show that ED may be a marker for high blood pressure.

    When blood pressure increases, it might damage the inner lining of the blood vessel, making it more difficult to bring and keep blood in the penis. If one is experiencing erectile dysfunction, it is important to be properly diagnosed to ensure that there are no other underlying health issues.

    There are at least two types of high blood pressure medications that can cause erectile dysfunction:
    • Diuretics.  Also known as “water pills” and can reduce the amount of blood flow to the penis (which assists in maintaining a firmer erection).
    • Beta Blockers. Affect the same area of the nervous system that is responsible for producing erections.

    Types of medication that do not affect sexual function are:
    • Angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors
    • Calcium channel blockers
    • Angiotensin II receptor blockers
    • Alpha blockers

    Alternatives to blood pressure medication include:
    • Eat healthily and in moderation
    • Stop smoking
    • Reduce sodium intake
    • Lose weight
    • Exercise daily (walk when possible)

    Sources:
    • Department of Physiology, Georgia Health Sciences University
    • Journal of Vascular Health Risk Management
    • Mayo Clinic
     

    According to the Mayo Clinic and other sources, drinking in moderation may offer some health benefits.

    Alcohol is often associated with social events and celebrations, and tends to be a social lubricant leading to flirtatious and confident conversations between the sexes. There's a reason why alcohol is called liquid courage.

    It is also commonly known that when a man has too much to drink, he may have temporary erectile dysfunction (the inability to perform while being inebriated). Excessive drinking can lead to a hindrance of sexual desire and the inability to become sexually stimulated.

    Occasional social drinking can be fun, but when it comes to consistent binge drinking, the story changes. Excessive drinking can lead to negative repercussions. According to O’Keefe and Hunt, up to 75% of patients in alcohol rehabilitation programs have erectile dysfunction. Chronic alcohol abusers’ erectile failure may be the result of a combination of psychogenic and organic factors (for example, neuropathy).

    An individual, on average, has the ability to metabolize one drink per hour. When more than one hourly drink is consumed, toxin levels increase in the body and begin to affect different organs.

    Consistent binge drinking and alcoholism can lead to organ failure, in this instance, the penis. It is important to keep in mind that alcohol can affect your health and to also remember to drink responsibly to avoid any negative repercussions.


    Erectile dysfunction issues are not uncommon for diabetics, however this should not prevent a full and enjoyable sex life.

    Many men with diabetes who have ED might avoid seeking help in the mistaken belief that there is nothing that can be done. If you have tried the big pharma pills or any over the counter medication and have not seen results, please do not lose hope. You are not alone.  There are other medical treatments available.

     

    Is your loss of interest due to ED or “Low T”?

    Testosterone

    Testosterone is a sex hormone produced mainly by the testicles. This hormone helps in the development of the testes and prostate, and also assists in increasing muscle mass, bone density, and the growth of body hair.

    As men age the production of testosterone decreases; as the level declines, there may be a decrease in libido and an increase in lethargy. There could also be an increase of fat around the stomach and a drop in muscle definition. 

    A percentage of men who use testosterone hormone replacement therapy might notice a sense of well-being, plus a decrease in abdominal fat and greater muscle definition. Increasing testosterone levels may yield additional positive effects, including Osteoporosis prevention. While replacing testosterone may help increase libido, it does not have a direct effect on erectile function.

    Erectile Dysfunction

    The average man in his 50’s is likely to suffer from erectile dysfunction. For some men this begins in their late teens, for others in their 60’s. As men grow older, the penis does not trap blood properly. This results in a softening of the erection. This condition can be helped with numerous treatments.

    For an erection to occur, multiple physical dynamics are involved. First, an increase in arterial blood must flow into the penis. Then, that increased volume of blood must be trapped causing the veins (that normally carry blood away from the penis) to get engorged. 

    The duration and strength of an erection are dependent upon the increased blood flow remaining in the penis. Age, medical conditions, medicines and lifestyle choices can affect the ability of the penis to receive and retain blood. This results in less firm erections or erectile dysfunction. 

    It is possible that your lack of interest is due to “low T”. It is also possible that when your ED is treated your interest in intimacy will be renewed.

    Unfortunately, erectile dysfunction will affect most men - this is simply a fact of life. It is nothing to be ashamed of or embarrassed by. But there are other medical treatments available.

     

     


    Women are taught, from the time of our first menses, that we will experience menopause. None of us are happy about it, some of us will fight it tooth and nail, but it is a fact of life.

    Did you know that, as men age, they may experience hair loss, greying, wrinkles and a need for glasses, a larger belt and blood pressure pills? Many men will also stumble out of bed to use the bathroom in the middle of the night. Yes, of course you did. These are inevitable facts and to be expected. 

    Did you also know that most men will also experience a loss of erectile vitality as they age?  Probably not.

    As systems age, just like the rest of our body parts, the penis will also lose its vitality including overall firmness, duration of the erection, staying power and possibly the ability to obtain an erection. Diabetes, high blood pressure (hypertension), prostate issues and lifestyle choices (diet and smoking) also affect the ability to obtain and maintain an erection. So, why do we believe men will continue to have satisfying erections until the end of their lives?

    Sex can be complicated.  Relationships between the sexes can be even more complicated.  When this happens, the emotions both parties experience are more complicated still.

    The commonly-known pills will often do the trick just fine for a while; however, these pills might have some serious considerations:
    • Oftentimes, these pills are simply not effective with some medical conditions (prostate issues, paralysis, diabetes, hypertension).
    • The fact that they are swallowed affects the entire system.  As they dilate the arteries and allow the blood to enter the penis more easily, they also dilate the entire system.  This might cause “flushing,” headache, backache and other side effects (some too onerous for continued use).
    • They will eventually lose their effectiveness.
    This is not unusual. This is not his fault. And it is certainly not your fault. It’s natural and to be expected. But it’s not the end. There are other medical treatments available.


          


    Two factors which affect how long the penis stays UP:
    • Sensitivity​: Determined by how many vibration sensors a man was born with in his penis. Men with more vibration sensors climax more quickly.
    • Brain Receptors​: Receive the vibration information from the penis and are affected by alcohol, which slows their response times.

    Five to ten percent of men climax early. This is a physical reaction, NOT psychological. 

    Because with age...
  • The time between penetration and ejaculation tends to decrease.
  • The ability of the penis to re-charge, and climax again, declines.
  • A very small percentage of men lose the ability to climax.

    • All medications are compounded to meet the couple's specific needs. Depending upon an UP! doctor's opinion and the man's health, our medication can be customized to maintain an erection for as long as you'd like, up to an hour or more. Possibly with multiple ejaculations.

     

         



    UP! Centers for Men was created to assist men and their partners overcome erectile dysfunction. There are very few medical reasons that can prevent a man from having a fulfilling sexual life. We believe that everyone should attain maximum sexual function and pleasure every time.

    UP! Centers for Men is a medical office whose mission is to increase our patients’ quality of life. We are experienced in, and dedicated to, client service and do everything medically possible to help men achieve their goals (whether they experience erectile dysfunction or premature ejaculation). The UP! physicians are US licensed and extensively trained in male sexual vitality. They and the staff listen to the issues and respond with solutions. We work closely with all men, by helping them enjoy a stable and healthy sex life. If you wish to learn more about UP! click here:

    OUR MEDICATIONS: To treat erectile dysfunction and/or premature ejaculation we custom-formulate medications, including sub-lingual and oral caplets as well as self-administered creams and painless injections. All are formulated from FDA-approved ingredients produced in FDA-approved compounding pharmacies. They can be used with food and alcohol, with minimal drug interactions and have few systemic side effects.

    To learn more about our ED options click here:
    To learn more about our Premature Ejaculation options click here: 

    THE UP! EXECUTIVE TEAM

    OUR CEO: Marlene D. Roth, MBA
    Marlene holds an MBA in Finance from Fordham University, a BA in Computer Science from Queens College, CUNY and is a Registered Yoga Teacher. Her life experience is in Business Development from a sales and marketing perspective, with a focus on Business and Client Retention. Marlene believes in enjoying life in a healthy, happy and productive manner. If you wish to learn more about Marlene click here: 

    OUR PRESIDENT: Hossam Maksoud, Pharm.D. R. Ph.
    Hossam owns several pharmacies which provide a wide range of services. In addition Hossam has knowledge of compounding creams and injectables and brings this extensive knowledge of pharmacology to UP! Centers for Men..

     

    • Who can use these treatments? UP!'s medication can be used by all males ages 18-99. A doctor's consultation is always necessary to ensure that our physicians prescribe the proper medication for your current medical condition (taking into account your complete medical history, including other prescription medications). 
    • How quickly will the medications take effect? UP! Centers for Men offers various types of medication, all of which are prescribed and formulated in our compounded pharmacy for each individual patient. Oral medication is administered sub-lingually (under the tongue) and typically works within 30-90 minutes and may be taken with a meal. Topical medication works within 15 minutes. Penile injections begin to work immediately, but can take up to 20 minutes to reach its full effect.
    • What are the side effects of the medicine? The side effects vary depending on what type of medication you use. Oral medication may have mild side effects such as nausea or headaches. Topical medication's side effects vary depending on the strength of the dose. Prolonged erections with topical medication tends to be rare. Penile injections have the potential to cause prolonged erections, dependent upon dosage - this side effect can usually be avoided if the doctor's instructions are properly followed.
    • How often can I use the medications? The frequency of use depends upon the doctor's diagnosis, but the following are FDA approved guidelines for use of the medication types. The oral medication can be used every 2 to 3 days due to the half-life of the formulation. The topical medication can be used once per day. The penile injections can be used once per day.
    • If I am prescribed a penile injection, is it painful to use? The injection is often not noticed when administered by a physician. When self-administered as instructed it is usually painless, safe and effective. The injection is administered with an automated device, which is extremely quick and efficient.
    • Is my prescription really made specifically for me? Yes, UP!'s medications are formulated in a compounding pharmacy based upon the doctor's prescription for the individual.

     

     


    You may contact us or send contributions to:

    UP! Centers for Men
    800 Second Avenue
    Suite 805
    New York, NY  USA 10017

    www.UPCentersForMen.com

    T: 844-873-6763 (Domestic)

    T: +001-347-669-1693 (International)
story_txt:
Erectile Dysfunction (ED) is the repeated inability to maintain an erection sufficient for satisfying sexual activity.
 

 

Bet you didn't know that ...
Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® don't always work for Erectile Dysfunction and Premature Ejaculation, but there are other medical treatments available. 
 
Bet you didn't know that ...
Issues with prostate, heart, hypertension and diabetes may prevent Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® from being effective, but there are other medical treatments available.
 
Bet you didn't know that ...
Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® can cause unwanted side effects, which prevent many men from taking them, but there are other medical treatments available.
 
This IS the next  B I G  thing - real medicine customized by real doctors to increase both the firmness and duration of the erection.We think you should know:
As the electrical wiring in an older building ages and needs assisance - the nerves connecting the brian and penis will age and eventually need assistane. This is a normal course of aging and will affect most men.
UP!'s drugs are different, helping where others cannot.
Men with premature ejaculation last much longer
Paralyzed men can achieve an erection.
Our drugs work when the other pills may not, with MINIMAL or NO side effects. Just like when you were young. Just like you remember. REALLY!








With your contributions, we'll be able to educate the public that erectile dysfunction is common and can be treated in almost any situation.
Our goals are to ignite the ED conversation, educate physicians and the public, and reach couples who need the medication so they can fully enjoy sex. 
Although ED is becoming less taboo, the topic is infrequently discussed.  Are you uncomfortable? Becoming nervous? Angry? Are you hesitant to discuss this issue with others? If so, then you understand the need for this campaign.

We need your help. Join team UP! and be on the forefront of the newest sexual revolution. With a well funded outreach program, we can both educate and effectively treat the issue.
You can help us two ways:
1.  Donate today. Help us spread the love.
2. Tell your friends about this medical option.
Please share our campaign. Send our link to your Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites. 








                               
                                www.UPCentersForMen.com

                                                     


ED does not discriminate and becomes more of an issue as we age...

ED PILLS LETTING YOU DOWN?

IMPOTENCE AFFECTS BOTH PARTNERS

The UP! Executive Team


FAQ's

 





Eventually, men may experience hair loss, greying, wrinkles and a need for glasses, a larger belt and blood pressure pills. Many men will also stumble out of bed to use the bathroom in the middle of the night. These are inevitable facts.
As a man's body ages, his penis ages too. In the majority of men, the penis will lose its vitality with age (including overall firmness, duration of the erection, staying power and possibly the ability to obtain an erection). As time goes on, pharmaceutical ED pills may have reduced functionality.
Diabetes, high blood pressure (hypertension), prostate issues and lifestyle choices (diet and smoking) may also affect the ability to obtain and maintain an erection.
The pills will often do the trick for a while, but they may have reduced functionality as time goes on. There are other medical treatments available.

 



All medication may cause side effects and not function as advertised. Viagra®, Cialis® and Levitra® pills might have notable side effects for some men.
Because these pills are swallowed, they affect your entire body. As the pill dilates the arteries and allows blood to enter the penis, it also dilates the entire system. This might cause flushing, headache, backache and other side effects (some too onerous for continued use).
Think about that! The pills make you feel so miserable that you prefer erectile dysfunction over sex. There are other medical treatments available.





The big pharma ED pills were real trailblazers - they created a market overnight. 
For most men those pills will often do the trick just fine. Unfortunately, they don't work well enough for everyone.
For some, they are too strong. For others, they aren’t strong enough. In many cases, they simply don’t work as advertised. There are other medical treatments available.
 

 

Many health issues such as diabetes, high blood pressure (hypertension), prostate issues and lifestyle choices (alcohol, diet and smoking) may also affect the ability to obtain and maintain an erection. 
 



The prostate is a gland that is found only in males and is located below the urinary bladder and in front of the rectum. The prostate produces a nourishing liquid that protects the sperm.
With age, the cells in the prostate gland often enlarge and cause urination difficulties. This is commonly known as benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), which is not the same as prostate cancer. BPH can often be helped through medications that help reduce the size of the prostate.
Prostate cancer most commonly occurs when there is a mutation of the cells found in the glandular regions of the prostate. Prostate cancer usually develops slowly.  There are multiple ways to treat prostate cancer, including expectant management, surgery (radical or robotic), radiation (external and internal), cryosurgery, hormone therapy and chemotherapy.
One of the main questions men ask prior to surgery is, “How will these treatment options affect my ability to have and maintain an erection?”  Anatomically, a delicate web of nerves surrounds the prostate and many forms of treatment can affect this nerve net. These nerves are responsible for relaying the signals that control erections. Damage to these nerves can cause permanent change and prevent the ability to achieve and maintain an erection.
Oral medication, including the three most commonly prescribed pills, has proven to be ineffective for helping erectile function after nerve damage from prostate cancer treatment. These oral medications rely on nerve signals to increase blood flow into the penis.  When these nerves can no longer conduct signals to cause an erection, the next step is providing information directly to the penis.
Don’t let prostate cancer treatments prevent you from having a great sex life. There are other medical treatments available.
Sources:

cancer.org what is prostate cancer?
Journal of the American Medical Association - tadalafil (Cialis) is not effective for preventing erectile dysfunction
UCLA - prostate cancer and erectile dysfunction

 



Erectile Dysfunction (ED) should NOT be ignored.
ED can significantly effect your love life and indicate a decline in your cardiovascular health.
According to a study done by the Australian National University, men with ED under the age of 55 are at risk of having heart disease, which makes sense because both the penis and your heart depend on healthy blood flow.

According to the project head, Emily Banks, “The risks of future heart disease and premature death increased steadily with severity of erectile dysfunction.” Men with severe ED and with no knowledge of having cardiovascular disease had a 35% chance to be hospitalized with an elevated 93% chance of mortality.
Based on these results, cardiovascular health director at Australia’s Heart Foundation stated, “These results tell us that every man who is suffering from any degree of erectile dysfunction should be seeking medical assistance as early as possible and also insisting on a heart health check by their GP at the same time.”
What can be determined from this research is that it's important to be diagnosed and understand the severity of your erectile dysfunction and what implications it may have for your health.

Source:
Banks, Emily, Grace Joshy, Walter P. Abhayaratna, Leonard Kritharides, Peter S. Macdonald, Rosemary J. Korda, and John P. Chalmers. "Erectile Dysfunction Severity as a Risk Marker for Cardiovascular Disease Hospitalisation and All-Cause Mortality: A Prospective Cohort Study." PLOS Medicine:. N.p., 29 Jan. 2013. Web. 15 Oct. 2014.

  

 


Some studies show that ED may be a marker for high blood pressure.
When blood pressure increases, it might damage the inner lining of the blood vessel, making it more difficult to bring and keep blood in the penis. If one is experiencing erectile dysfunction, it is important to be properly diagnosed to ensure that there are no other underlying health issues.

There are at least two types of high blood pressure medications that can cause erectile dysfunction:


Diuretics.  Also known as “water pills” and can reduce the amount of blood flow to the penis (which assists in maintaining a firmer erection).

Beta Blockers. Affect the same area of the nervous system that is responsible for producing erections.

Types of medication that do not affect sexual function are:

Angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors
Calcium channel blockers
Angiotensin II receptor blockers
Alpha blockers

Alternatives to blood pressure medication include:

Eat healthily and in moderation
Stop smoking
Reduce sodium intake
Lose weight
Exercise daily (walk when possible)

Sources:

Department of Physiology, Georgia Health Sciences University
Journal of Vascular Health Risk Management
Mayo Clinic

 




According to the Mayo Clinic and other sources, drinking in moderation may offer some health benefits.
Alcohol is often associated with social events and celebrations, and tends to be a social lubricant leading to flirtatious and confident conversations between the sexes. There's a reason why alcohol is called liquid courage.
It is also commonly known that when a man has too much to drink, he may have temporary erectile dysfunction (the inability to perform while being inebriated). Excessive drinking can lead to a hindrance of sexual desire and the inability to become sexually stimulated.
Occasional social drinking can be fun, but when it comes to consistent binge drinking, the story changes. Excessive drinking can lead to negative repercussions. According to O’Keefe and Hunt, up to 75% of patients in alcohol rehabilitation programs have erectile dysfunction. Chronic alcohol abusers’ erectile failure may be the result of a combination of psychogenic and organic factors (for example, neuropathy).
An individual, on average, has the ability to metabolize one drink per hour. When more than one hourly drink is consumed, toxin levels increase in the body and begin to affect different organs.
Consistent binge drinking and alcoholism can lead to organ failure, in this instance, the penis. It is important to keep in mind that alcohol can affect your health and to also remember to drink responsibly to avoid any negative repercussions.




Erectile dysfunction issues are not uncommon for diabetics, however this should not prevent a full and enjoyable sex life.
Many men with diabetes who have ED might avoid seeking help in the mistaken belief that there is nothing that can be done. If you have tried the big pharma pills or any over the counter medication and have not seen results, please do not lose hope. You are not alone.  There are other medical treatments available.

 


Is your loss of interest due to ED or “Low T”?
Testosterone
Testosterone is a sex hormone produced mainly by the testicles. This hormone helps in the development of the testes and prostate, and also assists in increasing muscle mass, bone density, and the growth of body hair.
As men age the production of testosterone decreases; as the level declines, there may be a decrease in libido and an increase in lethargy. There could also be an increase of fat around the stomach and a drop in muscle definition. 
A percentage of men who use testosterone hormone replacement therapy might notice a sense of well-being, plus a decrease in abdominal fat and greater muscle definition. Increasing testosterone levels may yield additional positive effects, including Osteoporosis prevention. While replacing testosterone may help increase libido, it does not have a direct effect on erectile function.
Erectile Dysfunction
The average man in his 50’s is likely to suffer from erectile dysfunction. For some men this begins in their late teens, for others in their 60’s. As men grow older, the penis does not trap blood properly. This results in a softening of the erection. This condition can be helped with numerous treatments.
For an erection to occur, multiple physical dynamics are involved. First, an increase in arterial blood must flow into the penis. Then, that increased volume of blood must be trapped causing the veins (that normally carry blood away from the penis) to get engorged. 
The duration and strength of an erection are dependent upon the increased blood flow remaining in the penis. Age, medical conditions, medicines and lifestyle choices can affect the ability of the penis to receive and retain blood. This results in less firm erections or erectile dysfunction. 
It is possible that your lack of interest is due to “low T”. It is also possible that when your ED is treated your interest in intimacy will be renewed.
Unfortunately, erectile dysfunction will affect most men - this is simply a fact of life. It is nothing to be ashamed of or embarrassed by. But there are other medical treatments available.
 
 





Women are taught, from the time of our first menses, that we will experience menopause. None of us are happy about it, some of us will fight it tooth and nail, but it is a fact of life.
Did you know that, as men age, they may experience hair loss, greying, wrinkles and a need for glasses, a larger belt and blood pressure pills? Oftentimes, these pills are simply not effective with some medical conditions (prostate issues, paralysis, diabetes, hypertension).

The fact that they are swallowed affects the entire system.  As they dilate the arteries and allow the blood to enter the penis more easily, they also dilate the entire system.  This might cause “flushing,” headache, backache and other side effects (some too onerous for continued use).
They will eventually lose their effectiveness.

This is not unusual. This is not his fault. And it is certainly not your fault. It’s natural and to be expected. But it’s not the end. There are other medical treatments available.

Sensitivity​: Determined by how many vibration sensors a man was born with in his penis. Men with more vibration sensors climax more quickly.

Brain Receptors​: Receive the vibration information from the penis and are affected by alcohol, which slows their response times.

The ability of the penis to re-charge, and climax again, declines.

story:
Short Summary 

By utilizing state of the art balance equipment from Bosu® to challenge you in ways traditional training cannot, Corbing™ teaches individuals to execute core and balance-intensive dynamic movements and static hold initiated and controlled from the core on three different surfaces: the floor, the Bosu® Balance Trainer, and the Bosu® Ballast® Ball. What makes this form of training so unique are the seamless interconnections and fluid nature made possible by what we call "transitional" movements. However, this program can also be approached from a more traditional training structure with a specified number of sets, repetitions, and rest periods to allow you to focus on specific exercises.

Corbing™ can help you:

     -Increase core strength and control

     -Increase all aspects of body strength

     -Increase athletic performance

     -Improve all aspects of balance

     -Improve coordination

     -Improve reaction speeds/abilities

     -Improve body awareness and control

     -Improve functional movements

     -Increase mind-body connection/awareness

Exercise is not just for athletes looking to increase performance. It is a way to train our bodies and minds to respond appropriately and effectively to the constantly changing environment that is our world. When most people think of "traditional" exercise, they often picture a row of machines and a very rigidly structured exercise program that lacks creativity and imagination. While this "traditional" approach does have its various health benefits, its application to real-life activities is often very limited.

In athletics as well as everyday life, having the ability to move our bodies in an effective, efficient, and synergistic manner translates to better performance and reduced risk for injury. When we teach our bodies to work as one complete unit, we begin to truly unleash our full athletic potential. When combined with other forms of exercise and sport-specific training, Corbing™ can provide the avenue all athletes are searching for to gain an edge on their competition. For the non-athlete, Corbing™ can provide the training to increase all aspects of fitness so you can increase your quality of life.

The Material

I have written a 560 page instructional training manual for Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, and Expert levels of Corbing™. However, gaining a strong understanding as to the mechanics and the execution  of some the more complex movements can be difficult to ascertain just through descriptions and pictures. It is for this reason that many of the more complex movements will also need to be explained through a visual demonstration in the form of a short video. A corresponding DVD will come with the training manual to help participants successfully learn to execute the movements safely and properly. 

As participants learn the various movements, there is a section in the  instructional manual to help individuals construct their own workouts. We have listed hundreds of suggested compatible exercise sequences listed in the back of the manual to help people get started building fun, creative, and challenging workouts. 

Having successfully written the instructional manual and chosen the exercises that will be explained on the corresponding instructional DVD, we need to come up with the funding to:

     -Publish the manual in both hardcopy and electronic form through a Publishing company (Bookmasters).

-Hire a small film crew to film, edit, and create an interactive DVD for the list of chosen Corbing™ movements that are to be explained through visual demonstration (Paper Star Productions).

It is my goal to change the way people look at exercise. I want to inspire people to move their bodies and improve their health. Exercise is my passion and it is a great way to improve your quality of life. Corbing™ is simply a new, unique, creative, and challenging way to increase your fitness level, whether it be for a specific sport or better overall health. Indiegogo....help us make Corbing™ a success!!! 

What We Need & What You Get 

Since the Corbing™ instructional manual is already written, the list of exercises to be explained through visual demonstrations on the corresponding DVD have already been selected, and I will be performing the demonstrations, the only real hurdle left is raising the capital to fund the publishing of the project. The publisher (Bookmasters) already gave us a quote for both the hardcopy and electronic publishing, as did the Film Crew (Paper Star Productions).

Once the capital is raised, the actual filming of the corresponding DVD will only take 2 days to film and a week to edit and format into an interactive DVD. The publishing for the hardcopy as well as electronic manual will take about two weeks to have products in hand.

Paper Star Productions has quoted us at $6450.00 for the entire interactive DVD production. The itemized list is as follows:

Crew of 3 for shoot- 2 days= $3000.00 
Equipment rental- 2 days= $500.00 
Gym/Space rental- 2 days= $600.00 
VO recording- 1/2 day= $250.00 
Editing- 4 days= $2000.00 
misc materials- $100.00 
Grand Total= $6450.00

The quote for the electronic and hardcopy publishing of the Corbing™ manual from Bookmasters is as follows: 
-$11.60 per book for 100 copies of the black and white version of physical manual. 
-$720 for the conversion of both the ePUB and ePDF file types. 
The start-up cost for the E-book distribution service that distributes to various Online E-book retailers is normally $395 with a monthly fee of $22.95 x12 months. 
So the grand total for 100 hardcopies, both electronic versions, and E-book distribution option is $2,550.40

This plus the DVD production quote puts us at a grand total of 9,000.40. We are anticipating a few unexpected expenses along the way to get this fully published and launched so we are asking for an additional $1,000 buffer money to ensure that these unexpected expenses can be dealt with swiftly to ensure fast delivery of the finished product. If successful, Indiegogo will take a percentage of the project. This is partly what the extra money is for. So in order for us to get the full $9,000, we are setting the fundraiser goal for $10,000.

I believe the most challenging aspect is going to be the 2 full days it takes to film the movements for the instructional DVD and doing the audio voice-over narration for the actual descriptions. There are always setbacks that occur with any major project. Any setbacks that do occur, however major or minor, will be dealt with swiftly and effectively with the same dedication and determination I put into developing this entire Corbing™ method, manual, and Indiegogo project. I will be honest and transparent with all my backers and keep them informed every step of this process.

The Impact

I have spent the last two years of my life living with my parents so that I could devote all of my time and energy to developing this new and exciting method of exercise. I'm Attention Deficit, so this was not the easiest task in the world. The downside of this is that I didn't work full-time and thus have no money to fund this enterprise. That being said, I will stop at nothing to make Corbing™ successful. 

Getting the funding from Indiegogo will make this process exponentially faster and easier, but be clear that I will do everything in my power to make Corbing™ a success whether this fundraising project succeeds or not. For the past two years, I have poured my heart, soul, and limited funds into this endeavor to get to where I'm at right now. Should this fundraiser be successful, rest assured that I will back my end of the deal as quickly and professionally as possible with complete transparency. I am extremely passionate about this and with your help, we can make Corbing™ a success and change the way people exercise!

Corbing™ is the first of its kind with regard to exercise. It is a new, unique, creative, challenging, and fun way to stimulate the body and mind through physical movement. In a country where obesity has become an epidemic, coming up with new ways to inspire people to improve their health is invaluable. We have done a number of Corbing™ demonstrations at various fitness conventions and the response is overwhelmingly positive! People get excited when they discover this new and stimulating method of exercise! They express genuine interest in wanting to learn to develop new levels of core strength and balance through this new method of training. So help me take my passion for exercise and inspire people to improve their health because health is the foundation for a happy life:)

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute you can still help Corbing™ succeed. Help spread the word that there is a new and exciting method of training out there for people of all ability levels. Share our video, share this campaign page, share anything because we want to reach as many people as possible not only to make this fundraiser successful, but to help increase awareness that will hopefully inspire more people to improve their health!

Extensive Description of Corbing™ philosophy, objectives, and equipment

The Future of Exercise

There are many factors that contribute to better performance. Corbing™ chooses to focus on what we believe to be the most important factors for better performance in athletics as well as life. These factors are balance, core strength and control, dynamic full-body movement, reaction abilities/coordination, flexibility, and mind-body connection. Corbing™ is not intended to monopolize your exercise routine. It is intended to be used in conjunction with other forms of exercise and sport-specific training to provide you the opportunity to develop your strongest and most balanced self.

The Core

Your core is the foundation of all movement. Your core is what connects your upper and lower body together. All of your physical movement originates from your core. The name says it all. It is the core of your body. It is involved in everything from everyday living activities to elite level athletics. Thus a stronger core allows your movements to become more powerful and effective. In athletics, this translates to better performance. In life, this translates to an improvement in your everyday life tasks and reduced risk for injury. By creating a strong core foundation, we set the base for developing our most athletic self.

The Importance of Balance

Balance, or proprioception, is essentially your awareness of where your body is in relation to space. Being able to remain stable and in control in a constantly changing environment is the foundation for successful movement not only in sports, but also life. The more control you have over your balance, the more efficient and safe you will be in your movements. Executing movements on unstable surfaces (Bosu® equipment) forces our bodies to adapt to this instability by cultivating stability. This translates to better balance, strength, and performance. It is not enough to simply build strong muscles anymore. We must also create smart muscles that work in a synergistic manner with the rest of our bodies.

Connecting the Mind to the Body

For most of us, exercise is a tool that is meant to enrich our lives outside of the gym by providing us with better health. Whether it is a sports-related goal or simply a desire to increase fitness for everyday living, exercise is a great means by which to achieve these things. As a child who was diagnosed with Attention Deficit Disorder at the age of 5, I struggled my entire life with focus. Exercise was the vehicle that taught me how to focus by connecting my mind to my body. 

Surprisingly enough, many people who exercise focus solely on the body and forget to incorporate the mind. In a world filled with stressful stimuli, it is inconceivable that most people do not allocate time and energy toward strengthening their minds like they do their bodies. When you are Corbing™, you are focusing on many different aspects of fitness ranging from coordination, core strength, to breath awareness. More importantly, you are cultivating the ability to cope with emotions such as frustration, disappointment, doubt in your own capabilities, feelings of failure, and other such adverse emotions. By using exercise, in this case Corbing™, as a medium to overcome these obstacles in the fitness arena, you will develop confidence in your ability to deal with similar obstacles in other areas of your life.

If your mind is not on the same page as your body, your training will likely suffer. However, when you obtain strong mental and physical engagement, your training will be much more enjoyable and effective. Balance training requires a significant amount of focus, much more so than simply getting onto a stationary bike for an hour. It can be extremely frustrating at times, but this required level of intense focus provides the environment to overcome these various mental and physical obstacles. 

As your proficiency increases, you will slowly begin to experience a mind-body phenomenon we call "flow." This is the state where your mind becomes completely connected to your body and time slows to only the present. You are completely engaged in the now. It is a powerful state of mind that requires focus, persistence, and dedication to attain. 

Progression

Ballast® Ball-based Corbing™ is more difficult to learn initially, so we have broken down the movements to their most basic forms so they can be performed on more forgiving surfaces and equipment including floor mats and the Bosu® Balance Trainer. This natural progression from floor to Balance Trainer to Ballast® Ball allows your body and mind the adequate time and repetition to safely learn and execute the movements. Should you choose to never progress to the Ballast® Ball, there are still endless possibilities for challenging workouts on the floor and Balance Trainer.

Corbing™ Philosophy

Corbing™ is difficult. There is a learning curve, and the higher level movements can involve some risk. As you progress into these intermediate and advanced level exercises, you will fall down. If it were easy, the rewards would be small. As infants, we all progressed from crawling to walking, but what we must remember is that the period in between those two points was filled with countless stumbles and falls. As stated earlier, the mental battles you will face and conquer are just as important as the physical ones. 

With dedication and determination, you can and will progress to levels you never thought you could achieve both mentally and physically. Use this confidence to then achieve success in all other areas of your life. The only way you can fail in this program is by quitting. Every slip, stumble, and fall is one step closer to stabilization. The path to success in this program is filled with many mistakes, plenty of frustration, and humility. When you fall, pick yourself up and keep moving forward.

Remember that Corbing™ stresses the importance of balance in all aspects of your training not only physically but metaphorically as well. Part of any successful exercise program lies in the balance of its variety. As stated earlier, Corbing™ is not meant to monopolize your training. It is intended to be used in conjunction with other forms of training. When used in this manner, it will add a new and stimulating element to your training that will help you develop your strongest and most balanced self.

The Balance Trainer

The Bosu® Pro Balance Trainer is one of the most versatile pieces of balance equipment in the fitness industry. Although it appears small and simple, when utilized properly this piece of equipment can become a catalyst for serious fitness gains. Its design allows individuals from all athletic abilities to utilize it at various levels of difficulty. Because it can also be utilized on both sides by simply turning the device over, you can dramatically alter the way your body is challenged. In addition, it is safer than a stability ball for reasons related to potential fall height. Its profile is low enough to the floor that in the event of a loss of balance, an individual can simply step down onto solid ground to safety. Whether one is a beginner level participant improving his/her ability to simply stand and balance, or an advanced level participant executing high degree difficulty maneuvers, the Balance Trainer is usable by everyone in the exercise population. Due to the stationary nature of the Balance Trainer, it is more compatible from a classic workout structure with sets and repetitions. While it is possible to execute many transitions on the Balance Trainer, it is difficult to attain the true interconnected and seamless transitions that you can attain on dry-land and Ballast® Ball Pro surfaces. That being said, it is quite possibly the most versatile piece of equipment in this manual.

The Ballast® Ball

At first glance, the Bosu® Ballast® Ball Pro resembles your typical stability ball. Upon further inspection, one quickly comes to the realization that there is nothing “typical” about this piece of equipment. In contrast to other stability balls on the market, the Bosu® Ballast® Ball Pro is constructed from high-quality, burst-resistant material. It has proven significantly more durable than other stability balls on the market. It is also filled with a synthetic sand-like material that serves multiple

Short Summary 
By utilizing state of the art balance equipment from Bosu® to challenge you in ways traditional training cannot, Corbing™ teaches individuals to execute core and balance-intensive dynamic movements and static hold initiated and controlled from the core on three different surfaces: the floor, the Bosu® Balance Trainer, and the Bosu® Ballast® Ball. What makes this form of training so unique are the seamless interconnections and fluid nature made possible by what we call "transitional" movements. However, this program can also be approached from a more traditional training structure with a specified number of sets, repetitions, and rest periods to allow you to focus on specific exercises.

Corbing™ can help you:
     -Increase core strength and control
     -Increase all aspects of body strength
     -Increase athletic performance
     -Improve all aspects of balance
     -Improve coordination
     -Improve reaction speeds/abilities
     -Improve body awareness and control
     -Improve functional movements
     -Increase mind-body connection/awarenessExercise is not just for athletes looking to increase performance. It is a way to train our bodies and minds to respond appropriately and effectively to the constantly changing environment that is our world. When most people think of "traditional" exercise, they often picture a row of machines and a very rigidly structured exercise program that lacks creativity and imagination. While this "traditional" approach does have its various health benefits, its application to real-life activities is often very limited.
In athletics as well as everyday life, having the ability to move our bodies in an effective, efficient, and synergistic manner translates to better performance and reduced risk for injury. When we teach our bodies to work as one complete unit, we begin to truly unleash our full athletic potential. When combined with other forms of exercise and sport-specific training, Corbing™ can provide the avenue all athletes are searching for to gain an edge on their competition. For the non-athlete, Corbing™ can provide the training to increase all aspects of fitness so you can increase your quality of life.The Material

I have written a 560 page instructional training manual for Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, and Expert levels of Corbing™. However, gaining a strong understanding as to the mechanics and the execution  of some the more complex movements can be difficult to ascertain just through descriptions and pictures. It is for this reason that many of the more complex movements will also need to be explained through a visual demonstration in the form of a short video. A corresponding DVD will come with the training manual to help participants successfully learn to execute the movements safely and properly. 
As participants learn the various movements, there is a section in the  instructional manual to help individuals construct their own workouts. We have listed hundreds of suggested compatible exercise sequences listed in the back of the manual to help people get started building fun, creative, and challenging workouts. 
Having successfully written the instructional manual and chosen the exercises that will be explained on the corresponding instructional DVD, we need to come up with the funding to:
     -Publish the manual in both hardcopy and electronic form through a Publishing company (Bookmasters).
-Hire a small film crew to film, edit, and create an interactive DVD for the list of chosen Corbing™ movements that are to be explained through visual demonstration (Paper Star Productions).
It is my goal to change the way people look at exercise. I want to inspire people to move their bodies and improve their health. Exercise is my passion and it is a great way to improve your quality of life. Corbing™ is simply a new, unique, creative, and challenging way to increase your fitness level, whether it be for a specific sport or better overall health. Indiegogo....help us make Corbing™ a success!!! What We Need & What You Get Since the Corbing™ instructional manual is already written, the list of exercises to be explained through visual demonstrations on the corresponding DVD have already been selected, and I will be performing the demonstrations, the only real hurdle left is raising the capital to fund the publishing of the project. The publisher (Bookmasters) already gave us a quote for both the hardcopy and electronic publishing, as did the Film Crew (Paper Star Productions).Once the capital is raised, the actual filming of the corresponding DVD will only take 2 days to film and a week to edit and format into an interactive DVD. The publishing for the hardcopy as well as electronic manual will take about two weeks to have products in hand.Paper Star Productions has quoted us at $6450.00 for the entire interactive DVD production. The itemized list is as follows:Crew of 3 for shoot- 2 days= $3000.00 Equipment rental- 2 days= $500.00 Gym/Space rental- 2 days= $600.00 VO recording- 1/2 day= $250.00 Editing- 4 days= $2000.00 misc materials- $100.00 Grand Total= $6450.00The quote for the electronic and hardcopy publishing of the Corbing™ manual from Bookmasters is as follows: -$11.60 per book for 100 copies of the black and white version of physical manual. -$720 for the conversion of both the ePUB and ePDF file types. The start-up cost for the E-book distribution service that distributes to various Online E-book retailers is normally $395 with a monthly fee of $22.95 x12 months. So the grand total for 100 hardcopies, both electronic versions, and E-book distribution option is $2,550.40This plus the DVD production quote puts us at a grand total of 9,000.40. We are anticipating a few unexpected expenses along the way to get this fully published and launched so we are asking for an additional $1,000 buffer money to ensure that these unexpected expenses can be dealt with swiftly to ensure fast delivery of the finished product. If successful, Indiegogo will take a percentage of the project. This is partly what the extra money is for. So in order for us to get the full $9,000, we are setting the fundraiser goal for $10,000.I believe the most challenging aspect is going to be the 2 full days it takes to film the movements for the instructional DVD and doing the audio voice-over narration for the actual descriptions. There are always setbacks that occur with any major project. story: Hi I am Lynn and I work for My Friends, Debbie and Ron Heiman of Kingston who own a small flowers shop" Everything Floral" in Genoa and W. Dundee. They are going through hard times. Ron has sinus cancer and unable to work at this time. Ron has been layed off work on and off for over 2 years. They are losing their health insurance June 30th due to the cancer and inability to work. With Ron's condition it is hard for them to find affordable insurance for him and his family. Ron will not be completed with his current treatments for a couple more months, and has  been through 2 surgeries already. What insurance hasn't covered is going into collections. The family was already in a financial crunch with the layoffs and business being slow for Debbie.  The remaining radiation treatments, cat scans, doctor visits and treatment traveling is a real worry for his family. Please help in any way if you can to help them avoid any further hardship.  We would be greatful for any amount raised even if its not the goal, the primary goal is just to help this deserving family in any amount we can. Thank you!!

Thank you!!

story:
WORLD'S FIRST INTEGRATED INFANT GROWTH MONITORING KIT 

 

Growth is an important indicator for the health and nutritional status of a child. A comparison of the vital parameters such as length/height, head circumference and weight determine a child growth

There's a lot going on in those first three years of a child . While every baby develops differently and at their own pace, but there are milestones to look out for.The absence of certain milestones or a delay in acquiring new skills may be a sign of an underlying problem or a medical illness.

The length of a baby at birth is approximately 50cms. By the first year it increases by 50% to 75 cms. By the end of third year it increases by 12 cms. Low height for age indicates nutritional stunting or dwarfing. It reflects past or chronic stunting. 

A baby's brain and head do 80 percent of their growing during the first two years. Measuring head circumference helps to track the brain's growth as the skull bones fuse together.The most common disability associated with this is, intellectual delay; other common concomitant conditions include epilepsy, cerebral palsy, language delay, strabismus, ophthalmologic disorders, and cardiac, renal, urinary tract, microcephaly, and skeletal anomalies.

Early identification of Length and Head circumference concerns can be a critical first step in identifying disorders  leading to referral to paediatric specialists and, as needed, provision of family-centered early intervention services.

To make it easier, we MEZHER will help parents by developing the world's first integrated growth monitoring kit to take these measurements at home with simple and easy techniques (elaborated by the World Health Organisation),  understand and interpret the results to make sure your child’s growth are on track. You could also review their feeding based on these results in the growth monitoring chart and mobile app provided in the kit 

 

 

INFANTOMETER

A GUIDE TO ACCURATELY MEASURE THE LENGTH OF YOUR NEWBORN

MEZHER Infantometer Mat is designed for measuring baby length in lying down position using a very simple method.You will need to lay your newborn on a flat surface, and stretch their legs out to get an accurate measurement from the top of their head to the soles of their feet.

HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE TAPE

AN ESSENTIAL TAPE TO MEASURE THE NEWBORN HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE  

MEZHER HC Tape can wrapped around the widest part of your baby’s head from above the eyebrows, passing above the ears, to the back of baby's head to measure the value accurately 

GROWTH CHART

Our charts allow parents to plot and measure their child's height and head circumference from birth to 3 years (WHO graph) . The growth chart will help to plot the percentiles in a curved pattern in  LENGTH vs AGE and HC vs AGE format , this graphical representation  shows where a child growth percentile 

 

DEVELOPMENT TRACKER WITH SMART MEZHER APP

Mezher app will automatically plot Growth chart based on the measurements taken by our scales for your child based on World Health Organisation (WHO) Z score. Thus monitoring your child's sizes and growth timelines will be made more easy .

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

RESEARCH STUDIES FROM US NATIONAL LIBRARY OF MEDICINE

 

WHY MEZHER IS DIFFERENT FROM OTHERS

Today, a lot of articles and blogs are available on net. Many of them lack specificity and scientific advise and information.  We are group of engineers who have came up with an idea of introducing world first Mezher growth kit to provide correct information in most simplest way so that parents can ensure growth & development of their child in right direction.

We have  set our goal to the smallest amount as we can complete the project and fulfil your perks even if the quantities are low.We already have our product prototype and testing ready for shipping to you at the earliest.And the manufacturing process of the Infant growth monitoring kit is not depended on the quantity so your product will get guaranteed  delivery .

TIMELINE CHART

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

  1. What are some of the vital parameters of children's growth?

    Vital parameters of child growth are length/height, head circumference and weight

  2. Are MEZHER products satisfying WHO standards?

     Yes, all products of MEZHER are elaborated by the WHO standards .

  3. What is the procedure for calculating infants height using infantometer?

       *Children below two years are measured by using an infantometer.

       *Baby is made to lie on the scale and crown-heel length is measured.

       *For children above two years and adults a vertical measuring rod anthropometer-

        is used and maximum height is measured.

  4. What is the age limit for using infantometer?

      Children below two years are measured by using an infantometer.

  5. How is HC tape used to measure Head Circumference?

       Head circumference is recorded by passing the tape around the head over the supraorbital ridges of the frontal bone in front and the most protruding point of occiput on the back of the head.

  6. Is HC tape a tearable material ?

      No, it is a non tearable material.

  7. What Measurements Are Put on the our Growth Charts?

     Growth chart plots the measures length, and head circumference

  8. Are All Kids Measured on One Growth Chart?

    Two border growth charts are available - Pink border growth charts and blue border charts- Pink border growth charts are for girls and blue border charts are for boys.

  9. What Are Percentiles?

    Percentiles are measurements that show where a child is compared with others. On the growth charts,the percentiles are shown as lines drawn in curved patterns.

  10. How often growth monitoring is needed for infants?

    Growth monitoring should done Every month- during the first year, Every two months – during the second year and Every three months up to five to six year
story_txt:
WORLD'S FIRST INTEGRATED INFANT GROWTH MONITORING KIT  Growth is an important indicator for the health and nutritional status of a child. A comparison of the vital parameters such as length/height, head circumference and weight determine a child growthThere's a lot going on in those first three years of a child . While every baby develops differently and at their own pace, but there are milestones to look out for.The absence of certain milestones or a delay in acquiring new skills may be a sign of an underlying problem or a medical illness.The length of a baby at birth is approximately 50cms. By the first year it increases by 50% to 75 cms. By the end of third year it increases by 12 cms. Low height for age indicates nutritional stunting or dwarfing. It reflects past or chronic stunting. A baby's brain and head do 80 percent of their growing during the first two years. Measuring head circumference helps to track the brain's growth as the skull bones fuse together.The most common disability associated with this is, intellectual delay; other common concomitant conditions include epilepsy, cerebral palsy, language delay, strabismus, ophthalmologic disorders, and cardiac, renal, urinary tract, microcephaly, and skeletal anomalies.Early identification of Length and Head circumference concerns can be a critical first step in identifying disorders  leading to referral to paediatric specialists and, as needed, provision of family-centered early intervention services.To make it easier, we MEZHER will help parents by developing the world's first integrated growth monitoring kit to take these measurements at home with simple and easy techniques (elaborated by the World Health Organisation),  understand and interpret the results to make sure your child’s growth are on track. You could also review their feeding based on these results in the growth monitoring chart and mobile app provided in the kit   INFANTOMETERA GUIDE TO ACCURATELY MEASURE THE LENGTH OF YOUR NEWBORNMEZHER Infantometer Mat is designed for measuring baby length in lying down position using a very simple method.You will need to lay your newborn on a flat surface, and stretch their legs out to get an accurate measurement from the top of their head to the soles of their feet.HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE TAPEAN ESSENTIAL TAPE TO MEASURE THE NEWBORN HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE  MEZHER HC Tape can wrapped around the widest part of your baby’s head from above the eyebrows, passing above the ears, to the back of baby's head to measure the value accurately 
GROWTH CHARTOur charts allow parents to plot and measure their child's height and head circumference from birth to 3 years (WHO graph) . The growth chart will help to plot the percentiles in a curved pattern in  LENGTH vs AGE and HC vs AGE format , this graphical representation  shows where a child growth percentile  DEVELOPMENT TRACKER WITH SMART MEZHER APPMezher app will automatically plot Growth chart based on the measurements taken by our scales for your child based on World Health Organisation (WHO) Z score. Thus monitoring your child's sizes and growth timelines will be made more easy .          RESEARCH STUDIES FROM US NATIONAL LIBRARY OF MEDICINE WHY MEZHER IS DIFFERENT FROM OTHERSToday, a lot of articles and blogs are available on net. Many of them lack specificity and scientific advise and information.  We are group of engineers who have came up with an idea of introducing world first Mezher growth kit to provide correct information in most simplest way so that parents can ensure growth & development of their child in right direction.We have  set our goal to the smallest amount as we can complete the project and fulfil your perks even if the quantities are low.We already have our product prototype and testing ready for shipping to you at the earliest.And the manufacturing process of the Infant growth monitoring kit is not depended on the quantity so your product will get guaranteed  delivery .TIMELINE CHART FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS 

What are some of the vital parameters of children's growth?
Vital parameters of child growth are length/height, head circumference and weight


Are MEZHER products satisfying WHO standards?
 Yes, all products of MEZHER are elaborated by the WHO standards .


What is the procedure for calculating infants height using infantometer?
   *Children below two years are measured by using an infantometer.
   *Baby is made to lie on the scale and crown-heel length is measured.
   *For children above two years and adults a vertical measuring rod anthropometer-
    is used and maximum height is measured.


What is the age limit for using infantometer?
  Children below two years are measured by using an infantometer.


How is HC tape used to measure Head Circumference?
   Head circumference is recorded by passing the tape around the head over the supraorbital ridges of the frontal bone in front and the most protruding point of occiput on the back of the head.


Is HC tape a tearable material ?
  No, it is a non tearable material.


What Measurements Are Put on the our Growth Charts?
 Growth chart plots the measures length, and head circumference


Are All Kids Measured on One Growth Chart?
Two border growth charts are available - Pink border growth charts and blue border charts- Pink border growth charts are for girls and blue border charts are for boys.


What Are Percentiles?
Percentiles are measurements that show where a child is compared with others. On the growth charts,the percentiles are shown as lines drawn in curved patterns.


How often growth monitoring is needed for infants?
Growth monitoring should done Every month- during the first year, Every two months – during the second year and Every three months up to five to six year
