story:
Vive Perú is a nonprofit organization dedicated to fostering understanding of Latin American and Peruvian culture and providing much-needed aid to Peruvian communities. We work to promote cultural understanding and implement innovative and self-sustainable programs in the areas of health, education, social work and engineering.

Through its relationship with local organizations and institutions, Vive Perú is in continuous dialogue with the Peruvian community to design sustainable projects and initiatives that will have a long-term impact in the areas we work. Much-needed aid is provided through medical campaigns, health education campaigns, English workshops, music enrichment programs and Internet installation projects.

Volunteers are an integral part of our strategy in Peru. Their time, energy, creativity and fundraising efforts make our programs possible, and the relationships they form with the communities in Peru are signs of how programs like this not only support development but are also forming future generations to have a deeper appreciation for other cultures.

 

We invite you to browse our website to learn more about our work in Peru, read about volunteers' experiences first hand and learn how to support our mission. We invite you to become part of a network of volunteers and donors who are working for a brighter future.

viveperu.org

story:
THE NEVADA SENIOR GAMES NEEDS A FINANCIAL HAND

My name is David Rosinsky, and I am just reaching my 60th birthday this coming April.  I graduated from Niagara University in Upstate New York, with a degree in Physical Education, and enjoyed a youthful athletic background in competitive swimming, volleyball, and crew. Although I am older now, I am still very active in triathlon, swimming, cycling, running, volleyball, and other sports. 

The State of Nevada Senior Olympic Games was a life saver for me, and gave me the opportunity to fulfill a life long dream of trying to be an Olympian like my swimming idol Mark Spitz, (my generation of Michael Phelps).

Ask most younger people, and they will tell you that after the age of 50, life is about lounging in a rocking chair on the front porch watching the world go by.

But for more and more people that reach that half century mark, the word active is the norm, and participation in the Senior Games is the program that thousands across the United States turn to to fulfill fitness dreams and goals.

The Senior Games is a national organization, with state programs of athletic competition for people over the age of 50 who wish to remain active, competitive, and aggressive in an athletic arena.  The workouts, the practices, and the games themselves are the fuel that keep us alive.

Every year the Nevada Senior Games holds an Olympic style event hosting over 20 different sports, with hundreds of competitors from all over the United States, as well as Russia, and other international contingents.  Competitors love coming to our games because...well after all it is Las Vegas.  Just like the other conventions and events that take place in Las Vegas, senior tourists also spend money in town at casinos, food establishments, and local shops, boosting our hard hit economy.

Although there are Senior Games events in many cities around Nevada, Las Vegas is the main city for qualifying for the National competitions that occur every two years.

We need financial help!

As the economy fell, so to have donations, sponsors, and other financial backers for our program.  The state program is operated almost entirely by volunteers, but expenses, such as venues, medals, and permits continue to require cash, and we are in trouble.

With out your help, we will have to cut back on the program, reduce the opportunities to keep our senior communities active, and watch as more and more of your parents, grandparents, and even great grand parents who love sports and athletics lose the program that keeps them alive.

What We Need & What You Get

For the upcoming season and the games that have already starting, we need an immediate influx of $50,000.00 in donations.

Items such as golf course fees, shooting range fees, and swimming pool rentals along with the electronic timing equipment are all just some of the unavoidable expenses right off the top.  Participation registration fees are nominal, and do not even cover the tee shirts or medals awarded to the participants.

Even though the office space is donated, it comes with a caveat that requires an expenditure of capital though out the year.  Other office expenses, such as equipment and supplies seem to continue to climb beyond our reach.

Please be aware that No money is spent on race directors, event managers, or auxiliary support personell as they are all non-paid volunteers.

In the past, we have always relied on donations from the local community businesses to keep our goals and purpose within reach, but times have changed, and now we need your help to continue our important work.

Donate $25.00 and receive a copy of the beautiful results booklet that is sent out to all participating athletes, with an official thank you letter from the Board of Directors.

Donate $50.00 and get a copy of the results booklet, and a letter and picture from a participating athlete, along with an official thank you letter from the Board of Directors.

Donate $100.00 or more and get a copy of the CD highlighting a variety of events from the Las Vegas Senior Olympic Games, along with an official thank you letter from the Board of Directors.

The Impact

Without your help, the Nevada Senior Games in Las Vegas, after 32 years of providing services, may cease to exist.  Senior athletes will not have the venue to continue demonstrating that age 50 and over is just a number and not the end of life.

The Senior Games is a vital part of the world of the Olympic Games, the Special Olympics, the Para Olympic Games, and athletic competition starting from early childhood, through school, and on into professional sports.

Thank you for keeping the Olympic dream alive for thousands of seniors and their famlies.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can’t contribute in these amounts, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask other friends and family members to help or just get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Click on the Indiegogo share tools and get ideas to help
  • Send in what ever amount you can, as each dollar helps
  • Donate services such as printing for booklets or shirts, office supplies
  • Donate entertainment services for fund raisers
  • Volunteer at the events or other necessary duties
  • Other creative options are always appreciated

story:
WHY YOGA?

It’s very simple; I love yoga for what it has done to my mind, body and soul.  I want to help others experience that same joy and transformation that I experienced in such a short period of time and share it with others.  

I started practicing yoga about a year ago and it has changed my life in such positive ways.  I finally began to love and respect my body like I have never thought I could.  I began seeing myself as independent, elegant and beautiful.  While the transformation was happening others began to view me in the same light I saw myself.  With this incredible response from friends and family I instantly knew that my life had been changed forever and that I must share this incredibly beautiful feeling with others and teach yoga as I was taught!

WHAT CAN I DO WITH YOGA?

I believe that if a single individual can transform so can a community.  Through a peaceful and loving environment with the given tools we can all become the creatures we are destined to be. Yoga is a powerful tool of transformation. It not only helps a person physically but the mental tranquility it offers is astonishing.

My goal as a yoga teacher will be to share this beautiful gift with others. Being able to teach yoga will allow me to contribute to another dimension of self exploration.

I also plan to volunteer as often as possible and use this to help any soul whose path I cross.

WHAT DO I NEED?

I am blessed to be part of a beautiful studio called LEAP Yoga and will be taking part of the 200-hour yoga alliance certified teacher training. It begins January 3rd through March 24th. The entire training is $3000.00. They have been kind enough to allow a payment plan so I have a few months to make this dream happen! This has been quite the obstacle for me, but have decided to take a LEAP of faith and put this out into the Universe to see what will come of it.

WHAT YOU CAN DO?

Share my request with people you think may be interested in supporting my dream, wish upon a falling star, bargain with a leprechaun, buy a winning lottery ticket and send a few dollars my way while crossing your fingers and toes and then saying a few prayers and of course, please share what you can.

THANK YOU for considering this and for all the love sent my way!
story_txt:
WHY YOGA?
It’s very simple; I love yoga for what it has done to my mind, body and soul.  I want to help others experience that same joy and transformation that I experienced in such a short period of time and share it with others.  
I started practicing yoga about a year ago and it has changed my life in such positive ways.  I finally began to love and respect my body like I have never thought I could.  I began seeing myself as independent, elegant and beautiful.  While the transformation was happening others began to view me in the same light I saw myself.  With this incredible response from friends and family I instantly knew that my life had been changed forever and that I must share this incredibly beautiful feeling with others and teach yoga as I was taught!
WHAT CAN I DO WITH YOGA?
I believe that if a single individual can transform so can a community.  Through a peaceful and loving environment with the given tools we can all become the creatures we are destined to be. Yoga is a powerful tool of transformation. It not only helps a person physically but the mental tranquility it offers is astonishing.
My goal as a yoga teacher will be to share this beautiful gift with others. Being able to teach yoga will allow me to contribute to another dimension of self exploration.
I also plan to volunteer as often as possible and use this to help any soul whose path I cross.
WHAT DO I NEED?
I am blessed to be part of a beautiful studio called LEAP Yoga and will be taking part of the 200-hour yoga alliance certified teacher training. It begins January 3rd through March 24th. The entire training is $3000.00. They have been kind enough to allow a payment plan so I have a few months to make this dream happen! This has been quite the obstacle for me, but have decided to take a LEAP of faith and put this out into the Universe to see what will come of it.
WHAT YOU CAN DO?
Share my request with people you think may be interested in supporting my dream, wish upon a falling star, bargain with a leprechaun, buy a winning lottery ticket and send a few dollars my way while crossing your fingers and toes and then saying a few prayers and of course, please share what you can.
THANK YOU for considering this and for all the love sent my way!

story:
Hello Australia (and the world)!


Interview by indiefilmworld.tv

_________________

Public Voting for MRS Australia Quest is now open. Voting is quick and easy, so any votes will be appreciated :) Love xx Yolandi          

CLICK BELOW, LIKE THE PAGE AND CLICK THE "VOTE" BUTTON ON MY FACE

http://woobox.com/3rocts/vote/for/2074853

_________________

Yolandi Franken is my name and I am a finalist in this year's Mrs Australia. 

I work as a Film Producer and Actress but feel very passionate about the topic of Women's Health.

I feel honoured to have this opportunity because it allows me to follow a passion of mine, which is doing something for charity.

The charity of choice for the MRS Australia Quest is Ovarian Cancer, a cancer that affects so many women in Australia.


I am aiming to raise as much funds and awareness by the end of March 2014. 

I have created this page to help raise funds but I will also be hosting events and other fundraiser activities.

FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK

How can you help

  • Cash Donations on this page - to go to Ovarian Cancer

Apart from this page:

  • Small gifts for attendees of any of my fundraiser events
  • Small gifts I can give as incentives for cash donations
  • An opportunity to host an event for “other circles” (venue, food sponsor, other ideas for events)
  • Media / Other Publicity Opportunities to create awareness
  • Any other suggestions welcome

Thank you in advance!


About Ovarian Cancer

Ovarian cancer is the leading cause of gynecological cancer deaths in Australia. Each year more than 1200 Australian women are diagnosed with 800 women will die

On average 3 Australian women are diagnosed every day. Approximately 75% of women are diagnosed at an advanced stage, where the cancer has spread and is difficult to treat successfully. Currently only 40% of women diagnosed with ovarian can-cer will be alive five years after diagnosis.

If ovarian cancer is diagnosed early, up to 80% of women will be alive and well after five years.

The four most commonly reported symptoms are:

  • Increased abdominal size or persistent bloating
  • Unexplained abdominal or pelvic pain
  • Difficulty eating or feeling full quickly
  • Needing to urinate often or urgently

Some women experience additional or different symptoms. You should let your doctor know if you have any other symptoms that are not usual for you these may include:

  • Changes in bowel habits
  • Unexplained weight loss or gain
  • Vaginal bleeding
  • Back pain
  • Indigestion or nausea
  • Excessive fatigue
  • Bloating

The majority of women who experience these early symptoms do not have cancer. However, it is important that you seek medical advice if the symptoms persist. IF YOU HAVE THE ABOVE SYMPTOMS FOR MORE THAN 2 WEEKS YOU SHOULD SEE YOUR GP.

Survival

Every woman with ovarian cancer is treated as an individual case, depending on the stage of the disease and other personal factors. It is therefore very difficult to give a general prognosis.If the cancer is diagnosed and treated early, between 80-100% of patients will survive for more than five years. But only approximately 30% of women diagnosed at advanced stages will survive for more than five years. See 'How is Ovarian Cancer Treated?' for further information about survival rates.

  • The five year survival rate for Australian women with ovarian cancer is only about 40%
  • In comparison, the five year survival rate for breast cancer is about 88%

THERE IS NO SCREENING TEST FOR OVARIAN CANCER. A PAP TEST IS USED TO DETECT CERVICAL CANCER IT DOES NOT DE-TECT OVARIAN CANCER. THIS IS A COMMON MISUNDERSTANDING BY A LOT OF WOMEN AND IT IS IMPORTANT THAT WE EDUCATE WOMEN ABOUT THIS.

story:
Human Trafficking in Houston

Human Trafficking affects 20 million people worldwide every year whether it be through labor trafficking or sex trafficking. Since Houston has a major interstate system, it's proximity to the Mexico border and has the port, Houston is a major hub for human trafficking, and the I-10 corridor is one of the most heavily traveled interstates for traffickers and victims.

The World Record

I have been playing disc golf for the better part of two years. The current record for the most disc golf holes played in 24 hours is 1,310. On May 17-18 I am going to attempt to break that record at Bobby Ford Park in Richwood, Texas.

The Goal

Human Rescue and Restore Coalition educates people and brings awareness to human trafficking. I believe that the first step to eliminate something like this is to make people aware of what is going on. All the money that is received from this fundraiser will go towards Houston Rescue and Restore Coalition.

If you cannot donate anything, but you would still like to help, you can donate any snacks or drinks for myself and any volunteer that may be present at the day of the record. If you wish to help assist on the actual day, you can do so. If you wish to volunteer or donate any kind of food, you can email me at cody.miller@ymail.com

story:
Update* 

THANK YOU for getting us to our goal and then some!  We opened up the campaign with the question, "Who Cares?"  And we hoped you would, and you did.   (You, and a bunch of other intelligent, visionary, good looking, nice, socially-minded and all-around great people.)

With your support, thousands of guys across the western US will begin ditching their synthetics and grooming a better way in nearly 70 Pharmaca and Whole Foods stores.  This adventure, born in Costa Rica and raised in San Francisco, will help them look better and live healthier.  And have more fun along the way. 

We’d love for you to continue the adventure with us.  Join our insiders club, here for news, perks, and more adventure.

Thrive products are now available on our online shop & at our retail partner stores:

Thrive Online Shop

Pharmaca 

Whole Foods Market (Northern California region only)

Thanks,

Alex & the whole Thrive Natural Care team


Help launch a wash and shave line to restore men's skin –and the Costa Rican landscape.

Hello!

We’re Thrive, and we're gearing up to launch a new kind of personal care product line for men, and a new kind of social enterprise to produce them – and we need your help.

Thrive began with the conviction that men can do better than the glop that dominates the market for grooming – and we’re guessing you’d agree.

You know, something without synthetics that restores skin naturally. Something with real personality. So we traveled to the rainforests and family farms of Costa Rica to source the highest quality, sustainably-harvested botanical ingredients for superior face care. After more than FIFTEEN MONTHS of research and refining, we’re here to ask for YOUR help in introducing this revolutionary new skin care line to the world.

Who Cares?

Guys, have you ever read the ingredients on your face wash or shave cream? We’ll bet you can’t pronounce them all. Your skin absorbs 60% (!) of what you put on it – including those nasty synthetic chemicals put in there to make the product last 100 years (give or take) on shelves!

“We absorb up to 60% of what we put on our skin.”

And for you readers out there who are dating a guy, when you kiss his face you’re bringing those same chemicals to your face, lips, whatever. Might as well be kissing a bottle of Windex. Doesn’t sound too hot to us, either.

The crazy thing is this: we don’t even need those toxic synthetics. We’ve discovered some pretty cool plants that work far better. And help you stay healthy. It just takes some skill and imagination to bring it all together in a package that lets a guy feel like a guy.

So, who cares? We do! Besides wanting you look great without the toxic nasties, and rather than “manufacture product” in some grimey factory, we built a new company from the ground up. In Costa Rica, we started a program empowering female entrepreneurs and created two restoration gardens with local farmers to grow the antioxidant plants that will help you look great. We’re keeping the value chain in Costa Rica as much as possible. Farming, processing, R&D, all happen in collaboration with local people. Trust us, it wasn’t easy – but it was worth it. To us, Thrive is about much more than just grooming; it's about bringing to life a company with a cool vision for helping people and the planet live healthier. What’s not to like about that?

Why We're Here.

Existential questions aside, we’re here because we need your help. The good news is at launch we’re rolling out to nearly 70 Whole Foods and Pharmaca stores (kinda a big deal :)!  A lot of the early heavy lifting is done.  



But here’s the challenge: top notch retailers like Whole Foods and Pharmaca give new brands two, maybe three months to prove themselves. Early results are thankfully positive, but we need to knock it out of the park in order to go national and convince millions of guys and the women who love ‘em to “ditch the synthetics” and choose something all around better. 

To do that we need two things: (1) a community of fans that will spread the word about our sexy, fun, masculine Thrive products; and (2) marketing dollars to “turn the launch volume” WAY up so its a shout on a megaphone and not a whisper in the corner. This is where you come in.

Every pre-order from you and other friends will help Thrive do three great things:

  1. Deploy Thrive Care experts to the nearly 70 Pharmaca and Whole Foods launch-stores across the western USA. Powered by your support this spring and summer the Thrive team will train store team members and give in-person demos to shoppers, sharing not only our product, but our mission and values.  
  2. Amplify our launch momentum by doing some pretty slick digital advertising to our target demo, giving good guys across the USA e-coupons so they can try our product the next time they’re picking up their organic blueberries and farm raised egg-whites after another killer workout.
  3. Build awareness via guerilla marketing so that guys (and the folks who love their guys) know there’s now a Better Way to Groom.  They can ditch their synthetics and look better and live healthier. And still feel like guys.  

Your pre-order will fund an army (small numbers at the start, but brave and pretty loud) to vanquish the boring, synthetic grooming products, store by store.

To do all this, WE NEED YOU.

Join The Adventure

Testimonials From Guys

"Excellent face wash

I was in the States recently and picked up a bottle of Thrive face wash per the recommendation of a friend. I've tried many brands and have become a fast fan of Thrive. It cleanses without leaving the skin feeling dried-out or oily. The scent is great too, not overly fragrant or perfumey. I only wish I could find it in Europe."  -Paris, France

"Unique Shave Oil

After using a shave oil, I will never use a soap-based shave cream again. It forms a nice foam when applied to a wet face. Shave is closer than anything I've used before even with a fairly dull blade that I was using. It seems to cause a tingling sensation when you put it on which I assume is one of the herbal ingredients. It takes some getting used to, but I now like the sensation. I expected an oily after-feel, but it rinses off like a light soap. Fragrance is amazing - I wish they would make a cologne from it."  -North Carolina

"Spectacular!

I just discovered Thrive on a recent business trip. Best men's grooming products ever -- particularly the face balm!"  -Maine

Read even more reviews here!

Other Ways You Can Help

  1. Enter our #ThriveCareSweepstakes by taking our 5 min survey.  You’ll be entered for a chance to win an Eco-Adventure to Costa Rica for a behind the scenes tour and meet the Thrive team! [ENTER SWEEPSTAKES HERE]

  2. Help us get the word out with our Referral Competition using links at the top.

Meet The Thrive Team


FAQ

Q: When can I expect to receive my perks?

If your perk includes Thrive products, US residents will receive them in one week or less.  If your perk includes phone/lunch meeting with founder, Thrive team will work with you to schedule that for a convenient time.

Q: How do I win a free Thrive Kit by sharing on Facebook or Twitter?

Winner will be announced based on overall highest number of referrals to our campaign. 

Q: Do I have to fill out the survey to enter to win the Costa Rica trip?

Yes, we value your input and will select one participant for a behind the scenes tour in Costa Rica! See full details and a link to rules at thrivecare.co/thrive-survey

Q:  Who is Thrive and what’s their story?  

Thrive was founded in 2012 by a great team of entrepreneurs, natural product chemists, scientists and generally cool people in San Francisco and Costa Rica, who shared a vision for grooming products that helped guys look better, live healthier, and that actually left the planet healthier than before we started.  You can learn more by visiting thrivecare.co

Q: What is Thrive-In? 

We'll be launching this VIP program for our early fans & friends -- complete with discounts, product samples, and more -- very soon. Join now as we’re only accepting 500 folks.

Q: What sets Thrive apart from other skincare products?

A potent blend of medicinal plants formulated by a female entrepreneur from Costa Rica that actually work!  Much more effective than the synthetic chemicals found in most skin care products, these active ingredients are unique to Thrive’s products and help to restore the vitality of a man’s skin.


Questions?

Contact us at hello@thrivecare.co, or find us at facebook.com/thrivecare or twitter.com/thrivecare

story:
(Il testo in Italiano dopo la parte in inglese)

Swimmers' dream is to have an easy to use device to keep tracks of their erformance, such as laps, time count, frequency monitoring etc.

With Xmetrics this dream comes to reality: fixed at your goggles, just on the back of your head, it provides a customizable real time audio feedback directly while swimming.


"Hi I'm Andrea cofounder of Xmetrics.

As former professional swimmer and swim coach, I always found it extremely difficult to monitor the performance of myself and my athletes in an accurate and automatic way while training in a chaotic swimming pool.

I’ve literally tried every existing device on the market to help solve this problem but they all fell short by either moving around on my wrist, not providing biological data, not measuring efficiency …etc

I wanted something more than a lap counter. I wanted a virtual coach!

"So I decided to take my electronics background, recruited some of my like minded geeky friends and started working on a solution. I had to work a lot on that with Davide, who graduated in Telecommunication Engineer with me, to patent the device.

The team then started to grow to realize the first working prototype, to collect data data from the same athletes I was coaching few months before : Emanuele and Stefano jumped in the boat to take care of the hardware and firmware development. Francesco was the last one to join the project, in order to carry on his marketing experience he developed in years as marketing manager in a multinational company.

 Everyone told us it was going to be impossible to create a device that was easy to use, comfortable to wear, and powerful enough to do everything we wanted.  

They were wrong.

It took us several months , but I am pleased to say  we have created the most advanced piece of swimming technology on the planet.

Allow me to introduce you to Xmetrics, it’s engineered to record all aspects of your  training session including number of strokes, number of laps, quality of your flipturn, your heart rate and more.  

But we didn’t stop there, this device also provides real time audio feedback through our waterproof speaker directly to you while swimming.  That’s right, you no longer have to wait to get out of the pool to see results.  

Our desire was to completely innovate the way you master your swimming training sessions.

And together, we made it."

Andrea



Xmetrics is a wearable device that can be worn on the back of the head, extremely ergonomic and lightweight. Once clipped at goggles we can easily start swimming without having to worry about pushing any buttons: we wear it and forget to have it. Xmetrics records any single biomechanical parameters such as the number of strokes, time per lap, efficiency of your swimming technique and the quality of your flip turn providing a real time audio feedback via an earplug. 

Thus, we can have the feedback directly while swimming without having to wait the end of the training session. After that, we can analyze and share with our friends or a professional coach our data out of the swimming pool throughout software and apps, developed for mobile devices and personal computer. Xmetrics is our personal trainer who will follow us in every step of our workout activity.

Xmetrics is open to all swimmers, professional or not, who wish to enhance their training experience in the swimming pool.




Real time audio feedback: thanks to its innovative position is now possible to give a real time audio feedback directly while swimming through an earplug any time they make a flip turn or they stop swimming.

Back head position: this is the first time that an activity tracker for swimmers is positioned on the back of the head: and this is the best position to gather more and more accurate swimming data. In addition, swimmers aren't bothered by anything that drags on their wrist or fixed in uncomfortable position.

Programmable training: swimmers can program their training schedule on the Xmetrics App and Sync it with their device. In this way swimmers can customize according to specific needs the audio feedback. For instance, swimmers can decide to hear only a beep during the first 10 minutes warm up or time per lap any two laps. For more examples on audio feedback, please read our FAQs.

Advance data analysis: along with data about number laps/strokes/turns automatic stopwatch, swimmers can analyze in detail their training parameters at the end of the training session. The software will provide accurate and easy to read analysis. Swimmers can have a further feedback sharing these data with coach or friends.








Xmetrics is not only an activity tracker but also a powerful software that  gives you the possibility to analyze your training data after your training session. Anything is shown in a very easy to use way. Swimmers can customize their view in order to have always under control the parameters they need most.

Moreover, we have developed a specific tool, that we are providing to swim coaches for free to manage in any single aspect their teams: from the monthly to the weekly and daily schedule of the trainings, with a full detail and recap of any different kind of works proposed. In this way they can keep records of any group or single athlete they are coaching, withouth worrying of losing data. Once the training is done, data from the swimmers is automatically shown also on the coaches app.

Xmetrics will be launched along with an app, free to use with you iOS/Android/Windows mobile operating system.


Based on our experience as swimmers we have decided to develop two different products: Xmetrics PRO, for professional swimmers and their coaches that need to master their training session and Xmetrics FIT, the perfect and affordable device that brings the experience of an olympic training system for everyone.

Xmetrics FIT provides a real time audio feedback at fixed intervals, it tracks laps, strokes, times, swim efficiency and it comes with a multiplatform app to review, analyze and share through the social networks your data.

Xmetrics PRO provides, in addition, a fully customizable audio feedback; possibility to share and review data with your coach or a professional coach; get a training schedule directly on your App/page and sync it to your device by a professional coach or your coach as well; more views for data analysis; more colors to customize your device.

* Products may be subject to minor changes in the engineering phase

"My dreams just come true with Xmetrics. To train, to keep in shape but specially to swim. If I had had Xmetrics 14 years ago probably I would have won more, who knows. Anyway there is an Xmetrics for everyone, professional swimmers or people that just go to the pool once or twice a week. You can keep on audio feedback, you can improve your turns, count your strokes, you can have someone taking care of you every day and every meter. If you are like me and you swim in a big group is going to help you. It’s going to help your coach to improve your session. Instead if you go to the pool once or twice per week you can really enjoy swimming without worrying and wishing to have a coach. Now you have a coach, and his name is Xmetrics. So, don’t lose your time, try it."

Massimiliano Rosolino, OCT 2014


General

  • Lightweight, shock resistant, waterproof and water resistant up to 1m
  • Permanent and ergonomic goggles attach for quick plug & play
  • Waterproof earphones specifically designed for incredible swimming experience
  • Long battery duration

Audio feedback

  • Fully programmable audio feedback: select the level of feedback you need
  • Style independant: no matter if you're a pro or a beginner, the device will learn your own style
  • Metronome function, to provide you pace for your training

Professional monitoring

  • 9-axes mechanical sensors will track all your movements to analyse every aspect of your training
  • Two levels analysis model: have basic info directly reported to your ears and professional analysis under your fingers directly from your computer or mobile device
  • Breath rate, strokes, speed and power analysis

Connectivity

  • Bluetooth 4.0 
  • Single 3.5mm jack connection for audio data, USB connection and battery recharge
  • Full compatibility with Apple: iPhone® >= 4S, iPod® Touch 5th generation and later, iPad® 3rd generation and later    
  • Full compatibility with: Android: any device with Bluetooth LE hardware running under Android version 4.3 Jelly Bean (API Level 18) or later
  • Full compatibility with: Windows Phone: any device with Bluetooth LE hardware support running under Windows Phone 8.1


Would you be one of the first to wear Xmetrics outfits? Choose your favorite perk on the right of this page!


We need funding to finalize the industrialization of the product and having first fully working beta samples.

With the stretch goals we would like to reach, our target is to start working on the new generation of Xmetrics, to enrich the training experience of more users (open water for instance).




Q: How can I contact Xmetrics?

A: You can use this email address: info@xmetrics.it; we will reply you as soon as we can.

Q: Do I have to add taxes and shipping cost to my perk?

Yes, you have. Please add 20$ for shipping (only if you buy the product, not goggles string or swimcup!). VAT only if you are EU citizens

Q: Where can I buy Xmetrics after the indiegogo campaign?

A: You will be able to pre-order Xmetrics in our webshop on our homepage: www.xmetrics.it 

Q: What kind of audio feedback can we receive?

A: There are essentially three different kind of feedbacks. The time (elapsed or total), number of laps (total, partial) and beeps. It is then up to you to combine these feedbacks. Beeps can be used to set your frequency rate or to provide an alert after a set time of laps or time. But you can do any advanced combination. For instace, if you are working on an interval training, such as 10x200 meters freestyle with a recovery time of 20 seconds each time, you can decide to hear your split time any 50 meters and total time any 200 meters and also a beep after the 20 seconds are gone..

Q: I don't want to use earplugs, what can I do?

A: Xmetrics is an activity tracker designed for swimmers with a real time audio feedback. You can decide to use it for recording your data and analyze them only at the end. In this case, simply remove the earplugs. You can also use any other kind of waterproof earplugs if you feel more comfortable.

Q: What about patents?

A: Xmetrics technology about the combined usage of several sensors for tracking the performance of an athlete providing a feedback and the position itself of the device is patent pending. 

Q: What shall I add in shipping cost?

A: We will ship directly from Italy, so please add the shipping cost as indicated in our perks. If you are an EU/US resident, please add the shipping cost mentioned in the perk.

Q: What shall I add in VAT?

A: We do though have to add 20% VAT for EU countries, for US residence there is only custom clearance managed with the shipping cost.

Q: How does Xmetrics measure strokes?

A: Strokes are detected by our algorithm that takes data from the sensors placed in the backhead. Basically, we use MEMS sensors that provides very accurate data. 

Q: How does Xmetrics not to move on the goggles?

A: We studied any single device on the market to understand what should have been the best placement for the device. We know that ergonomy and stability are relevant as much as data analysis and we didn't want to produce a device that was moving: athletes should concentrate on swimming, not on fixing a device! So we came up with this specific solution: a silicon band in which you insert your goggles straps. The device is then attached directly to the band with a special closing system that prevent any kind of drag during your training.

Q: What is the sound quality like?

A: In this first version, you will hear audio feedback. The quality of these feedbacks is the same as a navi system for your car. We believe nobody will notice or appreciate if a feedback is given with a CD quality: it has to be clear, short, and useful.

Q: What about battery life?

A: Xmetrics  is designed to provide at least 6 hours of battery life when all sensors are in use. This means that regular users don't have to worry to recharge it any time. Since the device is waterproof and all electronics inside should fullfill very strict standard, it is not possible to replace the battery, which is expected to last for at least 3 years.

Q: Will Xmetrics work with my Smartphone, Smart Watch or other Fitness Trackers?

A: Xmetrics will work with any Android Bluetooth certified smartphones and any iPhone/iPad. The support for Windows phone will come in a second moment. However, you can connect it to any PC/Mac using both the USB connection or the Bluetooth one. So far, we do not have a dedicated app for smart watches. Xmetrics should be able to connect to any Bluetooth certified device. Some functions might not be useable.

Q: Can I order multiple units on Indiegogo?

A: We will have a pre-order webshop online, when the Indiegogo campaign ends. You will easily be able to preorder there.  We will provide a lower price for Indiegogo backers.

 __________________________________________________________________________

Il primo activity tracker del mondo per i nuotatori. Feedback audio realtime e analisi dei dati biomeccanici

Milan, ItalyTechnology

Il sogno di ogni nuotatore è di avere un dispositivo facile da usare in grado di tener traccia delle proprie prestazioni in acqua, come per esempio delle vasche fatte, il tempo, la frequenza di bracciata..

Xmetrics è in grado di realizzare questo sogno: fissato agli occhialini sul retro della testa, fornisce un feedback audio personalizzabile direttamente durante la tua nuotata.


La storia

"Ciao, sono Andrea, cofondatore di Xmetrics.

Sono stato anche io un nuotatore professionista e un allenatore di nuoto. E durante questa mia esperienza, ho sempre trovato molto difficile monitore le mie prestazioni e quelle dei miei atleti in maniera precisa e automatica durante l’allenamento in una piscina caotica.

Le ho provate di tutte, ogni singolo dispositivo sul mercato, per provare a risolvere questo problema: alcuni si muovevano sul mio polso, altri non erano in grado di rilevare tutti i parametri necessari..

Io volevo qualcosa di più di un comune contavasche. Volevo un coach virtuale.

"Per questo motivo ho deciso di affidarmi al mio background di ingegnere elettronico, ho assoldato i miei amici ed insieme abbiamo iniziato a lavorare ad una soluzione. Ho passato tanto tempo con Davide, mio compagno di studi, per brevettare il dispositivo.

Il team  quindi iniziato a crescere per realizzare il primo prototipo funzionante per raccogliere dati da quegli stessi atleti che allenavo fino a poco tempo prima. Emanuele e Stefano si sono aggiunti per occuparsi della parte di design elettronico e di sviluppo del firmware, mentre Francesco, ultimo in ordine di tempo, ha portato nella squadra le suoe competenze di marketing acquisite in anni da dirigente in una multinazionale.

Chiunque ci diceva che fosse impossibile creare un dispositivo che fosse facile da usare ,comodo da indossare e sufficientemente potente da fare tutto quello che avevamo intenzione facesse.

Si erano sbagliati.

Ci sono voluti diversi mesi, ma adesso sono fiero di dire che abbiamo creato il più avanzato dispositivo tecnologico per il nuoto esistente.

Permettetemi di presentarvi Xmetrics. E’ studiato appositamente per registrare ogni aspetto del tuo allenamento, dal numero delle bracciate a quello delle vasche, la qualità della tua virata e della tua nuotata e molto altro ancora.

Ma non ci siamo fermati qui: questo dispositivo fornisce anche un feedback audio realtime attraverso gli auricolari direttamente durante l’allenamento. In questo modo non dovrai più aspettare la fine del tuo allenamento per sapere che cosa hai fatto.

Il nostro desiderio era di innovare completamente il modo in cui ognuno di noi si allena.

E insieme, lo abbiamo fatto.”

Andrea


Xmetrics


Xmetrics è il primo dispositivo indossabile al mondo studiato appositamente per gli atleti, professionisti o amatoriali e per i loro allenatori per monitorare al meglio le proprie prestazioni durante l’allenamento.

Si tratta di un sistema estremamente facile e comodo da indossare, che si aggancia in maniera estremamente intuitiva agli elastici degli occhialini. Una volta indossato, non rimane da far altro che nuotare, senza dover preoccuparsi di schiacciare alcun pulsante. Il dispositivo andrà a raccogliere automaticamente una serie di parametri biomeccanici relativi all’allenamento, quali il numero di bracciate, l’efficienza della nuotata, il numero di vasche, il tempo per vasca, la velocità di rotazione della virata e l’accelerazione della spinta, lo stile nuotato. L’atleta potrà sentire in tempo reale, senza dove uscire dalla vasca, alcuni feedback audio come per esempio il tempo (“2 vasche, 32.4 secondi”) o addirittura feedback più evoluti come per esempio impostare con un beep la frequenza di bracciata


Vantaggi



Feedback audio Real Time: Grazie alla sua innovativa posizione sul retro della testa è ora possibile dare un feedback audio real time all’atleta direttamente durante l’allenamento ad ogni virata o pausa dell’allenamento.

Posizione sul retro della testa: E’ la prima volta che un dispositivo per monitora le prestazione dell’atleta è posizionato dietro la testa. E’ provato scientificamente che questa sia la posizione migliore per raccogliere più parametri e più affidabili. Inoltre gli atleti non si devono preoccupare di null’altro se non nuotare: niente pulsanti da schiacciare o cambiamenti nel loro gesto tecnico per guardare dei display; niente orologi che si muovono e danno fastidio durante l’allenamento.

Programmazione degli allenamenti: I nuotatori o i loro coach possono programmare gli allenamenti con Xmetrics App e sincronizzarli direttamente con il dispositivo. In questo modo è possibile personalizzare a seconda delle esigenze personali il feedback audio che si sente. Per esempio, un atleta può decidere di sentire un solo beep durante i primi 10 minuti di riscaldamento oppure di sentire ogni 2 vasche il tempo intermedio. Ma è possibile fornire feedback anche molto più evoluti sfruttando anche la funzione metronomo per segnalare il passo.

Analisi dati avanzata: Oltre ai dati sul numero di vasche, bracciate o al cronometro automatico i nuotatori possono analizzare nel dettaglio i parametri dell’allenamento alla fine della loro sessione. Tra le analisi più dettagliate troviamo per esempio lo studio della  virata, dove vengono separati i movimenti di avvicinamento, rotazione e spinta e calcolati in maniera quantitativa, qualitativa e statistica l’efficienza dei singoli. Infine è possibile condividere i propri dati con gli amici sui vari social, potendo fare gare virtuali con gli stessi.







Un activity tracker e un potente Software

Una volta finita la sessione di allenamento, Xmetrics si sincronizza automaticamente con il tablet, lo smartphone o il PC, fornendo una analisi dettagliata di tutto quanto successo in acqua. Il software è estremamente intuitivo nella sua grafica e permette di essere personalizzato in modo da mostrare sempre per primi i dati a cui si è maggiormente interessati.

Abbiamo inoltre sviluppato una applicazione specifica per gli allenatori in modo da permettere loro di gestire in ogni aspetto gli allenamenti di una squadra di nuoto, partendo dalla macroprogrammazione alla programmazione settimana e giornaliera, personalizzando gli allenamenti per gruppi di atleti o per atleti singoli. Questa applicazione, prima nel suo genere, sarà fornita gratuitamente a tutti gli allenatori.


Versioni di Xmetrics

Xmetrics è disponibile in 2 versioni: PRO, dedicato ai nuotatori avanzati e ai loro coach, che vogliono avere sott’occhio ogni dettaglio dell’allenamento e richiedono analisi estremamente puntuali e precise; FIT, dedicato invece agli amatori e a chi vuole avere a disposizione uno strumento professionale per poter gestire e approfondire i risultati dei propri allenamenti

Xmetrics FIT: fornisce un feedback audio real time a intervalli prefissati, conta le vasche, bracciate, tempi, efficienza e qualità della nuotata ed è fornito di una app multipiattaforma per analizzare e condividere tramite social networks i risultati dell’allenamento


Xmetrics PRO: fornisce, in aggiunta, un audio feedback completamente personalizzabile; è possibile per l’atleta condividere i propri dati direttamente con il proprio coach o un coach professionista; possibilità di ricevere sulla propria app un programma di allenamenti e sincronizzarlo con il dispositivo; maggior numero di viste e di analisi disponibili. Maggiori colori possibili.


Il Campione Olimpico e Mondiale Massimiliano Rosolino parla di Xmetrcs

 

"I miei sogni si avverano con Xmetrics. Per allenarsi, per tenersi in forma ma soprattutto, per nuotare. Se solo avessi avuto Xmetrics 14 anni fa..magari avrei potuto vincere di piu, chi lo sa..Comunque sia, c’è un Xmetrics per ognuno di noi, dal nuotatore professionista a chi va in piscina semplicemente un paio di volte alla settimana per tenersi in forma. Potete ascoltare degli audio feedback delle vostre prestazioni, potete migliorare le vostre virate, contare le bracciate e valutarne l’efficienza, potete avere qualcuno che si prenda cura dei vostri allenamenti ogni giorno e ogni metro che percorrete. Se siete come me o se nuotate in un grande gruppo, Xmetrics vi potrà tornare estrememente utile, supportando il vostro coach o molto più semplicemente lasciandovi liberi di nuotare senza pensare a nulla. Ora anche voi avete il vostro personal coach e il suo nome è Xmetrics. Non perdete tempo, provatelo anche voi”

Massimiliano Rosolino, OCT 2014

Dati Tecnici


Generale

·  Leggero, resistente agli urti e all’acqua fino a 3m di profondità

·  Banda in silicone per garantire un attacco plug&play agli occhilini veloce, ergonomico e duraturo

·  Auricolari waterproof studiati per essere utilizzati appositamente durante l’allenamento

·  Batteria a lunga durata

Audio feedback

·  Audio feedback completamente personalizzabile, anche nel volume

·  Non importa che tu sia professionista o dilettante, il dispositivo è in grado di capire il tuo stile nuotato

·  Funzione metronomo, per impostare il tuo passo durante l’allenamento

Professional monitoring

·  Sensori biomeccanici a 9 assi per tenere tracci di tutti i movimenti e analizzare ogni aspetto del tuo allenamento

·  Analisi a due livelli: informazioni basilari fornite direttamente durante l’allenamento con un feedback audio e  analisi professionale alla fine, direttamente al pc o al tuo dispositivo mobile

·  Analisi del ritmo della respirazione, bracciate e delle variazioni di velocità

Connettività

·  Bluetooth 4.0 

·  Jack da 3.5mm per connessione audio, USB e ricarica batteria

·  Piena compatibilità con i sistemi  Apple: iPhone® >= 4S, iPod® Touch 5th generazione e successive, iPad® 3rd generazione e sucecssive 

·  Piena compatibilità con tutti i dispositivi Android compatibili con lo standard BLE (Android > 4.2)

·  Piena compatibilità con tutti i dispositivi Windows compatibili con lo standard BLE (Windows > 8)

Vuoi essere tra i primi a sfoggiare i nostri gadget? Selezionali tra i perk disponibili!


Xmetrics sulla stampa


Il nostro Team



F.A.Q.

D: Come posso contattare Xmetrics?

R: Potete usare l’indirizzo info@xmetrics.it. Vi risponderemo al più presto possibile.

D: Devo aggiungere le tasse al totale

Si, le tasse vanno aggiunte a parte a seconda del luogo di provenienza. Ricordatevi inoltre di aggiungere 20$ per la spedizione (solo nel caso compriate il prodotto!). L’IVA (VAT) va aggiunta solo per i cittadini EU

D: Che tipo di feedback si ricevono?

Ci sono essenzialmente 3 tipi di feedback. Il tempo (parziale o totale), il numero delle vasche (totale o parziale) e i segnali sonori (bip). E’ poi facoltà del singolo utilizzatore combinare questi feedback., I Bip possono inoltre essere usati per impostare la tua frequenza di bracciata (funzione metronomo) o per darti un allarme dopo un certo numero di vasche o di tempo. Ma potete utilizzare ogni qualsiasi combinazione più avanzata. Per esempio, se stai facendo un esercizio con delle partenze specifiche, per esempio 10x200m con una ripertenza ogni 3’, puoi avere i passaggi ogni 2 vasche, il totale al termine del 200m e la ripartenza ogni 3’, cosi come puoi sentire per i primi 10 secondi di ogni 50 metri la frequenza della tua bracciata desiderata.

D: Non voglio usare auricolare, che cosa posso fare?

Xmetrics è un activity tracker progettato per i nuotatori che fornisce un feedback audio. Ma qualora decidessi di rinunciare a questa funzionalità, ti raccoglie comunque tutti i dati per permetterti di analizzarli in un secondo momento. Nel caso fossi affezionato ad altri tipi di auricolari waterproof, puoi tranquillamente utilizzarli al posto di quelli forniti in dotazione.

D: Ci sono dei brevetti?

La tecnologia di Xmetrics è basata sull’utilizzo combinato di vari sensori per tracciare le prestazioni di un atleta fornendo un riscontro audio in diretta. Abbiamo depositato per questo motive domanda di brevetto.

D: Come fa Xmetrics a misurare le bracciate?

Le bracciate sono determinate da un algoritmo che riceve i dati dai sensori posti sul retro del capo. L’interpretazione di questi dati è possibile grazie alla accuratezza con i quali vengono rilevati grazie alla posizione specifica.

D: Come è possibile che Xmetrics non si muove sugli occhialini?

Abbiamo studiato ogni dispositivo sul mercato per capire quale potesse essere il miglior posizionamento. Sappiamo che l’ergonomia e la stabilità sono importanti tanto quanto i dati e le analisi disponibili e non volevamo produrre un dispositivo che si muovesse durante l’utilizzo: gli atleti devono rimanere concentrati senza distrazioni sulla loro nuotata, dimenticandosi di avere Xmetrics addosso. La nostra soluzione è stata di utilizzare una band siliconica da fissare agli occhialini a cui agganciare con un attacco a baionetta il dispositivo, prevenendo in questo modo ogni movimento non previsto.

D: Qual è la qualità del suono?

In questa prima versione, si ascolteranno dei feedback audio. Questa qualità è la stessa dei sistemi di navigazione per la macchina.

D: Qual è la durata prevista per la batteria?

Xmetrics è studioto per fornire almeno 6 ore di utilizzo quando tutti i sensori sono accesi. Questo significa che per un uso regolare, non ci si debba preoccupare di arrivare a metà sessione di allenamento con le batterie scariche. Dal momento che tutto il dispositivo deve essere completamente impermeabile non è possibile sostituire in autonomia la batteria, che durerà almeno per 3 anni.

D: Il mio Xmetrics funzionerà con il mio Smartphone, smartwatch o altro?

Xmetrics funziona con qualsiasi dispositivo Android certificato Bluetooth e qualsiasi prodotto Apple. Il supporto per Windows phone seguirà immediatamente dopo. Comunque sia, sarà possibile collegare tramite USB il dispositivo ad ogni PC/MAC, come alternativa alla connessione BT. Al momento non è prevista una app specifica per smartwatch e pertanto alcune funzioni potrebbero non essere disponibili.
story_txt:
(Il testo in Italiano dopo la parte in inglese)Swimmers' dream is to have an easy to use device to keep tracks of their erformance, such as laps, time count, frequency monitoring etc.With Xmetrics this dream comes to reality: fixed at your goggles, just on the back of your head, it provides a customizable real time audio feedback directly while swimming.


"Hi I'm Andrea cofounder of Xmetrics.As former professional swimmer and swim coach, I always found it extremely difficult to monitor the performance of myself and my athletes in an accurate and automatic way while training in a chaotic swimming pool.I’ve literally tried every existing device on the market to help solve this problem but they all fell short by either moving around on my wrist, not providing biological data, not measuring efficiency …etcI wanted something more than a lap counter. I wanted a virtual coach!"So I decided to take my electronics background, recruited some of my like minded geeky friends and started working on a solution. I had to work a lot on that with Davide, who graduated in Telecommunication Engineer with me, to patent the device.The team then started to grow to realize the first working prototype, to collect data data from the same athletes I was coaching few months before : Emanuele and Stefano jumped in the boat to take care of the hardware and firmware development. Francesco was the last one to join the project, in order to carry on his marketing experience he developed in years as marketing manager in a multinational company. Everyone told us it was going to be impossible to create a device that was easy to use, comfortable to wear, and powerful enough to do everything we wanted.  They were wrong.It took us several months , but I am pleased to say  we have created the most advanced piece of swimming technology on the planet.Allow me to introduce you to Xmetrics, it’s engineered to record all aspects of your  training session including number of strokes, number of laps, quality of your flipturn, your heart rate and more.  But we didn’t stop there, this device also provides real time audio feedback through our waterproof speaker directly to you while swimming.  That’s right, you no longer have to wait to get out of the pool to see results.  Our desire was to completely innovate the way you master your swimming training sessions.And together, we made it."Andrea

Swimmers can customize their view in order to have always under control the parameters they need most.Moreover, we have developed a specific tool, that we are providing to swim coaches for free to manage in any single aspect their teams: from the monthly to the weekly and daily schedule of the trainings, with a full detail and recap of any different kind of works proposed. In this way they can keep records of any group or single athlete they are coaching, withouth worrying of losing data. Once the training is done, data from the swimmers is automatically shown also on the coaches app.Xmetrics will be launched along with an app, free to use with you iOS/Android/Windows mobile operating system.Based on our experience as swimmers we have decided to develop two different products: Xmetrics PRO, for professional swimmers and their coaches that need to master their training session and Xmetrics FIT, the perfect and affordable device that brings the experience of an olympic training system for everyone.Xmetrics FIT provides a real time audio feedback at fixed intervals, it tracks laps, strokes, times, swim efficiency and it comes with a multiplatform app to review, analyze and share through the social networks your data.Xmetrics PRO provides, in addition, a fully customizable audio feedback; possibility to share and review data with your coach or a professional coach; get a training schedule directly on your App/page and sync it to your device by a professional coach or your coach as well; more views for data analysis; more colors to customize your device.* Products may be subject to minor changes in the engineering phase






"My dreams just come true with Xmetrics. To train, to keep in shape but specially to swim. If I had had Xmetrics 14 years ago probably I would have won more, who knows. Anyway there is an Xmetrics for everyone, professional swimmers or people that just go to the pool once or twice a week. You can keep on audio feedback, you can improve your turns, count your strokes, you can have someone taking care of you every day and every meter. If you are like me and you swim in a big group is going to help you. It’s going to help your coach to improve your session. Instead if you go to the pool once or twice per week you can really enjoy swimming without worrying and wishing to have a coach. Now you have a coach, and his name is Xmetrics. So, don’t lose your time, try it."
Massimiliano Rosolino, OCT 2014





General

Lightweight, shock resistant, waterproof and water resistant up to 1m
Permanent and ergonomic goggles attach for quick plug & play
Waterproof earphones specifically designed for incredible swimming experience
Long battery duration

Audio feedback

Fully programmable audio feedback: select the level of feedback you need
Style independant: no matter if you're a pro or a beginner, the device will learn your own style
Metronome function, to provide you pace for your training

Professional monitoring

9-axes mechanical sensors will track all your movements to analyse every aspect of your training
Two levels analysis model: have basic info directly reported to your ears and professional analysis under your fingers directly from your computer or mobile device
Breath rate, strokes, speed and power analysis

Connectivity

Bluetooth 4.0 
Single 3.5mm jack connection for audio data, USB connection and battery recharge
Full compatibility with Apple: iPhone® >= 4S, iPod® Touch 5th generation and later, iPad® 3rd generation and later    

Full compatibility with: Android: any device with Bluetooth LE hardware running under Android version 4.3 Jelly Bean (API Level 18) or later

Full compatibility with: Windows Phone: any device with Bluetooth LE hardware support running under Windows Phone 8.1




Would you be one of the first to wear Xmetrics outfits? Choose your favorite perk on the right of this page!









We need funding to finalize the industrialization of the product and having first fully working beta samples.
With the stretch goals we would like to reach, our target is to start working on the new generation of Xmetrics, to enrich the training experience of more users (open water for instance).




















Q: How can I contact Xmetrics?
A: You can use this email address: info@xmetrics.it; we will reply you as soon as we can.
Q: Do I have to add taxes and shipping cost to my perk?
Yes, you have. Please add 20$ for shipping (only if you buy the product, not goggles string or swimcup!). VAT only if you are EU citizens

Q: Where can I buy Xmetrics after the indiegogo
campaign?
A: You will be able to pre-order Xmetrics in our
webshop on our homepage: www.xmetrics.it 
Q: What kind of audio feedback can we receive?
A: There are essentially three different kind of feedbacks. The time (elapsed or total), number of laps (total, partial) and beeps. It is then up to you to combine these feedbacks. Beeps can be used to set your frequency rate or to provide an alert after a set time of laps or time. But you can do any advanced combination. For instace, if you are working on an interval training, such as 10x200 meters freestyle with a recovery time of 20 seconds each time, you can decide to hear your split time any 50 meters and total time any 200 meters and also a beep after the 20 seconds are gone..
Q: I don't want to use earplugs, what can I do?
A: Xmetrics is an activity tracker designed for swimmers with a real time audio feedback. You can decide to use it for recording your data and analyze them only at the end. In this case, simply remove the earplugs. You can also use any other kind of waterproof earplugs if you feel more comfortable.
Q: What about patents?
A: Xmetrics technology about the combined usage of several sensors for tracking the performance of an athlete providing a feedback and the position itself of the device is patent pending. 
Q: What shall I add in shipping cost?
A: We will ship directly from Italy, so please add the shipping cost as indicated in our perks. If
you are an EU/US resident, please add the shipping cost mentioned in the
perk.
Q: What shall I add in VAT?
A: We do though have to add 20% VAT for EU countries, for US residence there is only custom clearance managed with the shipping cost.
Q: How does Xmetrics measure strokes?
A: Strokes are detected by our algorithm that takes data from the sensors placed in the backhead. Basically, we use MEMS sensors that provides very accurate data. 
Q: How does Xmetrics not to move on the goggles?
A: We studied any single device on the market to understand what should have been the best placement for the device. We know that ergonomy and stability are relevant as much as data analysis and we didn't want to produce a device that was moving: athletes should concentrate on swimming, not on fixing a device! So we came up with this specific solution: a silicon band in which you insert your goggles straps. The device is then attached directly to the band with a special closing system that prevent any kind of drag during your training.
Q: What is the sound quality like?
A: In this first version, you will hear audio feedback. The quality of these feedbacks is the same as a navi system for your car. We believe nobody will notice or appreciate if a feedback is given with a CD quality: it has to be clear, short, and useful.
Q: What about battery life?
A: Xmetrics  is designed to provide at least 6 hours of battery life when all sensors are in use. This means that regular users don't have to worry to recharge it any time. Since the device is waterproof and all electronics inside should fullfill very strict standard, it is not possible to replace the battery, which is expected to last for at least 3 years.
Q: Will Xmetrics work with my Smartphone, Smart
Watch or other Fitness Trackers?
A: Xmetrics will work with any Android Bluetooth certified smartphones and any iPhone/iPad. The support for Windows phone will come in a second moment. However, you can connect it to any PC/Mac using both the USB connection or the Bluetooth one. So far, we do not have a dedicated app for smart watches. Xmetrics should be able to connect to any
Bluetooth certified device. Some functions might not be useable.
Q: Can I order multiple units on Indiegogo?
A: We will have a pre-order webshop online, when
the Indiegogo campaign ends. You will easily be able to preorder there.  We
will provide a lower price for Indiegogo backers.
 __________________________________________________________________________

Il primo activity
tracker del mondo per i nuotatori. Feedback audio realtime e analisi dei dati
biomeccanici

Milan, ItalyTechnology
Il sogno di ogni nuotatore è di avere un dispositivo facile da usare in
grado di tener traccia delle proprie prestazioni in acqua, come per esempio
delle vasche fatte, il tempo, la frequenza di bracciata..
Xmetrics è in grado di realizzare questo sogno: fissato agli occhialini sul
retro della testa, fornisce un feedback audio personalizzabile direttamente
durante la tua nuotata.




La storia
"Ciao, sono Andrea, cofondatore di Xmetrics.
Sono stato anche io un nuotatore professionista e un allenatore di nuoto. E
durante questa mia esperienza, ho sempre trovato molto difficile monitore le
mie prestazioni e quelle dei miei atleti in maniera precisa e automatica
durante l’allenamento in una piscina caotica.
Le ho provate di tutte, ogni singolo dispositivo sul mercato, per provare a
risolvere questo problema: alcuni si muovevano sul mio polso, altri non erano
in grado di rilevare tutti i parametri necessari..
Io volevo qualcosa di più di un comune contavasche. Volevo un coach
virtuale.


"Per questo motivo ho deciso di affidarmi al mio background di
ingegnere elettronico, ho assoldato i miei amici ed insieme abbiamo iniziato a
lavorare ad una soluzione. Ho passato tanto tempo con Davide, mio compagno di
studi, per brevettare il dispositivo.
Il team  quindi iniziato a crescere
per realizzare il primo prototipo funzionante per raccogliere dati da quegli
stessi atleti che allenavo fino a poco tempo prima. Emanuele e Stefano si sono
aggiunti per occuparsi della parte di design elettronico e di sviluppo del
firmware, mentre Francesco, ultimo in ordine di tempo, ha portato nella squadra
le suoe competenze di marketing acquisite in anni da dirigente in una
multinazionale.
Chiunque ci diceva che fosse impossibile creare un dispositivo che fosse
facile da usare ,comodo da indossare e sufficientemente potente da fare tutto
quello che avevamo intenzione facesse.
Si erano sbagliati.
Ci sono voluti diversi mesi, ma adesso sono fiero di dire che abbiamo
creato il più avanzato dispositivo tecnologico per il nuoto esistente.
Permettetemi di presentarvi Xmetrics. E’ studiato appositamente per
registrare ogni aspetto del tuo allenamento, dal numero delle bracciate a
quello delle vasche, la qualità della tua virata e della tua nuotata e molto
altro ancora.
Ma non ci siamo fermati qui: questo dispositivo fornisce anche un feedback
audio realtime attraverso gli auricolari direttamente durante l’allenamento. In
questo modo non dovrai più aspettare la fine del tuo allenamento per sapere che
cosa hai fatto.
Il nostro desiderio era di innovare completamente il modo in cui ognuno di
noi si allena. 
E insieme, lo abbiamo fatto.”
Andrea

Xmetrics


Xmetrics è il primo dispositivo
indossabile al mondo studiato appositamente per gli atleti, professionisti o
amatoriali e per i loro allenatori per monitorare al meglio le proprie
prestazioni durante l’allenamento.

Si
tratta di un sistema estremamente facile e comodo da indossare, che si aggancia
in maniera estremamente intuitiva agli elastici degli occhialini. Una volta
indossato, non rimane da far altro che nuotare, senza dover preoccuparsi di
schiacciare alcun pulsante. Il dispositivo andrà a raccogliere automaticamente
una serie di parametri biomeccanici relativi all’allenamento, quali il numero
di bracciate, l’efficienza della nuotata, il numero di vasche, il tempo per
vasca, la velocità di rotazione della virata e l’accelerazione della spinta, lo
stile nuotato. L’atleta potrà sentire in tempo reale, senza dove uscire dalla
vasca, alcuni feedback audio come per esempio il tempo (“2 vasche, 32.4
secondi”) o addirittura feedback più evoluti come per esempio impostare con un
beep la frequenza di bracciataVantaggi






Feedback audio Real Time: Grazie alla sua innovativa posizione sul
retro della testa è ora possibile dare un feedback audio real time all’atleta
direttamente durante l’allenamento ad ogni virata o pausa dell’allenamento. 
Posizione sul retro della testa: E’ la prima
volta che un dispositivo per monitora le prestazione dell’atleta è posizionato
dietro la testa. E’ provato scientificamente che questa sia la posizione
migliore per raccogliere più parametri e più affidabili. Inoltre gli atleti non
si devono preoccupare di null’altro se non nuotare: niente pulsanti da
schiacciare o cambiamenti nel loro gesto tecnico per guardare dei display; niente orologi che si muovono e danno
fastidio durante l’allenamento.
Programmazione degli
allenamenti: I nuotatori o i loro coach possono programmare gli
allenamenti con Xmetrics App e sincronizzarli direttamente con il dispositivo.
In questo modo è possibile personalizzare a seconda delle esigenze personali il
feedback audio che si sente. Per esempio, un atleta può decidere di sentire un
solo beep durante i primi 10 minuti di riscaldamento oppure di sentire ogni 2
vasche il tempo intermedio. Ma è possibile fornire feedback anche molto più
evoluti sfruttando anche la funzione metronomo per segnalare il passo.
Analisi dati avanzata: Oltre ai dati sul numero di vasche,
bracciate o al cronometro automatico i nuotatori possono analizzare nel
dettaglio i parametri dell’allenamento alla fine della loro sessione. Tra le
analisi più dettagliate troviamo per esempio lo studio della  virata, dove vengono separati i movimenti di
avvicinamento, rotazione e spinta e calcolati in maniera quantitativa,
qualitativa e statistica l’efficienza dei singoli. Infine è possibile
condividere i propri dati con gli amici sui vari social, potendo fare gare
virtuali con gli stessi.









Un activity tracker e un potente Software

Una volta finita la sessione di allenamento, Xmetrics si sincronizza automaticamente con il tablet, lo smartphone o il PC, fornendo una analisi dettagliata di tutto quanto successo in acqua. Il software è estremamente intuitivo nella sua grafica e permette di essere personalizzato in modo da mostrare sempre per primi i dati a cui si è maggiormente interessati.
Abbiamo inoltre sviluppato una applicazione specifica per gli allenatori in
modo da permettere loro di gestire in ogni aspetto gli allenamenti di una
squadra di nuoto, partendo dalla macroprogrammazione alla programmazione
settimana e giornaliera, personalizzando gli allenamenti per gruppi di atleti o
per atleti singoli. Questa applicazione, prima nel suo genere, sarà fornita
gratuitamente a tutti gli allenatori.

Versioni di
Xmetrics
Xmetrics è disponibile in 2
versioni: PRO, dedicato ai nuotatori avanzati e ai loro coach, che vogliono
avere sott’occhio ogni dettaglio dell’allenamento e richiedono analisi
estremamente puntuali e precise; FIT, dedicato invece agli amatori e a chi
vuole avere a disposizione uno strumento professionale per poter gestire e approfondire
i risultati dei propri allenamenti
Xmetrics FIT: fornisce un feedback audio real time a intervalli
prefissati, conta le vasche, bracciate, tempi, efficienza e qualità della
nuotata ed è fornito di una app multipiattaforma per analizzare e condividere
tramite social networks i risultati dell’allenamento

Xmetrics PRO: fornisce, in aggiunta,
un audio feedback completamente personalizzabile; è possibile per l’atleta
condividere i propri dati direttamente con il proprio coach o un coach
professionista; possibilità di ricevere sulla propria app un programma di
allenamenti e sincronizzarlo con il dispositivo; maggior numero di viste e di
analisi disponibili. Maggiori colori possibili.



Il Campione
Olimpico e Mondiale Massimiliano Rosolino parla di Xmetrcs

 
 
"I miei sogni si avverano con Xmetrics. Per allenarsi, per tenersi in
forma ma soprattutto, per nuotare. Se solo avessi avuto Xmetrics 14 anni
fa..magari avrei potuto vincere di piu, chi lo sa..Comunque sia, c’è un
Xmetrics per ognuno di noi, dal nuotatore professionista a chi va in piscina
semplicemente un paio di volte alla settimana per tenersi in forma. Potete
ascoltare degli audio feedback delle vostre prestazioni, potete migliorare le
vostre virate, contare le bracciate e valutarne l’efficienza, potete avere
qualcuno che si prenda cura dei vostri allenamenti ogni giorno e ogni metro che
percorrete. Se siete come me o se nuotate in un grande gruppo, Xmetrics vi
potrà tornare estrememente utile, supportando il vostro coach o molto più
semplicemente lasciandovi liberi di nuotare senza pensare a nulla. Ora anche
voi avete il vostro personal coach e il suo nome è Xmetrics. Non perdete tempo,
provatelo anche voi”
Massimiliano Rosolino, OCT 2014

Dati
Tecnici




Generale
· 
Leggero,
resistente agli urti e all’acqua fino a 3m di profondità
· 
Banda in
silicone per garantire un attacco plug&play agli occhilini veloce,
ergonomico e duraturo
· 
Auricolari
waterproof studiati per essere utilizzati appositamente durante l’allenamento
· 
Batteria a
lunga durata
Audio
feedback
· 
Audio feedback
completamente personalizzabile, anche nel volume
· 
Non
importa che tu sia professionista o dilettante, il dispositivo è in grado di
capire il tuo stile nuotato
· 
Funzione
metronomo, per impostare il tuo passo durante l’allenamento
Professional
monitoring
· 
Sensori
biomeccanici a 9 assi per tenere tracci di tutti i movimenti e analizzare ogni
aspetto del tuo allenamento
· 
Analisi a
due livelli: informazioni basilari fornite direttamente durante l’allenamento
con un feedback audio e  analisi
professionale alla fine, direttamente al pc o al tuo dispositivo mobile
· 
Analisi
del ritmo della respirazione, bracciate e delle variazioni di velocità
Connettività
· 
Bluetooth
4.0 
· 
Jack da
3.5mm per connessione audio, USB e ricarica batteria
· 
Piena
compatibilità con i sistemi  Apple: iPhone® >= 4S, iPod®
Touch 5th generazione e successive, iPad® 3rd generazione e sucecssive 
· 
Piena
compatibilità con tutti i dispositivi Android compatibili
con lo standard BLE (Android > 4.2)
· 
Piena
compatibilità con tutti i dispositivi Windows compatibili
con lo standard BLE (Windows > 8)

Vuoi essere tra i primi a sfoggiare i nostri gadget? Selezionali tra i perk disponibili!

Xmetrics sulla stampa



Il nostro Team



F.A.Q.


D: Come posso contattare Xmetrics?
R: Potete usare l’indirizzo info@xmetrics.it. Vi risponderemo al più
presto possibile.
D: Devo aggiungere le tasse al totale
Si, le tasse vanno aggiunte a parte a seconda del luogo di provenienza.
Ricordatevi inoltre di aggiungere 20$ per la spedizione (solo nel caso
compriate il prodotto!). L’IVA (VAT) va aggiunta solo per i cittadini EU
D: Che tipo di feedback si ricevono?
Ci sono essenzialmente 3 tipi di feedback. Il tempo (parziale o totale), il
numero delle vasche (totale o parziale) e i segnali sonori (bip). E’ poi
facoltà del singolo utilizzatore combinare questi feedback., I Bip possono
inoltre essere usati per impostare la tua frequenza di bracciata (funzione
metronomo) o per darti un allarme dopo un certo numero di vasche o di tempo. Ma
potete utilizzare ogni qualsiasi combinazione più avanzata. Per esempio, se
stai facendo un esercizio con delle partenze specifiche, per esempio 10x200m
con una ripertenza ogni 3’, puoi avere i passaggi ogni 2 vasche, il totale al
termine del 200m e la ripartenza ogni 3’, cosi come puoi sentire per i primi 10
secondi di ogni 50 metri la frequenza della tua bracciata desiderata.
D: Non voglio usare auricolare, che cosa posso fare?
Xmetrics è un activity tracker progettato per i nuotatori che fornisce un
feedback audio. Ma qualora decidessi di rinunciare a questa funzionalità, ti
raccoglie comunque tutti i dati per permetterti di analizzarli in un secondo
momento. Nel caso fossi affezionato ad altri tipi di auricolari waterproof,
puoi tranquillamente utilizzarli al posto di quelli forniti in dotazione.
D: Ci sono dei brevetti?
La tecnologia di Xmetrics è
basata sull’utilizzo combinato di vari sensori per tracciare le prestazioni di
un atleta fornendo un riscontro audio in diretta. Abbiamo depositato per questo
motive domanda di brevetto.
D: Come fa Xmetrics a misurare le bracciate?
Le bracciate sono determinate da un algoritmo che riceve i dati dai sensori
posti sul retro del capo. L’interpretazione di questi dati è possibile grazie
alla accuratezza con i quali vengono rilevati grazie alla posizione specifica.
D: Come è possibile che Xmetrics non si muove sugli
occhialini?
Abbiamo studiato ogni dispositivo sul mercato per capire quale potesse
essere il miglior posizionamento. Sappiamo che l’ergonomia e la stabilità sono
importanti tanto quanto i dati e le analisi disponibili e non volevamo produrre
un dispositivo che si muovesse durante l’utilizzo: gli atleti devono rimanere
concentrati senza distrazioni sulla loro nuotata, dimenticandosi di avere
Xmetrics addosso. La nostra soluzione è stata di utilizzare una band siliconica
da fissare agli occhialini a cui agganciare con un attacco a baionetta il
dispositivo, prevenendo in questo modo ogni movimento non previsto.
D: Qual è la qualità del suono?
In questa prima versione, si ascolteranno dei feedback audio. Questa
qualità è la stessa dei sistemi di navigazione per la macchina. 
D: Qual è la durata prevista per la batteria?
Xmetrics è studioto per fornire almeno 6 ore di utilizzo quando tutti i
sensori sono accesi. Questo significa che per un uso regolare, non ci si debba
preoccupare di arrivare a metà sessione di allenamento con le batterie
scariche. Dal momento che tutto il dispositivo deve essere completamente
impermeabile non è possibile sostituire in autonomia la batteria, che durerà
almeno per 3 anni.
D: Il mio Xmetrics funzionerà con il mio Smartphone,
smartwatch o altro?
Xmetrics funziona con qualsiasi dispositivo Android certificato Bluetooth e
qualsiasi prodotto Apple. Il supporto per Windows phone seguirà immediatamente
dopo. Comunque sia, sarà possibile collegare tramite USB il dispositivo ad ogni
PC/MAC, come alternativa alla connessione BT. Al momento non è prevista una app
specifica per smartwatch e pertanto alcune funzioni potrebbero non essere
disponibili.

story:
Her mom posted this :

This is my beautiful daughter Jordyn Mackenzie. She was born 3 years ago with a rare kidney disease (ARPKD). She is currently in end stage renal failure and urgently needs a kidney. Her blood type is B positive. Please share this photo. You never know, some Good Samaritan, some angel may be willing to help. Living donors give the gift of life! Please take seconds out of your day to share this photo and give my baby girl more of a fighting chance!

Sharing is caring & networking is key!

Monetary donations are also needed and appreciated for travel expenses, medical care and other needs for Jordyn.


https://www.facebook.com/taylor.burden.14?fref=ts

This is her moms facebook link if you can help!

http://teamjordynmaddox.wix.com/teamjordyn

story: After months of strange health issues I found out that I was over 5 months pregnant. I know it sounds strange but trust me I was shocked. I was also looking for employment when I found out and was going back to school. I have had to change my course and I'm excited to announce that my little boy will be here around February 5th. But I have so much to do and need all the help I can get. I guess babies are not cheap. I have past hospital bills that aren't covered, need work on my car and need everything a baby requires. I have a few beautiful friends that have given me clothes and some essentials but I have quite a bit to go. I also have to pay my few small bills while I'm unable to work until I can find a job postnatal. But I believe that everything is going to work out and that the universe will provide. Thank you for taking the time to read this. If you are unable to contribute or prefer not to donate cash I am registered at Target and would love any used baby items that could be donated. I plan on passing down any used items to another mother in need when I am done using them to keep the circle of love going. Thank You!
